author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: eco beauty, Christmas gifts, eco responsible beauty, gifts ideas
meta-description: The holidays are around the corner and that means it’s time to get presents for the people you care about. We have already compiled a list of some responsible b
meta-title: 10 ideas of beauty gifts from eco beauty brands
name: 10 ideas of beauty gifts for Christmas from eco responsible beauty brands
post-body:
The holidays are around the corner and that means it’s time to get presents for the people you care about. Getting presents can be quite a challenge. Of course, you don't always want to give the same thing and sometimes it’s also hard to decide what someone else would like to have. Fortunately, there are some things that are almost always popular, such as beauty products. We have already compiled a list of some responsible beauty brands where you can get some great Christmas gifts from.

‍

La bouche rouge

‍
The first beauty brand to offer some top products is La bouche rouge. It’s a brand with products that are not only good for you, but also for the planet. They offer all kinds of different products like lipstick, eyeshadow, blush, bronzer and many more. Besides make-up, they also offer refillable containers and make-up brushes. They have a huge range that will make many people happy. With a gift from this brand, at least you know you are going for a vegan and cruelty-free product that contributes to a better world.

‍

S and Vaë

‍
Looking for a gift for someone who loves a nice tan? Then you can turn to S and Vaë. This brand offers self-tan products that are good for you as a user and for the world. You can choose from several different options. For example, they have a Glow Boost Serum, self-tanning foam and Glow Vitamins. They also offer their products in different sets, which can be perfect when you are looking for a gift. Many sets come with a glove, which completes the gift perfectly.

‍

Olibanum

‍
A gift that is actually always appreciated is perfume. How nice is it to give someone a gift of perfume that is also good for the environment and the world? Olibanum offers a lot of different perfumes that smell great and whose production is not bad for the environment. Of course, you can give one perfume as a gift, but you can also choose to go for a composition set. These contain two to five different fragrances in 12 milliliter bottles. That way, someone can enjoy different scents and discover which one suits them best.

‍

PAOMA

‍
Need a gift for someone who really loves self-care products? Then you should take a look at PAOMA. The products from this responsible brand are of a high quality and can serve perfectly as gifts. For example, go for the Makeup Remover Balm, the Essential Facial Lotion or the Eye Contour Elixir. These are just a few examples, as there are even more products to choose from. If you want to give several products, you can also go for a set. For example, the brand offers the Essentials Set, which cleanses, moisturizes and hydrates the skin. There is also the self-massage set, which can also be a great gift.

‍

Typology

‍
Typology is a responsible brand that offers some great products in the beauty field. The products are very affordable, so you can also go for multiple products if you’d want. For example, take a look at their best sellers. There is the Face Moisturizer that feels luscious on the skin and is perfect for sensitive skin. The Purifying Night Serum is also popular. This product takes care of the skin while you sleep. How fantastic is that? The brand also has products that combine self-care with makeup. Think of the Tinted Serums and the Tinted Lip Oils.

‍

ALL TIGERS

‍
One brand at offers responsible beauty products from all kinds of different categories is ALL TIGERS. When you shop at this brand, one of the type of products you can choose from are lip products. They have both a matte lipstick and a gloss, which come in many different colors. Do you prefer to give nail polish as a gift? Then you can choose from a Base & Top Coat, as well as different colored nail polishes. Another category of product they offer is eye makeup. For example, they have mascara, eyeliner and many different shades of eye shadow. Finally, you can choose to gift someone supplements from the brand. For example, there is the Fortifying Infusion and there are the Hair & Nail Gummies. You can also go for one of their sets when you’re looking for a gift.

‍

Skincode

‍
Another brand that offers great products that can serve as a fantastic gift is Skincode. This Swiss brand has products for truly everyone. For example, let's look at their kits and gift sets. They have different, original names and in addition they are very varied. For example, there is one called the Luxury Lover. It’s a kit that allows someone to pamper themselves for a while. The Special Treat is another great option. This kit contains several products with which someone can take care of his or her skin and really pamper it. As you can see, this brand offers you several, responsible options for a great gift.

‍

Respire

‍
The last brand we would like to talk a little bit more about is Respire. This brand offers a lot of different products that allow you to take good care of yourself in a responsible way. You can choose from several gift sets, with which you can really spoil someone. These contain self-care products, such as deodorant, toothpaste, shampoo and soap. The products are not only hugely convenient, but also make you feel good. They are responsible, which means they are not only good for the user, but also for the environment. It’s definitely worth taking a look at the products of this brand, because who knows, maybe there is a great gift among them.

‍
As you can see, there are plenty of options for a great Christmas gift when it comes to beauty products. There are many responsible brands that offer products that someone can use to treat themselves. So, if you are still looking for a Christmas gift, it’s definitely wise to take a look at one of the above brands.

‍

Of course, you don't always want to give the same thing and sometimes it’s also hard to decide what someone else would like to have. Fortunately, there are some things that are almost always popular, such as beauty products. We have already compiled a list of some responsible beauty brands where you can get some great Christmas gifts from.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: Sustainable beauty, cosmétique, bio, eco responsible beauty products
meta-description: We would like to discuss sustainable beauty trends so that you can be as good informed as possible and that you know how to buy sustainable beauty products.
meta-title: Why Sustainable Beauty is here to stay
name: Why Sustainable Beauty is here to stay
post-body:
We all know that we must do our part to preserve our beautiful planet. Many brands nowadays focus on producing products responsibly. This is also the case in the beauty industry. Several trends have already been developed, which can be used to maintain sustainable beauty. We would like to discuss some of these trends so that you can be as good informed as possible and that you know how to buy sustainable beauty products. That way, you’re able to contribute to the sustainable beauty industry.

Why is a responsible beauty industry important?

‍
Acting responsibly is becoming increasingly important as we all want to stop global warming. We would like to enjoy the earth for as long as possible, so we will also have to pay better attention to the products we purchase. More and more people are looking for responsible products. The beauty industry is huge, and many brands are involved in it. Consumers of beauty products increasingly expect eco-friendly beauty products, so the market for green beauty products is also growing more and more.

‍

Printing packaging with soy ink

‍
We start right off with a green trend that many people don’t know about yet. In fact, a small part of the beauty industry uses soy ink on the packaging of the products. This type of ink is extracted from soybeans. Unlike petroleum-based ink, soy ink is biodegradable. Soy ink has been around for a long time, as it was invented back in 1970. Today, as many as one-third of American newspapers use soy ink. A Korean skincare brand called Dr. Ceuracle's also prints the labels of their products with soy ink. In this way, toxic emissions are minimized. It also makes recycling the packaging easier.

‍

Using natural ingredients

‍
Many skincare products and other beauty products you wash off your skin after use. When you do this, chemicals are not broken down, but end up in water supplies and in the ocean. This affects not only our own health, but also sea life. Natural ingredients are not only better for the environment, but also for you skin itself. Therefore, it’s wise to look at the ingredient list of a product before purchasing or using it. Below we have compiled a list of some different natural ingredients that are good for you as a user and for the environment.

- Essential oils, such as orange oil, jojoba oil and lavender oil;
- Herbal, floral and plant extracts, such as aloe vera, lavender, calendula, lemongrass, white tea, karanja and Icelandic herbs;
- Natural emulsifiers, such as beeswax and wool wax;
- Natural dyes, such as E100 derived from turmeric;
- Natural fragrances, such as lavender oil, rose petals and rosemary;
- Vegetable fats and oils, such as argan oil and shea butter.

‍

Production of biodegradable products

‍
What many people think about when it comes to acting responsibly is recycling. This is for a reason, as it’s a very important part of treating the earth responsibly. Not all beauty industry packaging is recyclable yet, but it’s becoming more so. In fact, many beauty brands are switching to biodegradable and recyclable packaging. By being able to reuse packaging materials over and over again, we don’t need as much new material as we’re using now, which is a lot better for the environment. Try to look for beauty products with recyclable packaging as much as possible. In this simple way, you are already contributing to improving the environment.

‍

Using less water in the ingredients

‍
Water is a very inexpensive ingredient. Not for nothing do many manufacturers of skin care products use a lot of water in producing them. This not only means that our skin doesn’t get all the nutrients it needs, but the fact that such a large amount of water is being used is also bad for the environment. Therefore, try to look for skin-care products that don’t contain water. Such products come often in the form of a powder. You only need to add a little water yourself, which is ultimately more beneficial for the environment.

‍

Go for solid liquids

‍
Most people use liquid products. Think of soap, shampoo and conditioner. However, solid liquids are becoming more popular. For example, facial cleansing bars and shampoo bars are increasingly available these days. Not only do they take up little space, but they are also better for the environment. This is because a shampoo bar, for example, is equivalent to as many as ten bottles of liquid shampoo. Also, the packaging of solid liquids is often made of environmentally friendly materials. A well-known brand that sells solid liquids is LUSH. Their solid liquids include face serums, moisturizers, face wash, foundation and perfume.

‍

‍

Search for refillable containers

‍
One of the biggest polluting factors in the beauty industry is the production of packaging. Fortunately, a solution to this has been found and is becoming increasingly common, namely refillable packaging. A lot of products today are available with the option to refill them when they run out. Think of makeup such as lipstick, foundation and eyeshadow. Even in the area of skin-care products, this option is often available. When you choose refillable packaging, you only need to buy the product packaged in the much-needed material when buying a new one. You can put the product in the refillable container at home, making it easy to use. By applying this solution to many different products, a lot of packaging material is saved, and we are all reducing environmental pollution.

‍
As you can see, there are many different options you can use to help maintain a responsible beauty industry. The more people use the responsible options, the more brands are likely to respond to this need by producing in a responsible way. When we use as little packaging as possible, make products from natural ingredients and waste as little water as possible, the beauty industry can become more and more sustainable, and we can enjoy all the beautiful products with peace of mind.

‍
post-summary: We all know that we must do our part to preserve our beautiful planet. Many brands nowadays focus on producing products responsibly. This is also the case in the beauty industry. Several trends have already been developed, which can be used to maintain sustainable beauty. We would like to discuss some of these trends so that you can be as good informed as possible and that you know how to buy sustainable beauty products. That way, you’re able to contribute to the sustainable beauty industry.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: eyeshadow, guide, makeup, eyeshadow colours
meta-description: We’re deep diving into the world of eyeshadows to help you find the perfect shade for your eye colour.
meta-title: Choosing the Right Eyeshadow for Your Eye Colour
name: Choosing the Right Eyeshadow for Your Eye Colour
post-body:
Just like finding the perfect foundation, you want to take your complexion into account when choosing the right eyeshadow for you. It all starts by finding the shade that perfectly complements your eye colour. Your eyes are the window to your soul, and you want to do accentuate them in every makeup look.

Everything from your choice of mascara to eyeshadow and liner can transform your makeup look. We’re deep diving into the world of eyeshadows to help you find the perfect shade for your eye colour.

‍

‍

Finding the right eyeshadow shade for you

‍
It all starts by choosing the colour that sits directly across from that of your eyes on the colour wheel. You want the colour to pop while still letting your eyes take centre stage. When a shade enhances your natural eye colour, it gives you a more natural and radiant look.

We’re breaking down the best eyeshadow shades for each eye colour to help you curate the perfect makeup look for you.

‍

Brown Eyes

‍
If you have brown eyes, then count your lucky stars. You’ve got the most versatile shade of them all – meaning you can wear almost any shade of eyeshadow. It’s always best to start with warm undertones, such as golden shimmers and reddish browns to add extra depth to your look. If you want to create a more seductive makeup look, focus on darker shades.

Darker brown eyes can benefit from a vibrant shade to balance out the darkness of the iris. Don’t be afraid to experiment with a pop of blue or a green metallic.

When you want to bring out the brown hue of your eyes, choose pastel shades like pink. If your eyes have a fleck of gold in them, metallic hues will help to bring them out.

One thing you want to be careful with its when using other brown shades as it can make your eyes appear less gleaming. Invest in an eyeshadow palette built around golden hues and caramel shades with honey undertones. A purple or burgundy mascara will be your best friend.

‍

Hazel Eyes

‍
Hazel eyes fall into a category of their own. You want to be a little more specific with your eyeshadow shades than someone with brown eyes. Jewel tones will always be your best choice – whether it’s a vibrant purple or an emerald. Charlotte Tilbury’s ‘The Vintage Vamp’ is designed with hazel eyes in mind.

               

Blue Eyes

‍
If you have blue eyes, you want to shop around for eyeshadows with a warmer undertone to contrast the coolness of your blue iris. For a brighter look, choose soft shades of pink but stay away from blue hues as they can make your eyes appear dull.

Build your makeup look around soft eyeshadow shades, such as champagne that will shimmer in the light without distracting from the depths of your eyes. Another shade you want to consider is orange, along with amber tones and copper red.

‍

Green Eyes

‍
Those with green eyes want to take inspiration from a garden in bloom. Shades like violet, purple, and mauve will enhance your green eyes. As green is one of the brightest eye colours, you don’t need to choose a vivid eyeshadow shade.

For this reason, you want to stay away from cool shades that could make you appear washed out. Plum is one eyeshadow shade that every makeup artist will use for clients with green eyes.

Other shades that you want to consider are reds, golds, and warm oranges as they’ll enhance your complexion without distracting from your eyes. Invest in a burgundy liner or mascara to tie your eyeshadow look together.

Gray Eyes

‍
When you have gray eyes, you want to use eyeshadow shades to help make your eyes look vibrant and stand out. A dark smokey eye is one of the best for those with gray eyeshadows. Shop around for a shade that accentuates and matches the steel of your eyes.

Warmer hues to look out for include golds and warm browns. Jewel tones are another favourite for those with gray eyes.

Whatever eyeshadow you choose, tie it all together with a brown eyeliner or coat of mascara.

What is your go-to eyeshadow shade for your eye colour? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: Just like finding the perfect foundation, you want to take your complexion into account when choosing the right eyeshadow for you. It all starts by finding the shade that perfectly complements your eye colour. Your eyes are the window to your soul, and you want to do accentuate them in every makeup look. Everything from your choice of mascara to eyeshadow and liner can transform your makeup look. We’re deep diving into the world of eyeshadows to help you find the perfect shade for your eye colour.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83

meta-description: We’ve listed some of the best beauty products, so you have a nice overview of the best viral TikTok beauty products there are.
meta-title: Best viral TikTok beauty products
name: Best viral TikTok beauty products
post-body:
There are so many beauty products and brands that you sometimes can simply no longer keep track. If you are searching for a new beauty product, TikTok is a great platform to do some research on. Loads of beauty influencers give you the best advice and that results in some great, viral beauty products. We’ve listed some of the best, so you have a nice overview of the best viral TikTok beauty products there are.

Charlotte Tilbury Flawless Filter

‍

‍

It’s almost impossible that you haven’t heard about the Flawless Filter. This product is a primer, highlighter, and corrector in one. Beauty influencers cannot be more enthusiastic about the product. It’s available in different shades, so you can choose the one that fits your skin tone best. The product gives you a beautiful, glowy skin and has a soft-focus-effect. It’s a popular product for a reason and if you’re searching for a product like this, you can’t go wrong with the Charlotte Tilbury Flawless Filter.

‍

Glow Recipe Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops

‍

‍

Another product that’s viral on TikTok are the Watermelon Glow Niacinamide Dew Drops from Glow Recipe. You can use this product as the last stap of your skin care routine or on top of your makeup. That way you create a natural glow. It’s a skin care highlighter that’s made with skin-friendly ingredients. All in all, it’s a great product to add to your skincare routine or your makeup routine.

‍

Milk Makeup Hydro Grip Primer

‍

‍

Are you looking for a great primer? Then the Milk Makeup Hydro GripPrimer might be the one for you. This product has been going viral for quite some time now and that’s for a reason. The Milk Hydro Grip Primer hydrates your skin, which results in a smooth finish. It makes your skin feel more hydrated and it makes your makeup last up to more than twelve hours.

‍

Kosas Cosmetics Revealer Concealer

‍

‍

None other than Hailey Bieber herself uses this viral concealer of Kosas Cosmetics. The Kosas Cosmetics Revealer Concealer is super creamy and doesn’t only cover up blemishes and dark circles. It also serves as a great eye cream and spot treatment. It’s a medium coverage makeup product that also helps to get a better skin. These features make this concealer extra special and definitely worth considering.

Charlotte Tilbury Contour Wand

‍

‍

Then it’s time for another Charlotte Tilbury product, namely the CharlotteTilbury Contour Wand. Loads of people already love this product. Thiscontour is easy to blend and very buildable. Do you prefer a natural contour?Then you can achieve this with a little bit of product. Do you want to go allout? Then you can build the product until you achieve the look that you want.

Rare Beauty Soft Pinch Liquid Blush

‍

‍

Rare Beauty has brought an amazing liquid blush on the market thatalready loads of people love to use. The Rare Beauty Soft Pinch Liquid Blushis an airy, lightweight blush that you can build very easily. The product stayson your face all day and you don’t need to use much product at once. It layersperfectly over other makeup, and you can get it with a matte and a dewy finish.

Laura Mercier Translucent Powder

‍

‍

De Laura Mercier Translucent Powder is a viral makeup product that’s popular with many people. This powder creates a natural finish and doesn’t make you look cakey. There are three different tints, so it matches many different skin tones. The powder has a mattifying effect and makes sure your makeup stays in place.

REFY Brow Gel

‍

‍

Who doesn’t love a voluminous, fluffy brow? You can easily create one with the REFY Brow Gel. This viral makeup product makes sure your eyebrow hair stays in place and gives you the opportunity to create the perfect shape. It’s a combination between a wax and a gel, which complement each other perfectly. The product is water resistant and flake-free. It will keep your eyebrow hair in place until you wash the product out.

Fenty Beauty Powder Bronzer

‍

‍

Rihanna definitely doesn’t disappoint with the Fenty Beauty Powder Bronzer. For absolutely every skin tone there’s an amazing match and the bronzing effect is absolutely stunning. The powder is airy and very soft. It’s also creamy, which makes it very easy to blend. The powder has a mattifying finish and can be worn as a contour or over the whole body for a little bit of warmth. It’s a very versatile product that’s really amazing for everyone.

DIOR Blush

‍

‍

If you love to watch makeup influencers on TikTok, it’s almost impossible that you haven’t seen the viral DIOR Blush yet. This blush has an amazing pink or peach shade that gives your cheeks a natural, beautiful colour. It’s a universal blush that gives you the opportunity to create a fresh and gorgeous look.

Charlotte Tilbury Light Wand

‍

‍

And then we have another viral Charlotte Tilbury product. The Charlotte Tilbury Light Wand gives you an amazing glow. This liquid highlighter is easy to apply and is absolutely stunning. When the light hits the places that you put the highlighter on, you can see a gorgeous shine that contributes to an amazing glowy look.

MAC Stack Mascara

‍

‍

With the MAC Stack Mascara, you can create beautiful, voluminous lashes. No need for fake lashes, cause this mascara is very buildable and gives you volume and an amazing length. You can keep building, because the formula of the mascara results in an immediate lash lift and gives you the opportunity to create the lashes that you want. Do you want to keep it natural? Then just apply one or two layers. Do you want to create a more dramatic look? Then keep building the mascara until you’ve reached the look you want.

REFY Lip Sculpt

‍

‍

The REFY Lip Sculpt is both a Lip Liner and Setter. You can get them in six different shades, and they are perfect for every skin tone. If you want to create a more natural lip, this product is amazing. The product is creamy and easy to blend. It feels lightweight and it’s very nice to apply. It’s an amazing product that definitely belongs in this list of best viral TikTok beauty products.

‍
post-summary: There are so many beauty products and brands that you sometimes can simply no longer keep track. If you are searching for a new beauty product, TikTok is a great platform to do some research on. Loads of beauty influencers give you the best advice and that results in some great, viral beauty products. We’ve listed some of the best, so you have a nice overview of the best viral TikTok beauty products there are.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: TikTok, makeup, influencers, top makeup ideas
meta-description: There are so many makeup influencers on TikTok nowadays. We made a list of the top 10 most popular makeup influencers on TikTok.
meta-title: Top 10 most popular makeup influencers on TikTok
name: Top 10 most popular makeup influencers on TikTok
post-body:
There are so many makeup influencers on TikTok nowadays, that it can be hard to decide who you want to follow. Of course, you can follow more than one makeup influencer, but it can be nice to have an overview of which influencers are the most popular. That’s why we made a list of the top 10 most popular makeup influencers on TikTok.

marimariamakeup – 21.7 M followers

‍

‍
Mariana Maria is one of the most popular makeup influencers on TikTok. For good reason she has no less than 21.7 million followers on the platform. The fact that she loves makeup is not only showing on her TikTok-account, but also in her own makeup brand. The Brazilian businesswoman created her own makeup brand called ‘Mari Maria Makeup®’. On TikTok she tests products and shows her followers how to create the most beautiful makeup looks. We definitely recommend searching her up sometimes and maybe even follow her if you like.

mimiermakeup – 16.4 M followers

‍

‍
Mirta Miler is the creator behind the TikTok-account called ‘mimiermakeup’. She is a beautiful woman whit a whopping 16.4 million followers on TikTok. Besides, she is amazing with makeup and is able to create the most beautiful looks. Another great thing about her TikTok-account is that she posts videos of her trying out makeup hacks and doing makeup challenges. She is also a master in doing transitions and she doesn’t mind showing her followers how to do that. Her TikTok-account is very versatile which makes it an amazing account to follow.

meredithduxbury – 15.7 M followers

‍

‍

‍
When you love TikTok and makeup, you’ve probably heard about Meredith Duxbury or seen her on your for you page. She’s the queen of foundation and that’s for a good reason. A lot of her makeup looks start with a lot of foundation that she just massages into the skin. It’s a real ‘trust the process’ situation. However, her makeup looks always end up looking absolutely amazing. She can be a real inspiration for everyone who loves makeup.

mikaylanogueira – 13.4 M followers

‍

‍

‍
Mikayla Nogueira is an amazing makeup influencer with a lot of enthusiasm. Besides being a makeup influencer, she’s also a makeup artist. This results in some beautiful, innovative makeup looks that inspire over 13.4 million people. Her enthusiasm is contagious, and it makes it extra fun to watch her videos. The fact that she’s a makeup artist means that she knows what she’s doing and that you can learn some things by watching her videos. Search her up sometimes because it’s definitely worth it.

‍

daniellemarcan – 3.1 M followers

‍

‍
Danielle Marcan is a Romanian makeup influencer who’s active on Instagram and TikTok. She lives in London to study Advertising and Digital Marketing. She shares videos of her trying makeup and creating gorgeous makeup looks. Her videos have a chill vibe and she’s a really mellow person, which can make it relaxing to look at her videos. Her talent in doing makeup has brought her 3.1 million followers and made her become ambassador for the amazing makeup brand Huda Beauty.

‍

gabxxrielle – 2.6 M followers

‍

‍
The impressive makeup artist Gabrielle Alexis inspires over 2.6 million followers on TikTok with her amazing makeup videos. She makes a lot of videos about ‘usual’ makeup looks but doesn’t mind trying a makeup challenge once in a while. If you like extravagant makeup looks, it’s also worthy visiting her TikTok-account. She sometimes likes to go all out with colours and details that are absolutely stunning. She offers so many different things in terms of makeup that it’s definitely worth visiting her account sometime.

‍

gjuanita – 2.6 M followers

‍

‍
Giorgina Juanita is a model who has become big on TikTok by posting beauty and lip sync videos. The fact that she creates and posts these videos has brought her over 2.6 million followers. You can also find her on YouTube, where she posts makeup tutorials, hair tutorials and hauls. Another one of her achievements is the establishment of her own, vegan beauty brand called Gigibee Beauty.

‍

darceyangel – 2.4 M followers

‍

‍
Another popular makeup influencer on TikTok is Darcey Angel. She’s only 18 years old and has already 2.4 million followers. Her videos are makeup related and she often shows her followers how to create the most beautiful makeup looks. If you like ASMR, we think you should definitely look her up, because a lot of her videos contain ASMR qualities.

hayleybuix – 2.2 M followers

‍

‍
A very versatile makeup influencer is Hayley Bui. The 28-year-old is not only talented in doing makeup, but also has a great sense of style when it comes to fashion. You can also find her on YouTube, where she posts vlogs and beauty tutorials. Not only does she know a lot about fashion, but she also has a degree in business economics. And if that isn’t impressive enough, she is also a fashion designer with her own company called ‘Tamed Rebelz’. She’s an inspiring woman who’s definitely worth following.

helinndoski – 1.4 M followers

‍

‍
Helin Doski is another very popular makeup influencer on TikTok. She posts amazing videos about beauty and fashion. Other videos that you can find on her account are makeup challenges. She doesn’t mind trying out a few and it’s definitely worth watching. Her account already has 1.4 million followers and that shows how popular she is.

Of course, the above-mentioned makeup influencers aren’t the only popular ones on TikTok. However, they are a few of the most popular ones and that’s why we’ve place them in this list. There are so many makeup influencers on TikTok that are worth following, so we recommend scrolling through the app to find the ones that inspire you the most. In this list are already a few amazing ones that you can search up, follow, and get inspired by.

‍
post-summary: There are so many makeup influencers on TikTok nowadays, that it can be hard to decide who you want to follow. Of course, you can follow more than one makeup influencer, but it can be nice to have an overview of which influencers are the most popular. That’s why we made a list of the top 10 most popular makeup influencers on TikTok.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: beauty influencers, beauty, instagram , follow, beauty, makeup
meta-description: We’re sharing beauty influencers that deserve a spot on your follow list. Each offer something different and can help you find the perfect makeup routine
meta-title: Beauty Influencers to Follow on Instagram
name: 10 Beauty Influencers to Follow on Instagram
post-body:
Do you ever find yourself going for a late-night scroll through your Instagram? If you’re in need of some inspiration to take your makeup to the next level, look no further than Instagram. We’re sharing 13 beauty influencers that deserve a spot on your follow list. Each offer something different and can help you find the perfect makeup routine for you.

‍

Hyram Yarbo‍

If you’re not already following Hyram, who are you? He’s one of the internet’s most influential skincare influencers and is dominating the industry. He’s responsible for making brands like CeraVe go viral with his YouTube reviews. Follow him on Instagram, for bite-sized content. He just collaborated with Hailey Bieber and is proving why he’s got over 1 million followers onInstagram.

‍

Renee / @gothamista‍

Renee is a self-described “professional treasure hunter” and has been working in the beauty industry for over a decade as a product developer and buyer. She’s taking her insider knowledge and sharing it on Instagram. Renee is always on the hunt for the latest must-have formula and protect to give you ‘unicorn’ skin. Her previous experience as a chemist means that she can put every product under the lens and give you a trust-worthy review.

‍

Desi Perkins

‍‍
With over 4 million followers, Desi is one of the most popular beauty influencers. She’s a former makeup artist who uses her expertise to share in-depth tutorials on the latest makeup trends. Her brand, ‘Dezi Skin’ is the product of her popularity on social media and has a best-selling vitamin C serum that you’ll see all over social media.

‍

Susan Yara

‍‍
Another skincare expert is Susan Yara. If you’re a fan of the ‘skincare-first’ approach to makeup, you’ll want to follow Susan on Instagram. Her YouTube Channel – Mixed Makeup – has over one million subscribers. She’s famous for her in-depth makeup and skincare reviews with a focus on helping her subscribers build sustainable skincare routines.

Susan is another influencer turned entrepreneur with her ‘Naturium’ skincare that focuses on clinically effective ingredients that are also biocompatible.

‍

Katie Jane Hughes

‍
Along with self-made influencers, you want to have a few professional makeup artists on your following list. Katie Jane Hughes is a celebrity and editorial makeup artist who uses her social media as ‘KJH Academy’ to share her insider knowledge. She’s worked with some of our favourite brands, including Glossier and Net-a-Porter with a skincare-first approach to makeup. Katie has quickly become one of our favourite British influencers to follow.

‍

Nyma Tang

‍
We all have a duty to follow a diverse range of influencers and to support different creators. Nyma Tang is a South Sudanese beauty influencer who became popular for her ‘The Darkest Shade’ series on YouTube.

She’s famous for using her platform to highlight the lack of makeup products for women with darker complexions. We love supporting her work for more inclusive beauty and her simple to follow tutorials. Nyma is about to hit half a million followers on Instagram.

‍

Charlotte Palermino‍

‍
Meet your ‘skincare fairy godmother’. Charlotte Palermino is the co-founder of Dieux Skin and is famous for going in-depth into her skincare reviews and videos on trends. If you want to age gracefully – and without being afraid of getting old – follow Charlotte.

Alyssa Marie

‍
We all know of influencers who will always give a product a good review if it’s a pair or PR product. When you want the truth, go to Alyssa. This Caribbean-born influencer is using Instagram to share her journey of embracing her natural hair – and everything that comes with it. We love her trustworthy reviews and that she’s our ‘virtual curlfriend’.

‍

Alba Ramos

‍
Clean beauty is one of the biggest trends in the industry. If you’re interested in curating your Instagram feed around clean beauty, Alba is worth following. She made the transition to clean beauty due to a family circumstance and promotes toxic-free living through natural and organic products.

‍

Jane Kendle-Godbolt

‍
If you’re curating a social media feed that is all about self-love and empowering yourself through makeup, you want to be following Jade. We love her mood-boosting content and her helpful tips and tricks that shows anyone can become a master of their makeup routine.

‍

‍

Who are your favourite beauty influencers to followon Instagram? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

If you’re in need of some inspiration to take your makeup to the next level, look no further than Instagram. We’re sharing 13 beauty influencers that deserve a spot on your follow list. Each offer something different and can help you find the perfect makeup routine for you.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: TikTok. makeup, hacks, TiTok influencers
meta-description: We have search for some of these amazing TikTok hacks and we’ve put them in a list, so that you can try them all out yourself.
meta-title: What are the TikTok makeup hacks?
name: What are the TikTok makeup hacks?
post-body:
Loads of people love to do makeup. It can give you that extra glow or it can give you a little bit more confidence. Another great thing about makeup, is that you can keep learning new tips and tricks. An amazing platform to learn these things is TikTok. All the amazing TikTok makeup influencers love to share their favourite hacks and that doesn’t stay unnoticed. We have search for some of these amazing hacks and we’ve put them in a list, so that you can try them all out yourself.

‍

Concealer hack

Who doesn’t love a good concealer? It’s amazing for covering up some blemishes or to brighten up your undereye. With this hack, you can easily apply concealer in a way that makes your face look amazing. Just pick your favourite concealer and start applying it on one side of your face. Start under your eye and then follow the contour of your nose. Go further to the middle part above your lips and go back by following the contour of your lips. Proceed the line over your cheek and finish it in the middle of your chin. Done? Then do the exact same on the other side of your face. When you’ve applied the concealer, you can start blending it out. After that your done and you’ll see that you look absolutely stunning!

‍

Eyeshadow hack

Do you want an amazing eye look, but are you struggling with the right placement of the eyeshadow on your eyelid? Then you should definitely try this hack. The only thing you need is your favourite eyeshadow and an eyelash curler. Put the top of the eyelash curler on your eyelid and start applying eyeshadow above the eyelash curler, in the crease of your eye. After applying, buffer it out with another brush. Now use the handle bit and put it on the outer corner of your eye. Now you’re going to create a wing with the eyeshadow. Apply eyeshadow above the handle bit. You can try and use the bow of the top part of the eyelash curler to connect the two lines, but you can also keep it this way. Now you’ve created an amazing eye look without any trouble.

‍

Eyeliner hack

Eyeliner can look amazing, but it can be a real struggle getting both sides the same. With this hack, this won’t be a problem anymore! Just start to create a wing with concealer the way you like it. Do you screw up? No problem because you can easily wipe away the concealer. Are you happy with the way the wing looks? Then you can use a piece of plastic and gently press it against the concealer. This way you create some sort of mold. Turn the piece of plastic around and recreate the wing on the other side of the plastic. Now you can press the plastic on the lid of your other eye. This way, the wings look exactly the same. The only thing that you still have to do is overline the concealer with an eyeliner. Now you have a perfect eyeliner. How great is that?

‍

‍Foundation hack

Does your foundation simply not last all day, and does it tend to crease? Then please take a look at this makeup hack. First start with a good moisturizer. Just pick the one you like best. After that take some translucent powder and apply it lightly over your entire face. Get a great setting spray and just spray it all over. When you’re done with the setting spray and it dried, you take a nice primer and also apply this all over your face. Now it’s time for the foundation. Pick your favourite one and apply it the way you like. By prepping your face like this, your foundation will last all day and won’t crease.

‍

Mascara hack

We understand if you don’t love to apply false lashes every single day. Luckily, we’ve found an amazing mascara hack for you. Instead of applying your mascara up and down, run the brush through your lashes horizontally. After that, you can apply the rest of the mascara the way you used to. You’ll see that your lashes have way more volume and that it actually looks like you’re wearing false lashes.

‍

Face lifting hack

Do you want to lift your face by just using makeup? Then we have some great news, cause it’s possible! By just using concealer on the right places, you can make your face look lifted. Use your favourite concealer and apply it on the following places: above the outer corner of your eyebrow, beneath the inner corner of your eye, beneath the outer corner of your eye, next to your nostrils, next to the outer corner of your lip, and beneath the place where you’d contour. Done? Then just blend it out. You’ll see that your face looks lifted, and you’ve achieved that with just using makeup.

‍

Contour hack

Sometimes blending contour can mess up your base. With this makeup hack you can prevent that from happening and make your contour look more natural. First start by spraying your brush with some setting spray. Then first apply the concealer on the brush, instead of applying it on your face first. You can choose to put it on your hand before putting it on the brush, but it’s not necessary. Get the product into your brush and gently buff it into your face on the places that you’d like to contour. That way, you won’t ruing your base and the contour will look nice and natural.

‍

Creaseless under eye hack

Do you wear concealer under your eyes, and does it tend to crease throughout the day? Then this hack might be just what you’re looking for. You only need a good translucent powder and a powder puff. Apply the translucent powder under your eye with the powder puff and gently press and roll the powder onto your skin. This way, you can easily set your under eyes without having to worry that it’ll crease throughout the day.

‍

‍

All the amazing makeup influencers love to share their favourite hacks and that doesn’t stay unnoticed. We have search for some of these amazing hacks and we’ve put them in a list, so that you can try them all out yourself.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: TikTok trends 2022, summer TikTok trends, fashion , outfits
meta-description: Summer 2022 is all about TikTok trends . Read on to get a taste of the biggest trends that are right around the corner.
meta-title: The Hottest TikTok Trends for Summer 2022
name: The Hottest TikTok Trends for Summer 2022
post-body:
Summer 2022 is all about TikTok trends . Whatever you think of TikTok, it’s clear that the social media platform is dominating trends everywhere we look. Thanks to TikTok, we’ve all embraced the idea of DIY fashion and beauty tips and tricks. Whether it was teaching you how to do curtain bangs or tie-dye your old loungewear, TikTok is responsible for the must-follow fashion trends of summer 2022.
If you’re building your summer closet or want to try a new beauty trend, TikTok is setting the style for summer 2022. Our guide to the hottest TikTok trends tells you all you need to know for summer 2022. Read on to get a taste of the biggest trends that are right around the corner.

‍

Feather Fashion

‍
Summer 2022 is all about making up for lost time. It’s no surprise that feathers are becoming one of TikTok’s favourite fashion trends for the season. Feathers will take even the most minimalistic of outfits to the next level.

You don’t have to go all out with feathers from head to do. Incorporate the trend in a more subtle way with a feather top or dress. It’s a look that will take you from brunch with your girlfriends to drinks on the town. Feathers are more wearable than you might think.

‍

Cottagecore Dresses

‍
TikTok is all about the cottagecore aesthetic. Depending on what side of TikTok you’re on, you may have no idea what we’re talking about. Cottagecore is a fashion aesthetic that started on Tumblr and Pinterest before making its way onto TikTok. It’s set to continue to be one of biggest trends of summer 2022. Update your cottagecore closet by incorporating the crochet trend.

You can think of cottagecore as being Jane Austen meets Bridgerton. It’s all about feminine silhouettes, floral prints, and comfortable clothing that you could wear while napping or curling up with a good book.

These dresses are perfect for summer as they tend to be flowy and oversized, making them ideal for when the temperatures start to rise.

If you don’t have a pretty ruffle dress in your summer wardrobe, what are you waiting for?

‍

A Matching Moment

‍
If TikTok has taught us anything, it’s how to love a matching moment. One of the biggest fashion trends of 2022 is wearing a matching set. You can make it your own, whether you’re a fan of knitted sets or want to go all out with a pantsuit. This TikTok fashion trend works for any occasion.

‍

Bangs a la Farrah Fawcett

‍
There’s a growing niche on TikTok that is obsessed with all things 70s inspired. So, it should come as no surprise that their newest muse is Farrah Fawcett – more specifically Farrah’s signature voluminous hairstyle, from the big curls to the curtain bang fringe.

Part of the reason why the Farrah Fawcett look is so popular is that it encapsulates the idea of a ‘hot girl summer’ aesthetic. The hair flip and bouncy curls show that you’re sexy, carefree, and ready to party.

If you’re looking to recreate this look at home, you can use hot rollers for the most authentic look, placing them from the top of your hair down. The secret is to always lift and bounce the hot roller. When you don’t have time to wait around on hot tools, you can use a curling wand or straighteners to achieve a similar look.

‍

Retro ‘70s Sunglasses

‍
TikTok has made us all wish we were back in the ‘70s. We’re updating our summer fashion with retro 70s-inspired sunglasses, thanks to TikTok. These sunglasses are guaranteed to give you a main character moment, whether you’re setting off to Greece or spending the summer at home.

‍

The Zara Slip Dress

‍
TikTok is famous for making products sell out virtually overnight. We still can’t get our hands on the Dior Lip Glow due to its TikTok popularity. We’re already seeing this summer's must-have sell-out item. Get ahead of the curve and snatch up one of Zara’s iconic slip dresses before they sell out. The pink shade is all over our FYP.

‍

Perfect Complexion

If there’s one makeup trend that we’re seeing on TikTok, it’s finding the perfect match for complexion products. We all know how hard it is to find your signature foundation shade or to cancel out redness or discoloration in your face.

Beauty trends are all pointing towards the idea of a natural look with ‘barely-there’ makeup that accentuates your natural glow. The secret to achieving this trend is to look for products that offer full or buildable coverage. We’ve seen products like the KVD Vegan Beauty Good Apple Perfecting Foundation Balm, and the Charlotte Tilbury Hollywood Flawless Filter Concealer all go viral in recent weeks.

Which of these TikTok trends will you be rocking this summer? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: makeup, TikTok tutorial, TikTok makeup, makeup trend
meta-description: This 60-second makeup tutorial by @romaneinnc is inspiring us all to shake up our everyday makeup look ahead of spring and summer. It’s the perfect natural look
meta-title: Meet Our New Go-To TikTok Makeup Tutorial
name: Meet Our New Go-To TikTok Makeup Tutorial
post-body:
When we need a new makeup look, we head straight to TikTok. We love that the short videos give you everything you need to create a makeup look without spending 30-minutes watching a tutorial. One of our favourite go-to TikTok tutorials is less than 60 seconds. In the same time that it takes to mobile order your Starbucks drink, you can discover a whole new makeup look.

‍

‍

This 60-second makeup tutorial by @romaneinnc is inspiring us all to shake up our everyday makeup look ahead. It’s the perfect natural look that is easy to recreate at home with products you’ll already have in your makeup bag. It’s Charlotte Tilbury meets Kylie Jenner with warm undertones and statement eyebrows.

If you’re in need of makeup inspiration, look through Romaneinnc’s TikTok. With almost a quarter of a million TikTok followers, she’s quickly becoming one of the go-to influencers for statement makeup looks that won’t take you too far out of your comfort zone. Fans of Euphoria-inspired makeup will be right at home with your latest tutorials.

‍

‍

We’re breaking down each step of this TikTok tutorial to help you recreate the look. Grab your beauty bag – it’s time to meet your new everyday makeup routine.

1. A flawless base

‍
Romane starts her makeup look with a flawless base, kicking off her routine with Charlotte Tilbury’s Hollywood Filter foundation. It’s one of the most popular products on TikTok right now, giving your skin a dewy glow without clogging your pores. You can follow her steps by applying the foundation directly to the skin with the large applicator before blending with a beauty sponge for a seamless look.

Take a brightening concealer and apply it to the inner corner of your eye, bringing it down the side of your nose. Instead of applying concealer directly to your under-eye area, place the second part of your concealer at the outer corner of your eye. This trick helps to brighten your undereye area and accentuates your eyes. Blend with your beauty sponge for a flawless finish.

2. Contour and blush

‍
The key to recreating this makeup look is to use a cream bronzer to give you the illusion of a slimmer face and a sunkissed glow. What makes this tutorial different is that she places the contour higher than normal, virtually under the cheekbone. If you’re using a cream bronzer, take your beauty sponge to blend it in for a natural glow.

Add a healthy flush to your cheeks with a cream blush. Rare Beauty is TikTok’s go-to brand for cream blushes right now. Add a few dots to your cheeks – focusing just above the apples of your cheek. Blend it out, bringing the colour up towards your temples.

Create a flawless finish for your face products by using a translucent powder under your eyes for mattify.

‍

3. Warm smokey eye

‍
We love that this makeup tutorial also incorporates one of our favourite TikTok trends of the moment – a smokey eye. Instead of choosing typical shades like grey and black, keep your look warm by choosing neutrals that have a red or champagne undertone.

Keep the look soft by using a dark brown eyeshadow as your liner instead of choosing a black liner. You can apply the shadow as liner by using a thin brush to apply it just above your lash line. Don’t forget to add a flick to your outer corner to create a classic winged look.

4. Highlight for a glowing look

‍
No ‘soft glam’ look is complete without highlighter. Take a champagne highlighter and apply it to the tip of your nose, the cupid’s bow, and your cheekbones. A fan brush can help you achieve an even look on your cheeks. If you want a more intense glow, use a large powder blush for a dazzling effect.

5. The finishing touches.

‍
Define and shape your brows using a fine-tip brush before following-up with a brow wand to give you the look of laminated brows. A product like Glossier’s ‘Boy Brow’ can help you achieve this effortlessly chic look.

Add a coat of your favourite lengthening mascara or elevate the look with a pair of your go-to lashes. Overline your lips with a lip liner that is a few shades darker than your chosen lipstick, before finishing off with a touch of gloss for extra shine.

Finish the look off with a setting spray to keep it looking fresh all-day long.

Will you be recreating this look at home? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: When we need a new makeup look, we head straight to TikTok. We love that the short videos give you everything you need to create a makeup look without spending 30-minutes watching a tutorial. One of our favourite go-to TikTok tutorials is less than 60 seconds. In the same time that it takes to mobile order your Starbucks drink, you can discover a whole new makeup look.

meta-title: 10 TikTok Beauty Accounts to Follow
name: 10 TikTok Beauty Accounts to Follow
post-body:
When we’re in search of beauty inspiration, TikTok is the first place we go. The app has quickly surpassed Instagram and YouTube as the home of all-things beauty related. Our FYP is full of our favourite influencers who are teaching us the tips and tricks to take our beauty routine to the next level.

TikTok is quickly coming to dominate the beauty industry – from selling out products to bringing back ‘90s beauty trends. If you’re on TikTok, you’re missing out! These shorts videos by our favourite influencers are helping us to upgrade every aspect of our beauty routine – from hair to makeup and skincare.

Whether you’re a fan of SPX makeup or understated glam, TikTok has something for everyone. You’ll get product recommendations, sneak peaks into upcoming releases, and tutorials to upgrade your daily routine. We’re sharing the best 10 TikTok beauty accounts to give you inspiration of who else to follow on our favourite video-sharing app.

‍

Chriselle Lim

‍
Meet our favourite “rich mom”. Chriselle made her name on Instagram and YouTube before moving over to TikTok. Along with giving us behind-the-scenes content into your life as one of the world’s most popular fashion influencers, there’s plenty of beauty related content. Chriselle shares her tips and tricks on having a ‘rich mom’ skincare routine without a Kardashian budget.

‍

Victoria Lyn

‍
Want skincare, hair tips, and makeup all in one? Check our Victoria Lyn. We love her colorful tutorials and how she shares the latest products to keep you up to date with the latest trends. We love that she uses a mix of affordable and high-end products to offer something for every budget.

‍

Amy Chang

‍
Are you looking for the missing piece in your daily makeup routine? Amy’s tips and tricks are making us fall back in love with our skin and hair. Her TikTok profile @bondenavant has over 1.3 million followers – making her one of the most successful on the app. Take your routine to the next level with Amy.

‍

Brittany Xavier

‍
If you’re a fan of Chriselle Lim, another TikTok influencer you want to follow is Brittany Xavier. While she posts mainly fashion and lifestyle content, we love to see peaks into her beauty routine and how she juggles being a busy mom with being one of the most successful fashion bloggers.

‍

Leticia Gomes

‍
With over 7 million followers, Leticia is one of Brazil’s most popular TikTok superstars. Her makeup tutorials focus heavily on playing with transitions and transforming herself into pop culture icons. Don’t worry. You’ll also find more everyday looks on Leticia’s profile.

‍

Mireya Rios

‍
Are you looking to elevate your skincare routine? Mireya is our go-to influencer for skincare recommendations and tips. She uses her TikTok profile to share the latest must-have provides, along with DIY treatments that make skincare more affordable and accessible to all.

‍

Kelsey Venkov

‍
If you want lifestyle content alongside your makeup tips and tricks, check out Kelsey Venkov. Her haul videos and lifestyle content make us feel like we’re facetiming our best friend. If you want affordable beauty must-haves, give Kelsey a following. She shares regular beauty hauls from brands like Target, Ulta, and Sephora, for budget beauty products.

‍

Mari Maria Makeup

‍
One of the first makeup influencers to grow their platform on TikTok was Mari Maria Makeup. The influencer has over 20.5 million followers and 411+ million likes.

She shares a mixture of lifestyle content with makeup tips and tricks, including insights into her daily routine. Her TikTok is so popular that she’s even created her own beauty line – Mari Maria Makeup.

‍

Michelle Phan

‍
Michelle Phan is one of the OG beauty influencers after launching her YouTube channel at the start of the platform’s life. She’s largely credited for being the person to make makeup tutorials a popular form of media.

We couldn’t have been more excited to see her make an appearance on TikTok. She shares a range of product reviews, tutorials, and behind the scenes content for her makeup brand, EM Cosmetics.

Kashees Official

‍
Another verified makeup artist on TikTok worth hitting the ‘follow’ button on is @kashees.official. This Pakistani influencer has over 5.5. million followers and shares her life as a makeup artist, hairstylist, and fashion designer. If you want to make your FYP more inclusive or explore the beauty of Pakistani fashion, Kashee is worth following.

‍

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: blush, cream blush, makeup trend, summer makeup
meta-description: What we love about this look is that it’s universally flattering and the perfect way to transition to your makeup through to spring and summer. Read on to find
meta-title: How to Create a Face-Lifting Flush with Blush
name: How to Create a Face-Lifting Flush with Blush
post-body:
The warm weather is right around the corner. We’re all getting ready to shake up our beauty routines to get ready summer. A quick scroll through TikTok will tell you that the biggest beauty trend for summer is blush. This product has the power to transform your face by creating the illusion of a natural face lift.

‍
We’re sharing the beauty trend that everyone is talking about. With these steps, you’ll create a dewy, glowing look that makes it appear like you’ve just got back from a pilates class.
What we love about this look is that it’s universally flattering and the perfect way to transition to your makeup through to spring and summer. Read on to find out how to create a ‘lit from within’ glow for your skin.

‍

Start with dewy skin

‍
The secret to creating a face-lifting flush is to start with a smooth canvas. The first step should always be to give your skin the hydration it needs to be soft to the touch. Start by massaging your favourite moisturiser into your skin.

‍
Before you start using concealer or foundation, you want to use a mattifying primer and one that is rich in hydrating ingredients. If your skin is in need of a little extra TLC, you can kickstart your routine with a sheet mask for extra hydration.

‍
When you want extra glowing skin– for a wedding or a special occasion – you can take the hydration one step further by adding another layer of lightweight moisturizer after applying foundation. This extra layer helps the blush to set into your skin for a soft glow.

‍

‍
Choose the perfect match for your blush

‍
Choosing the right blush shade will make or break this beauty trick. You want to choose one that is no more than three shades darker than the natural flush of your cheeks. Sticking within this colour range will make it easier for you to blend it into your skin for a natural face-lifting effect.

‍
If you want to add extra dimension to your look, you can start by using a darker hue on the inner portion of your cheeks. As you move outwards, blend in a lighter shade.
Don’t forget to consider your complexion when choosing your blush shade. If you have a fair or cool complexion, you want to stick to a muted blush shade. Colours like peach and baby pink are your best friend for this trend. If you have a darker or warmer complexion, don’t be afraid to go bright with your blush.

‍
The most important thing is to give your blush a smooth texture. You can choose the blush formula that you prefer best – whether it’s a cream or a stain blush. These two options are usually the best for this trend as they give the illusion of a second skin. Look out for products like Glossier’s ‘Cloud Paint’ or the iconic ‘Benetint’ stain from Benefit.

‍
They’ll add colour to your cheeks and give you a radiant glow without making it look like you’re wearing makeup. Don’t forget to add a setting powder over your blush to pull everything together and keep it looking fresh all day long.

‍

‍
Blend, blend, blend

‍
The key to pulling off this makeup trend is all in how you blend your blush. If you’re using a cream formula, you want to apply the cool to your fingers before blending it onto your cheeks. Circular motions are the best way to work as it helps to give you an even finish. A fluffy brush can also help you blend the edges of your blush for a natural look.

‍
Go in with a concealer around your nose to avoid any discoloration that might occur. Doing this trick will make it look like your blush is deeper in your skin and more natural. If you want to create a glass-like complexion, a beauty blender can help you press the blush into your cheeks. Start from the apple of your cheeks before moving upwards towards the temples and down.
Give your skin a lustre finish

‍
Finishing off your makeup look is what will make or break this trend. A cream highlighter will take your look to the next level. The secret to creating a dewy glow is by looking for skincare-based products to used. The Watermelon Glow Dew Drops by Glow Recipe is the perfect way to finish off your makeup look. Focus it on the areas of your face where you would typically use a powder highlighter to add extra lustre to your face.

‍
Will you be trying this makeup hack during spring and summer? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: The warm weather is right around the corner. We’re all getting ready to shake up our beauty routines to get ready for spring and summer. A quick scroll through TikTok will tell you that the biggest beauty trend for summer is blush. This product has the power to transform your face by creating the illusion of a natural face lift. We’re sharing the beauty trend that everyone is talking about. With these steps, you’ll create a dewy, glowing look that makes it appear like you’ve just got back from a pilates class.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: Heartthrob Haircut, summer hair cut, summer hair style
meta-description: We’re sharing everything you need to know about this hair trend and how you can get ahead of the hottest hair trend for spring/summer 2022.
meta-title: The ‘90s Hairstyle Everyone Is Getting for Summer
name: The ‘90s Hairstyle Everyone Is Getting for Spring/Summer
post-body:
Every spring and summer, we want to shake up our look. It’s a time when you’ll see your friends starting to try out new trends and experimenting with their hair. This summer, it’s all about renewing who you are. It’s the first summer in a long time without lockdown restrictions. It’s an invitation to try something new and become your higher self.

One of the biggest trends for spring/summer 2022 is inspired by the ‘90s. We can thank TikTok – our favourite social media platform – for making us all fall back in love with the era. Like most beauty trends, TikTok is making us fall in love with the so-called ‘90s heart throb’ hairstyles inspired by the era’s coolest celebrities.

We’re sharing everything you need to know about this hair trend and how you can get ahead of the hottest hair trend for spring/summer 2022.

‍

Meet the 90s Heartthrob Haircut

‍
The secret to the 90s heartthrob haircut is to make it looked as lived in as possible. Think of the stars of the era and how they always looked like they had just come fresh from the beach. It’s all about creating structure with your hair to accentuate your natural features and create drama without putting in too much effort.

Celebrity hairstyle Mara Roszak – responsible for Nicole Kidman’s red carpet looks – gave the trend the ‘90s heartthrob’ name. She debuted the trend on Instagram with a photo of Mariah Krey rocking a short cool blonde bob with choppy layers and close-cropped layers that sat at the nap of the neck. What makes this look ‘90s inspired is its cheekbone-sweeping strands that frame the face.

The name is a nod to the inspiration behind the trend – Leonardo DiCaprio’s hair in the hit ‘90s film ‘Romeo + Juliet’. It’s not just a masculine hairstyle, its one that other stars of the ‘90s, including Gwyneth Paltrow and Cameron Diaz rocked.

‍

How to create the ‘90s Heartthrob Hairstyle

‍
It all starts with planning with the natural texture of your hair. This trick is something that every ‘90s heartthrob did. You want to take an individualized approach to your hair. While most hairstyles can be DIYed, this look is one that is worth sitting in the salon chair for.

If you have extensive texture to your hair, like structured ringlets or curls, you want to play with your cheekbones. When creating your bob, you want to keep the neckline as clean as possible to create the sharp lines that will accentuate the shape of your face and let your hair take centre stage.

Before you start cutting your hair, it’s a good idea to play around with a few different shapes to find which one works best with your hair texture. It’s worth experimenting with a wig first or create the illusion of a bob by pinning the underlayers of your hair to see what the finished look would be.

‍

‍
When you should try the ‘90s bob

‍
What we love about this hair trend is that it works for everyone. This bob is one of the most versatile of them all – as well as being low maintenance. If you look to keep your hair natural by letting it air dry, you want to invest in a styling oil to add extra shine and radiance to your hair, along with definition to your hair texture.

This spring and summer are the perfect time to try out the ‘90s bob. With temperatures starting to rise, most of us are considering chopping at least a few inches off our hair. It helps to make your hair more manageable – whether you’re spending the season on the beach or jetting off on vacation.

A short hair style is also a chance to try something new and start afresh. We’ve all heard the cliché, ‘change the hair, change the woman’. If you want to make a statement, look no further than this ‘90s-inspired hairstyle.

A relaxed chop for your ‘90s bob is one that will help you evolve your style. It’s the perfect way to blend a feminine and masculine style together with a silhouette that lets you explore your style. The versatility of this hairstyle means that it’s easy to wear with almost anything – whether you’re a fan of feminine dresses or a more laidback look.

While we’re all having a ‘90s moment, this hairstyle is becoming popular because of its effortlessness. It’s one that’s easy to maintain and that you don’t need to overthink.

What do you think of this ‘90s-inspired hair trend? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

This summer, it’s all about renewing who you are. It’s the first summer in a long time without lockdown restrictions. It’s an invitation to try something new and become your higher self.

meta-description: TikTok has made us all change up our beauty routine without needing a celebrity bank balance. There’s something for everyone on our list of the 10 viral TikTok
meta-title: 10 Viral TikTok Beauty Products to Buy In 2022
name: 10 Viral TikTok Beauty Products to Buy In 2022
post-body:
TikTok has inspired us all to make at least one impulse purchase in 2022. The platform is home to our favourite influencers and the social media that is setting all the trends for 2022. We can guarantee you that you’ve seen at least a few viral beauty products pop up on your FYP.

‍

‍

What we love about trending TikTok beauty products is that most are available at an affordable price point. While you’ll find splurge purchases like the Dyson Airwrap go viral, most products are at a more accessible price point – or come with amazing dupes for a fraction of the price.

‍
TikTok has made us all change up our beauty routine without needing a celebrity bank balance. There’s something for everyone on our list of the 10 viral TikTok beauty products that you should buy in 2022.

‍

Elf - Lip Gloss Stain

‍
TikTok went crazy for the Dior Lip Glow. With the product selling out internationally – and not set to come back in stock anytime soon – we’re glad the platform has found a budget-friendly alternative. The ELF Glossy Lip Stain is easy to apply and gives you long-lasting coverage with a little blotting. It’s the go-to lip product you’ll want in your beach bag this summer.

‍
Paula’s Choice - 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant

‍
If there’s one thing that TikTok loves, it’s skincare. Paula’s Choice is one of the most popular brands on the platform. Skincare by Hyram, one of the internet’s most popular skincare influencers, has raved about the brand’s 2% BHA Liquid Exfoliant. If it’s got the Hyram seal of approval, it’s an instant ‘add to cart’ for us. This product is a must-have for those with acne-prone or oily skin.

‍

‍Dyson Airwrap

‍
We couldn’t write a list of the 10 most popular viral TikTok products without mentioning the Dyson Airwrap. We can’t scroll through the app without finding someone showing off this must-have hair product. It’ll give you the bouncy blowout of your dreams. Want a cheaper alternative? The One-Step Styler by Revlon is still one of TikTok’s favourite hair products.

‍

‍Rare Beauty – Soft Pinch Liquid Blush

‍
Selena Gomez’s Rare Beauty is one of TikTok’s most raved about beauty brands. Not every celebrity finds success with their makeup range, but Selena has hit it out of the park. This liquid blush is the perfect way to create the ‘face-lifting flush’ trend and is a must-have for summer.

‍

‍Charlotte Tilbury – Hollywood Contour Wand

‍
Another brand that is all over TikTok is Charlotte Tilbury. One of the brand’s most sought after products is the Hollywood Contour Wand. A little product goes a long way thanks to its innovative applicator that gives you a sunkissed glow.

‍

‍NYX ‘Bare With Me’ Serum

‍
What we love about TikTok is that it’s inspired the beauty industry to focus on skin-care infused makeup products. NYX’s ‘Bare With Me’ is a medium coverage concealer inside a serum that is easy to apply and perfect for no-makeup days.

‍

‍
Essence – Glimmer Glow Lipstick

‍
Celebrate the end of face mask regulations with a new lipstick for your makeup bag. The Glimmer Glow Lipstick by Essence is inspired by the best of early 2000s beauty. What makes this lipstick different is that it works with your lips’ pH level to create a custom rose tint that complements your complexion.

‍

‍
Glow Recipe – Watermelon Skincare Range

‍
One of the first skincare brands to go viral on TikTok was the k-beauty inspired ‘Glow Recipe’ brand. While they have several skincare ranges within their brand, the Watermelon collection is their best-seller. Give the brand a try by picking up two of TikTok’s favourite products – the PHA + BHA Pore-Tight Toner and Niacinamide Dew Drops.

‍
CeraVe Renewing SA Cleanser

‍
A budget-friendly skincare brand that TikTok loves is CeraVe. It went viral thanks to Skincare by Hyram and has been going strong ever since. This affordable skincare brand has something for everyone and can help you build a full routine without breaking the bank. The brand’s most popular product is their renewing SA cleanser that is ideal for acne-prone skin.

‍
L’Oreal – Makeup Infallible 24HR Fresh Wear Liquid Longwear Foundation

‍
With its focus on skincare products, it’s no surprise that TikTok prefers lightweight foundations that sill pack a punch. The L’Oreal Infallible foundation is one of the most popular products on the platform with a budget friendly price tag.

Which of these TikTok approved beauty products will you be buying? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
