author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: nails, manicure trends, social media manicure
meta-description: Whether you prefer colourful manicures or like an understated look, these manicure trends offer something for everyone. Are you a wizard with nail polish?
meta-title: The Manicure Trends Ruling Social Media for 2022
name: The Manicure Trends Ruling Social Media for 2022
post-body:
The sky’s the limit with your manicure. There’s no easier way to tie a look together than by having your nails on point. With summer right around the corner, it’s the perfect time to book an appointment with your nail tech. It’s our favourite form of self-care and the perfect way to freshen up your look. We’re sharing some of our favourite manicure trends that are dominating social media for 2022.

Whether you prefer colourful manicures or like an understated look, these manicure trends offer something for everyone. Are you a wizard with nail polish? You could recreate most of these trends at home.

‍

‍

Half Moon

‍
If you’re a fan of a French manicure but want to try something new, look no further than the half-moon trend. It’s a quirky way to try something new without going too far out of your comfort zone. You can have fun with the colours that you choose. One of the most popular ways to do this trend is by using a metallic for the half-moon silhouette to make it pop.

‍

Colourful French Manicure

‍
Another manicure trend that you could try is the multi-colour French manicure. You can make this trend your own by incorporating your signature colours. If you want to make a splash with your manicure, use a different colour for each nail.

Even with manicure trends changing at the speed of lightening, the French manicure continues to reign supreme. The micro-French is one of the most popular trends for 2022 and incorporates waves and swirls into the classic tip look.

Negative Space

‍
A minimalistic manicure trend that you should start experimenting with is negative space. It’s a way to let your creativity unfold. Start by applying a glossy bottom coat before incorporating nail art into one side of your nail. Leave the other side of your nails plain before adding a top coat to give it a glossy finish.

‍

Polka Dots

‍
One of the most timeless manicure trends is polka dots. This look is feminine with a vintage feel. It’s also one of the easiest manicure looks to DIY at home. All you need is a thin tip brush and two colours of nail polish to create this look. Add a glossy top coat to pull it all together for a salon-worthy look.

‍

Hot Pink Everything

‍
Do you prefer to keep your manicure simple and minimalistic? You’re not alone. One of the biggest manicure trends for 2022 is just that. Instead of going all out with a nail art look keep it simple with one of the trending colours of the season. Hot pink is quickly becoming the colour of 2022 – especially with the colour becoming Rihanna’s go-to shade for your pregnancy.

‍

Checkerboard

‍
Another classic manicure trend making a comeback is checkerboards. You can give this iconic look an update for 2022 by using pastel shades to brighten up your look. This manicure trend may take a little trial and error to perfect at home.

‍

Swirls

‍
When you start experimenting with DIY manicures, swirls are a great place to start. While they look tricky, they’re easier than you think. Start by applying a small drop of different shades to your nail, before swirling them together using a wooden nail stick to give you the swirled look.

‍

Fresh Neutrals

‍
The polished neutrals that dominated manicure trends in 2021 aren’t going away quietly. This understated manicure look is ideal if you want to keep your look low-key and versatile. It’s the perfect choice for fans of the ‘clean girl’ aesthetic. Keeping your nails short, neat, and freshly polished with a nude shade is the perfect look for any occasion.

‍

Matcha Green

‍
Another one of the manicure colours of the year is matcha green. It’s a playful and quirky hue that is universally flattering. This shade is one we plan on rocking all summer long. Other shades to consider trying for your next manicure includes grass and pistachio for a Bottega inspired look.

‍

Micro Nail Art

‍
Perhaps the biggest manicure trend for 2022 is micro nail art. It’s an understated way to have fun with your nails without making too big of a statement. All you need is a nail dotting tool to create your favourite symbols – whether its flowers, dots, or hearts. This manicure is easy to recreate at home by using stickers if you want a salon-worthy look without using polish.

Which of these manicure trends will you be trying in 2022? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: The sky’s the limit with your manicure. There’s no easier way to tie a look together than by having your nails on point. With summer right around the corner, it’s the perfect time to book an appointment with your nail tech. It’s our favourite form of self-care and the perfect way to freshen up your look. We’re sharing some of our favourite manicure trends that are dominating social media for 2022.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: accessory, spring/summer accessory, shoes, bags, sunglasses
meta-description: We’re sharing the 10 accessory trends that are everywhere this season. Whatever your personal style is, we have an accessory for you.
meta-title: The 10 Accessory Trends to Know for Spring/Summer
name: The 10 Accessory Trends to Know for Spring/Summer 2022
post-body:
Whether you’re a fan of capsule closets or are a shopaholic, it’s time to treat yourself to some new accessories. For Spring/Summer 2022, it’s all about elevating your outfit with the right accessories. It’s not just investment bags that are gaining popularity this season. Many of our favourite luxury brands are looking back into their archives for inspiration for Spring/Summer 2022.

What we love about Spring/Summer 2022 accessory trends is that you can buy them new from store or look pre-loved. Some of the most sought-after bags and accessories from this year are re-issued or inspired items from older collections. Now is the perfect time to start building a timeless capsule closet.

We’re sharing the 10 accessory trends that are everywhere this season. Whatever your personal style is, we have an accessory for you.

‍

Sustainable accessories are top of the list

Every designer brand that you’ll look at this season is incorporating sustainability in some way. Instead of using traditional leathers, brands are choosing to look at vegan alternatives, particularly plant-based materials. Stella McCartney, one of the leading sustainable fashion brands, re-released their iconic ‘Frayme’ bag with a mushroom leather option.

They’re not the only ones turning to Mother Nature for inspiration. Gabriela Heart used a rubber derived from the hevea tree’s milk to create their latest sandals. Established luxury brands like Maison Margiela and Loewe have also released biodegradable and sustainable shoes.

‍

The Mary Poppins Bag

‍
Wave goodbye to the mini bag trend, it’s all about oversized bags that can hold everything but the kitchen sink. Instead of choosing a structured bag, look for one that is big enough to be a pillow. These ‘cozy bag’ accessories are the perfect choice for spring and summer, especially if you’re planning to travel. They’re bohemian chic meets functionality.

‍

Headpieces are back with a bang

‍
We’re looking to the roaring twenties for our next accessory trend. Just like the flappers, this accessory is all about headpieces. Whether it’s casual headbands or an extravagant fascinator, there’s a headpiece for every occasion. Everyone from Maison Margiela to Louis Vuitton incorporated headpieces into their recent runway collections.

‍

Add a platform

‍
The cliché “the higher the heel, the closer to heaven” is taking on a new life this season. Versace is inspiring us all to leave our sneakers behind with skyscraper platforms that will take you to new heights. Treat yourself to a pair of quirky heels that will be a statement accessory for any outfit.

‍

The Bracelet Bag

‍
Can you leave the house with nothing but your phone? This accessory is for you. The ‘Bracelet Bag’ is an accessory that brands like Louis Vuitton and Fendi have been trying to make stick for seasons. These bracelets feature miniature versions of their iconic bags and add a quirky feel to your summer closet.

‍

Retro-inspired Sunglasses

‍
It’s not spring and summer unless you treat yourself to a new pair of sunglasses. We’re throwing it back to the ‘60s and ‘70s with groovy sunglasses that add a vintage feel to every beach day look.

‍

Experiment with lace shoes

‍
One accessory that everyone loves is shoes. Once the temperatures start to rise, it’s time to bring out your favourite sandals and flats. Shop around and find a pair of lace-up sandals that you can wear with anything, whether it’s a mini dress or a bikini and coverup.

‍

Bucket bags are back

‍
Everywhere you look, brands are taking inspiration from the early ‘2000s. We’re so excited that bucket bags are – finally – making a comeback. These bags were originally designed to hold champagne bottles, a tradition we intend to continue this spring and summer. Everyone from Tory Burch to Louis Vuitton and Michael Kors have a bucket bag this season.

‍

‍

Embrace your inner Carrie Bradshaw

‍
The return of Carrie Bradshaw on our TV screen makes us all want to look back at the original SATC tv series. One of Carrie’s signature accessories was belts. This spring and summer you want to invest in a belt that you can wear with everything.

‍

Oversized and squishy shoes

‍
One of the most unique accessory trends for spring and summer is oversized shoes. This style is one that incorporates unexpected textures and transforms everyday styles into something unexpected.

Which of these accessories will you be adding to your closet for spring and summer 2022? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: wedding glow, wedding day facial, wedding skincare
meta-description: We’re sharing everything you need to know about how to get your wedding day glow – from when to start booking in treatments to which non-invasive products to us
meta-title: How to Get Your Wedding Day Glow
name: How to Get Your Wedding Day Glow
post-body:
Everyone wants to achieve that coveted ‘bridal glow’ for their wedding day. Nicola Peltz mastered the art of the wedding day glow at the wedding of the year to Brooklyn Beckham. Peltz-Beckham curated a wedding day that screamed ‘old Hollywood glamour’ – and it all started with the bride’s skin. Ahead of the big day, Vogue covered Nicola’s skin prep by interviewing her facialist, Lena Bratschi.

Not everyone has the bank balance of Peltz but that shouldn’t stop you from getting a wedding day glow. In the months before your wedding, you want to be working on your dewy, radiant glow. While you might be hitting the gym to get wedding-ready, you don’t want to forget about your skin.

We’re sharing everything you need to know about how to get your wedding day glow – from when to start booking in treatments to which non-invasive products to use. Read on to find out how you can recreate Nicola’s stunning bridal glow.

‍

Getting Your Skin Wedding-Ready

‍
Your wedding is all about getting everything ready in time. Most brides will choose their dress at least six months in advance, which is the same time when you want to start working on your skin. If you’re blessed with good skin, you may be able to work with just three months. In general, brides who have a skin condition – such as excess skin or acne – should give themselves six months to get their skin wedding ready.

‍
For the best results, you want to use a combination of traditional techniques with the latest skincare technology and treatments. You want to restore your skin to its natural radiance. In the months leading up to your wedding, you want to take a ‘skincare first’ approach to your beauty routine.
Putting the time and effort into your skincare will give you a glowing canvas for your makeup artist to work their magic. Just like starting a new workout routine, you want to start implementing a course of regular treatments.

‍

‍
Your Wedding Skincare Timeline

‍
Between 3 to 6 months before the big day, you want to start monthly treatments. You can choose from peels, needling, and facials to address your specific skincare concerns.

‍
Starting a few months in advance means you know how your skin will react to a treatment and prevent any tasty surprises just before the big day. Your final treatment should be a week or two before your wedding to give your skin time to recover, without losing the results of the treatment.

‍
Just like Nicola, you want to find a dermatologist or spa to work with to get your skin wedding ready. Nicola’s facialist shared with Vogue that she used LED therapy to give her skin a subtle sculpting effect, along with oxygen infusion to hydrate and nourish the skin. Her treatment also included cryogenic stem cells to promote cellular regeneration to restore the skin’s natural radiance. These modern treatments were incorporated with traditional techniques, such as facial muscle stimulation and lymphatic drainage.

‍

‍
Incorporate Facial Massages into Your Routine

‍
One treatment that every bride should be incorporating into their routine is facial massages. It’s a natural way to sculpt and tone your skin without turning to an invasive treatment. We recommend this treatment for brides as it’s easy to incorporate into your at-home routine.

If wedding stress starts getting to you, sit down and treat yourself to a facial massage. It will help boost your skin’s circulation and lymphatic system, maintaining the glow you’ve gotten from other treatments and products. A deeper facial massage will help to sculpt your muscles and boost the definition of your face. You can even book in for a massaged-based facial the day before the big event.

‍

How Skincare Makes Your Wedding Makeup Easier

‍
Taking care of your skin ahead of the big day doesn’t just give you a radiant glow, it helps your makeup go on flawlessly. Even if it’s only a few weeks till your wedding, putting time into your skin can give you a visibly brighter complexion. Makeup will always be there to help you conceal imperfection but stepping up your skincare routine will make your makeup artist’s job easier.

Caring for your skin means you can use a natural bridal look like Nicola choose. Her makeup focused on light sculpting to accentuate your cheekbones and facial structure – letting her skin’s natural glow do the rest of the work.

Are you a bride getting ready for her big day? What skincare treatments are you using? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

Peltz-Beckham curated a wedding day that screamed ‘old Hollywood glamour’ – and it all started with the bride’s skin. While you might be hitting the gym to get wedding-ready, you don’t want to forget about your skin.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: mascaras, brown mascaras, tiktok mascaras trend, summer makeup
meta-description: Brown mascara is a throwback to the early-2000s. If you’re a fan of ‘soft glam’, you need to pick up a brown mascara.
meta-title: The Brown Mascaras TikTok Is Loving Right Now
name: The Brown Mascaras TikTok Is Loving Right Now
post-body:
TikTok beauty trends are leading the industry right now. One of our favourites of the moment is an old trend that’s making a comeback thanks to TikTok. Brown mascara is a throwback to the early-2000s. It’s an alternative to your classic jet-black mascara that enhances your natural eyelashes with a subtle hint of drama without being over the top. If you’re a fan of ‘soft glam’, you need to pick up a brown mascara.

‍

‍

Brown mascara is the secret to getting the perfect ‘no makeup’ makeup look. If you want to be able to add a coat of mascara without worrying about the rest of your makeup, this is the shade for you. They’ll always give you a more natural look and create the same look as a lash lift or extensions, without spending the extra cash.

‍

‍
As well as being a more affordable alternative, these brown mascaras help to enhance your natural eye colour and add extra dimension to your look. It’s a soft way to accentuate your eyes without being too distracting. We’ve all seen someone go a little too over the top with their mascara. If you’re planning on rocking a brown mascara, don’t forget to pick up a similar shade of liner.

‍
Are you ready to jump on TikTok’s latest viral beauty trend? We’re sharing our 6 favourite brown mascaras that are all over TikTok right now. Our list contains a mixture of cult-favourites with more affordable alternatives to give you a soft glam look.

‍

Clinique High Impact Mascara

‍
One of the OG brown mascaras is Clinique’s ‘High Impact’ mascara. This brown shade will define your natural lashes and enhance your natural eye color. It’s universally flattering and the perfect alternative to the best-selling black shade. This formula is one of Clinique’s most popular and has been a long-term cult favourite due to its thickening and volumizing finish. It’s the perfect everyday mascara with a buildable formula that won’t budge throughout the day. You can easily layer it without causing your mascara to smudge.

‍
Maybelline New York Lash Sensational Mascara

‍
The first budget friendly mascara on our list is Maybelline’s Lash Sensational mascara. If you want a shade that is a brown-black hybrid, this is the mascara for you. It’s the perfect way to experiment with the TikTok trend without waving goodbye to your favourite black lashes.

‍
You only need one coat of this mascara to lengthen and volumise your natural lashes. The formula is buildable and ideal for those who want a more dramatic look by applying extra layers.

‍
Lancôme Hypnose Volumizing Mascara

‍
Another culture favourite mascara that’s available in a brown shade is Lancôme’s Hypnose Volumizing Mascara. It’ll give you the look of lash extensions with only one coat with ultimate length and volume. We love the long wand that means you can reach every lash with one sweep of the brush.

‍

‍
Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Push Up Lashes

‍
If you’re a fan of Charlotte Tilbury’s ‘soft glam’ makeup look, you want to treat yourself to the Pillow Talk Push Up Lash mascara. After the popularity of the original black shade, the brand quickly releases a berry-brown shade to jump on the TikTok bandwagon. The shade – ‘dream pop’ – is a warm brown mascara that will give you impossibly long lashes. As a universally flattering shades, it’ll be the perfect addition to your makeup bag.

‍
ELF Cosmetics – Big Mood Mega Volume & Lifting Macara

‍
When you’re shopping for a budget friendly mascara, don’t forget to check out ELF Cosmetics. The brand is famous for offering affordable alternatives to all the most popular products on TikTok. This mascara was a 2021 Allure ‘Best of Beauty’ winner and is one of the few mascaras that you can get amazing results from with a small price tag. Experiment with the espresso brown mascara that will instantly boost the curl, length, and volume of your lashes. Add a few extra coats for a falsies-inspired look.

‍
Tarte Maneater Mascara

‍
Another iconic brown mascara that is worth splurging on is Tarte’s ‘Maneater Mascara’. It’s another Allure Best of Beauty award winner. This formula adds just the right amount of drama to any makeup look with a true-brown shade that will make it look like you were blessed with amazing lashes. What makes this product so unique is its 500-bristle wand that lifts and curls your lashes without needing to use a traditional lash curler.  


Which of these mascaras will you be adding to your makeup bag? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

‍
post-summary: TikTok beauty trends are leading the industry right now. One of our favourites of the moment is an old trend that’s making a comeback thanks to TikTok. Brown mascara is a throwback to the early-2000s. It’s an alternative to your classic jet-black mascara that enhances your natural eyelashes with a subtle hint of drama without being over the top. If you’re a fan of ‘soft glam’, you need to pick up a brown mascara.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: makeup spring/summer, makeup 2022, makeup TikTok, makeup trends TikTok
meta-description: We’re sharing the makeup trends that you want to try for spring and summer 2022. Inspired by the best of TikTok beauty trends
meta-title: 10 Makeup Trends to Try for Spring/Summer 2022
name: 10 Makeup Trends to Try for Spring/Summer 2022
post-body:
With spring finally in bloom, it’s the perfect time to give your makeup bag a refresh. It’s out with the old and in with the new. For spring/summer 2022, the makeup trends are all about putting your skin first and not being afraid to make a statement with your makeup.

We’re sharing the makeup trends that you want to try for spring and summer 2022. Inspired by the best of TikTok beauty trends, this list is everything you need to know before going on your next makeup shopping trip.

‍

Don’t be afraid to glitter

‍
If there’s one trend that unites both fashion and beauty this season, it’s glitter. Don’t be afraid to incorporate a touch of glitter to every makeup look. Whether it’s a touch of glitter on your eyes or a shimmer lip gloss, this trend is one we’ll be rocking all spring and summer.

‍

Highly gloss lips

‍
One product that went viral on TikTok this year is the Dior Lip Glow – and several more affordable dupes. This makeup trend is one of the easiest to incorporates into your summer look and is effortlessly glamorous. Add a clear lipgloss to your makeup bag or use a lip tint as your go-to colour.

‍

Have fun with texture

‍
Texture is one of the biggest makeup trends right now. There’s something for everyone – whether you’re a fan of gloss, sparkle, or a chalky look. The key to recreating this makeup trend is to choose one aspect of your look to make a statement. This trick helps to balance out your look and give you a ‘wow’ factor without going too far out of your comfort zone.

‍

A colourful wing eyeliner

‍
If you want to have fun with your makeup look without changing too much of your look, grab a colourful eyeliner. You don’t have to experiment with an intricate shape or go too extreme. Keep it simple with a winged look and let the colour pop for itself. Jewel tones are one of our favourites for spring/summer 2022.

‍

Go bold with your blush

‍
One of the biggest trends for spring/summer 2022 is blush. It’s time to invest in a cream or liquid blush that will give your skin the ‘face-lifting flush’ effect. Blush is an easy way to add warmth to your face and give you a dewy glow. If you want to keep your look natural, choose a blush that is only two or three shades darker than the natural flush of your cheeks.

‍

Make a statement with a smoky eye

‍
For spring/summer 2022, it’s all about the smoky eye. This classic makeup trend is making a return as we finally get to experience a ‘normal’ summer post-pandemic. You can go as over-the-top as you want. Whatever smoky eye look you choose, take it to the next level by curling your lashes and using a lengthening mascara.

Don’t overlook the importance of a good base

‍
Spring/summer 2022 continues the ‘skincare first’ obsession that became popular on TikTok. Before you can refresh your makeup routine, you need to nail your skincare. Start every makeup look with a hydrating serum or moisturizer to give you a flawless base to help your foundation go on seamlessly. A hydrating primer will give your skin a dewy glow.

‍

‘70s-inspired earth tones

‍
If you’re giving your makeup bag a refresh, look out for earth tone shades that are inspired by the height of ‘70s party-girl glam. You can incorporate these colours into every aspect of your routine, from matte lipsticks to bright sunshine-inspired eyeshadows. Look out for classic shades like amber and caramel to add a subtle ‘70s-inspired look to your makeup.

‍

The Euphoria Makeup

‍
When a show goes viral like Euphoria, it’s no surprise when it starts setting makeup trends. You can thank TikTok for making the show’s iconic makeup looks go viral. With the roaring ‘20s 2.0 just around the corner, it’s the perfect time to look to Euphoria for some makeup inspiration. Take your summer festival look to the next level with chic crystals as part of your eye makeup. It’s an easy way for you to elevate any makeup look and guarantee yourself a spot on the best-dressed list.

‍

Luminous skin

‍
Even with beauty trends getting more extravagant, minimalist skin is still all the range. You want to invest in a lightweight foundation that only conceals what it needs to. This makeup trend is perfect for spring and summer as it gives your skin a chance to breathe as the temperatures start to rise.

Which of these makeup looks will you be experimenting with? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: With spring finally in bloom, it’s the perfect time to give your makeup bag a refresh. It’s out with the old and in with the new. For spring/summer 2022, the makeup trends are all about putting your skin first and not being afraid to make a statement with your makeup. We’re sharing the makeup trends that you want to try for spring and summer 2022. Inspired by the best of TikTok beauty trends, this list is everything you need to know before going on your next makeup shopping trip.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: Hailey Bieber’s Makeup Routine, Hailey Bieber’s beauty tips, Hailey Bieber’s daily makeup, Hailey Bieber’s skincare
meta-description: We’re sharing everything you need to know to steal Hailey Bieber’s signature makeup look. Whether you want to channel your inner supermodel or try something new
meta-title: How to Steal Hailey Bieber’s Signature Makeup Look
name: How to Steal Hailey Bieber’s Signature Makeup Look
post-body:
Hailey and Justin Bieber are one of the biggest celebrity couples right now. What we love about Hailey is her ability to look effortlessly chic, whether she’s on the red carpet or chilling between modelling duty. Her Instagram is full of stunning makeup looks that always hit the mark.

‍
She ticks every box, from her glowing skin to the perfect brows and her signature warm eyeshadow shades that brighten her face. If you want to try out a new makeup look, take a leaf from Hailey’s makeup bag.

‍
We’re sharing everything you need to know to steal Hailey Bieber’s signature makeup look. Whether you want to channel your inner supermodel or try something new, Hailey can teach us all something new to incorporate into our makeup routines.

‍

‍

Hailey Bieber’s go-to skincare products

‍
When it comes to Hailey’s makeup – it’s all about keeping it natural with a glossy finish and radiant glow. It’s simple and not over the top, but effortlessly chic. Hailey is famous for being a skincare fan, inspiring us all to take a ‘skincare first’ approach to our beauty routine.

‍
What we love about Hailey is that she isn’t afraid to share her beauty secrets to her legions of loyal fans. On social media, she’s shared that she uses a prescription-level retinoid to promote cellular turnover to prevent premature aging and diminish the appearance of fine lines. Another favourite product of Hailey’s is vitamin C to help brighten her complexion to create a dewy glow.

‍
One of her skincare secrets is a gentle moisturiser with a fragrance-free formula to avoid skin irritation. If Hailey is your beauty inspiration, look out for her beauty brand, ‘Rhode’, which is expected to include skincare products in the near future.

‍
If you want to find out more about Hailey’s routine, you’re in luck! The model has posted several everyday makeup tutorials online, including for BareMinerals – a brand that she’s a Clean Beauty Ambassador for. If you’re looking for date night inspiration, check out the separate tutorial that she did for BareMinerals here.

‍

‍

Creating Hailey’s Signature Makeup Look

‍
After giving your skin the hydration that it needs, you want to move onto your makeup. Hailey appears to be a fan of lightweight formulas, like tinted moisturisers and foundations. A sheer base is the perfect way to give your skin a duty glow and to let your natural skin shine through.

‍
Look for a foundation or base product that acts like a skincare treatment. The new ‘Plein Air Complexion Balm’ by Hermes is a lightweight product that brightens your skin’s complexion and has the benefit of being powered with SPF 30 for sun protection.

‍

‍
Most of Hailey’s makeup routine revolves around her eyebrows. If you’re recreating her makeup look, you want to try and keep the eye look as natural as possible. Cashmere and champagne shades will give you an easy wash of colour to accentuate your eyes without being too distracting. Keep it simple with a lengthening mascara. You can skip your eyeliner or keep it to a thin line to help define your eyes.

‍
One of the easiest things to recreate is Hailey’s signature feathery eyebrows. It’s the centre of her look and the secret to her effortless makeup. You want to start by sculpting and shaping your brows. A double-sided brush is your best friend as it can help you create the laminated brow look at home. The Brow Sculpt by Refy is a wax and gel hybrid that is easy to use on the go.

‍
Finish off your Hailey Bieber inspired makeup look with a lip stain or hydrating lip gloss that plumps your lips, adding an extra shine.

‍

‍

Hailey’s Top 10 Beauty Tips

‍
In a recent video for Allure, the model shared her 10 beauty tips:

‍
• On no-makeup days, brush your brows and go.
• Never under-estimate the importance of your skincare routine.
• Keep body lotion on hand – always.
• Keep your lips hydrated.
• Always make sure you look like a ‘glazed doughnut’ before you go to bed.
• SPF is not optional – always protect your skin.
• Use face tools for the spa and at home, including face rollers.
• Always – and she means always – double cleanse.
• Take care of your nails for a put-together look.
• Always make time for a relaxing bath to de-stress your skin.

‍
Now you know everything there is to know about Hailey’s beauty routine. Take these tips and tricks to create a Hailey-inspired routine.

‍
Are you a fan of Hailey Bieber’s Makeup Routine? Will you be recreating it at home? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: Hailey and Justin Bieber are one of the biggest celebrity couples right now. What we love about Hailey is her ability to look effortlessly chic, whether she’s on the red carpet or chilling between modelling duty. Her Instagram is full of stunning makeup looks that always hit the mark. She ticks every box, from her glowing skin to the perfect brows and her signature warm eyeshadow shades that brighten her face. If you want to try out a new makeup look, take a leaf from Hailey’s makeup bag.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: beauty trends 2022, Millieleer TikTok, makeup 2022 by Millieleer
meta-description: Read on to find out about the biggest beauty trends for 2022 – by TikTok’s viral beauty influencer, @millieleer.
meta-title: The 2022 Beauty Trend by @Millieleer
name: The 2022 Beauty Trend by @Millieleer
post-body:
TikTok is our go-to place for beauty inspiration. The social media platform has its finger on the pulse when it comes to the latest trend. If there’s anywhere that is calling the shot in the beauty industry right now, it’s TikTok. So, it should come as no surprise that we’ve turned to the viral video sharing app to help us predict the leading beauty trends for 2022.

We think this video by TikTok user @millieleer hits the nail on the head. The beauty trends she predicts as being winners for 2022 are ones we’re already starting to see dominate the industry. With over 770,000 followers and 27 million views, Mills is one of the leading beauty influencers on TikTok – and famous for her iconic eyebrows.

Read on to find out about the biggest beauty trends for 2022 –  by TikTok’s viral beauty influencer, @millieleer.

‍

‍

What is the ‘clean makeup’ look?

‍
The trend that Mills predicts will dominate the beauty industry in 2022 is the so called ‘clean makeup’ look. It’s a trend that’s similar to the aesthetic of brands like Glossier and Olaplex. This trend focuses on blurring instead of hiding your skin. It’s about ‘barely there’ makeup and accentuating your natural beauty through minimalistic makeup.

While skincare plays an essential role in perfecting this trend, Mills’ video focuses on how to create this 2022 beauty trend using makeup products. With over 101,000 likes on the video, it’s clear that Mills’ prediction for 2022’s biggest beauty trend has caught the attention of TikTok users everywhere.

‍

How to create the ‘clean makeup’ beauty trend

‍
The good news is that the ‘clean makeup’ trend is one you can re-create at home with products you’re almost guaranteed to already have in your makeup bag. It’s the perfect on-the-go look and the ultimate daily makeup routine for the “that” girl look.

What we love about the ‘clean makeup’ beauty trend is that it only requires a hand-full of products. It’s quick, easy, and affordable. You can jump on this makeup trend as a beginner or a makeup aficionado.

Mills offers a look into how she creates her signature ‘clean makeup’ look by sharing a quick step-by-step tutorial on your video. You can probably re-create the tutorial at home in the same time that it takes you to read this article.

We’re breaking down Mills’ makeup tutorial for the ‘clean look’ trend down step-by-step.

‍

Use a skin tint and highlight

‍
Kickstart your makeup routine by using a skin tint in a shade that compliments your natural skin tone. Alternatively, you can use a buildable foundation that offers a light-to-medium coverage. A tinted moisturiser is also another option you can use here. You want to avoid using any kind of formula that is heavy on your skin or offers full coverage. Look out for formulas that offer a built-in highlighter or add a pump of liquid highlighter to your skin tint to give you skin a luminous glow. You want to give your skin a healthy, dewy glow that unlocks its inner radiance.

Minimal concealer

‍
Resist the temptation to cover every blemish on your face. You want to keep your concealer to a minimal and focus it on your problem areas. Work it around your under-eyes to help brighten your complexion and make you appear more awake.

The placement of your concealer is important here. Focusing it upwards and at an angle to your outer-crease will help to naturally lift your face and give you the illusion of slimmer cheeks. You can use a beauty blender for a natural finish.

Liquid contour

‍
You want to avoid powder products as much as possible as they can clog your pores and give your makeup a cakey texture. Invest in a liquid contour for a more natural look and blend it across your inner cheekbones and forehead using a beauty blender.

Reverse nose contour

‍
Using your liquid contour and concealer, experiment with the reverse nose trend. This technique evolves applying your contour first and blending it out before adding concealer to highlight your nose. By doing these steps in reverse, it focuses the attention on the area you’re brightening.

Liquid blush

‍
Grab a liquid blush to add a little colour to your cheeks, using your handy beauty blender to give the illusion of a natural flush to your cheeks.

Mascara and lashes

‍
Add a coat of lengthening mascara before applying natural wispy lashes.

What do you think of @millieleer’s prediction for the biggest beauty trend of 2022? Is the ‘clean look’ a makeup trend you’ll be trying? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: TikTok is our go-to place for beauty inspiration. The social media platform has its finger on the pulse when it comes to the latest trend. If there’s anywhere that is calling the shot in the beauty industry right now, it’s TikTok. So, it should come as no surprise that we’ve turned to the viral video sharing app to help us predict the leading beauty trends for 2022.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: Sami Clarke, influencer, TikTok, social, lifestyle
meta-description: We’re sharing a few of our favourite self-care TikTok videos by Sami to give you an idea of how you can incorporate her tips into your daily routine.
meta-title: Self-Care with Tik Tok’s Sami Clarke
name: Self-Care with Tik Tok’s Sami Clarke
post-body:
2022 is the year that we get serious about our self-care routine. As the world starts to get back to normal after the chaos of the pandemic, it’s time to put ourselves first. Self-care can feel overwhelming at first. It’s not like your skincare routine with a structure or products to use. Your self-care is what you make it.

That’s why we love to use TikTok for inspiration. The beauty of your self-care routine is that it’s all about you. It means you can focus on what makes you happy, whether it’s kickstarting a fitness routine or learning how to cook healthy recipes. Whatever your preferences are, we’ve got one TikTok user you need to be following.

‍

‍

Meet Sami Clarke (@sami_clarke on TikTok). This influencer has over 215k followers and more than 2.8 million like son her profile. Her platform is all about sharing health, fitness, and wellness related content. Sami also shares meal plans and workouts to make your self-care routine as stress-free as possible. You can follow her YouTube page – with over 400k subscribers – here.

We’re sharing a few of our favourite self-care TikTok videos by Sami to give you an idea of how you can incorporate her tips into your daily routine.

‍

Start with a healthy breakfast

‍
Breakfast is the most important meal of the day. Not only does it nourish your body, but it also sets you up for the day ahead. Every day is a chance to reset your life and tick-start your wellness routine.

We love this video from Sami as it shows 5 breakfast ideas that you can easily create at home. You’ll see everything from breakfast tacos to protein smoothies, chia seed pudding, egg and avocado toast, and banana egg pancakes. It’s proof that breakfast can be your favourite meal of the day.

‍

Take yourself on a date

‍
If there’s anything Sami Clarke could tell you to do, it’s to start dating yourself. It might feel like a foreign concept, but ‘dating yourself’ is a core part of her self-care routine. This mentality is all about prioritizing yourself and your needs.

Prioritize spending time with yourself by taking yourself on a date. Speak to yourself like you speak to the people you love. Treat your mind, body, and soul the way that you treat the people you love. Dating yourself is a state of mind – and one that should be at the heart of your self-care.

‍

Get in a 5-minute workout

‍
While we want to be aiming for 30 minutes of exercise a day, any exercise is better than none. Sami promotes exercising and fitness as a core part of her self-care routine. Getting in a few minutes of exercise can help you to de-stress and focus on your mind on the task at hand.

We love this short 5-minute workout routine from Sami Clarke as it’s quick and easy to follow. You don’t need any equipment and can do it in the office or your bedroom. It’s the perfect way to wake your body up in the morning and give yourself a refresh on your lunch break.

‍

Remember that it’s okay to have an off day

‍
One of the most important parts of your self-care journey is to realise that it’s okay to have off days. You want to remember that social media is simply a highlight reel – especially for big influencers like Sami.

In this self-care video, Sami shares a few of her tips on how to accept and overcome an off day. She recommends reaching out to ask for support from the people you love, whether it’s your best friend of sister. Instead of beating yourself up, do something nice for yourself. It could be as simple as going to a movie or grabbing your favourite Starbucks drink.

Most importantly, let yourself feel your emotions and embrace them. And it’s more than okay to put on your ‘sad girl’ playlist, drive around with the windows down, and sing to your heart feels happier.

‍

Manifest what you want

‍
Sami is a firm believer in the art of manifesting. If you’ve ever been on TikTok, the chances are that you’ve seen at least one video talking about this form of meditation. Manifesting is the personification of “if you can dream it, you can be it”. It’s about telling the universe what you want and acting like you already have it.

This manifesting POV on Sami’s channel shares a sneak peek into her daily routine while travelling. It shows her meditating, working out, enjoying wholesome food, and exploring nature. Start living the life you want today by manifesting.

Which of these self-care videos by Sami Clarke will you be incorporating into your regular routine? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: 2022 is the year that we get serious about our self-care routine. As the world starts to get back to normal after the chaos of the pandemic, it’s time to put ourselves first. Self-care can feel overwhelming at first. It’s not like your skincare routine with a structure or products to use. Your self-care is what you make it. That’s why we love to use TikTok for inspiration. The beauty of your self-care routine is that it’s all about you. It means you can focus on what makes you happy, whether it’s kickstarting a fitness routine or learning how to cook healthy recipes. Whatever your preferences are, we’ve got one TikTok user you need to be following.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: sneakers, shoes, sneakers trends 2022, flat shoes
meta-description: We’re sharing some of the most popular sneakers for 2022 that you can expect to see all over your Instagram feed in the coming weeks and months.
meta-title: The Most Stylish Sneakers for 2022
name: The Most Stylish Sneakers for 2022
post-body:
Sneakers are our ride or die. There’s no other shoe that make us look as stylish – and comfortable – as the humble sneaker. With athleisure trends still going strong for 2022, it’s the perfect time to invest in a pair of stylish sneakers for your everyday closet. They’re the shoe that you’ll get the ultimate cost per wear from. Sneakers work for every season and every outfit – from a maxi dress to a pantsuit or a beach coverup.

‍

‍

Sneakers aren’t only for the weekend. We’re finding ourselves reaching for our sneakers now more than ever. The pandemic has made working remotely more popular, meaning most of us aren’t doing our daily commute. Most of us are trying to get out for the day on a so-called ‘rich mom walk’ or a ‘silly little walk’.

Whether you’re running errands, going to work, or taking a stroll, you want your sneakers to be comfortable without compromising on style. We’re sharing some of the most popular sneakers for 2022 that you can expect to see all over your Instagram feed in the coming weeks and months.

‍

Everlane – the trainer

‍
Everlane is the ultimate brand for basic – but versatile – pieces that you’ll wear every day. Their signature sneakers are designed to be worn every day. What we love about these sneakers is that they’re made using full-grain leather from a gold-certified tannery, meaning it has the lowest environmental impact of any leather shoe. These shoes are kind to your feet – and our planet.

‍

Koio – Metro sneakers

‍
You can never go wrong with a classic white sneaker. The ‘triple white’ colour is our favourite from Koio and sits at a mid-tier price point that gives you a splurge purchase without breaking the bank. These sneakers are handmade in Marche, Italy and are lined with recycled cotton-terry fabric for extra comfort.

‍

‍

APL Athletic Black Streamline Rubber-Trimmed Ripstop

‍
Do you prefer a sneaker with a more activewear look? Check out this unisex style from APL Athletic. Their sleek silhouette and athleisure-inspired look makes them a more classic that will fit seamlessly into any closet. The ‘Streamline’ sneakers are lightweight and ideal for running – whether it’s errands or a 5k.

The sneakers include the brand’s ‘AeroLux’ ripstop for breathability and a chunky ‘FutureFoam’ sole for extra comfort. They also feature an innovative ‘souffle’ sockliner for extra security.

‍

‍

Nike Waffle Racer Crater Low-Top Suede and Textile Trainers

‍
No list of stylish sneakers is complete without mentioning Nike. While the brand is famous for their running shoes, you’ll also find more wearable everyday styles. The ‘waffle racer crater’ are one of the most unique styles launched by the brand in recent years.

These mesh and suede sneakers use repurposed materials to create a sleek profile and a signature sole that gives you a smoother step and guarantees you a spot on the best dress list.

Adidas x Prada Neoprene and Mesh Sneakers

‍
Do you feel like making a splurge purchase? Adidas and Prada are back for their second collaboration with these minimalistic sneakers. They’re inspired by the ‘America’s Cup’ sneakers once produced by Prada – but are made with neoprene and mesh to give them a futuristic look.

These sneakers are the perfect opportunity to get your hands on one of the most exciting footwear collaborations of recent seasons. They’re selling fast though, so grab them while you can!

‍

‍

Veja + Net Sustain Rio Branco Leather-Trimmed Suede and Mesh Sneakers

‍
Veja is one of the most talked about sneaker brands for 2022. If you’re looking for sustainable sneakers, you’ve come to the right place. Veja is committed to manufacturing their sneakers without harming the planet. The ‘Rio Branco’ style is made using their innovative Alveomesh fabric that is made using 100% recycled plastic bottles. The panels of the sneakers are made with water-repellent suede and leather, along with rubber soles that are sourced from the Amazon rainforest.

These sneakers are available in two neutral colour palettes and are part of a collaboration with Net-a-Porter for their ‘net sustain’ campaign.

‍

New Balance 574 Trainers

‍
We couldn’t finish off this list without mentioning a pair of New Balance sneakers. The brand is amongst the most recognisable in the world – and for good reason. The ‘574’ style was first introduced in 1988 and has been given a contemporary upgrade with TENCEL lyocell textile, chrome-free suede, and an EVA foam heel.

Which of these sneakers will you be adding to your closet in 2022? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

With athleisure trends still going strong for 2022, it’s the perfect time to invest in a pair of stylish sneakers for your everyday closet. They’re the shoe that you’ll get the ultimate cost per wear from. Sneakers work for every season and every outfit – from a maxi dress to a pantsuit or a beach coverup.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: beauty trends, beauty 2022, skincare trends 2022, beauty industry 2022
meta-description: We’re rounding up a few of the trends that are set to dominate the beauty industry for 2022.
meta-title: Beauty Trends That Will Explode in 2022
name: Beauty Trends That Will Explode in 2022
post-body:
The beauty industry has been undergoing a major change in recent years. The pandemic saw us all wave ‘goodbye’ to a full-face of makeup with apps like TikTok becoming leaders in creating – and ending – beauty trends. Spotting trends early can help you see which products to add to your makeup bag and which viral content to look out for.
‍

In the age of ‘skin-first’ makeup, where the industry is continuing to evolve in every way, from its ingredients to its outlook on gender roles, trends are becoming even easier to spot. We’re rounding up a few of the trends that are set to dominate the beauty industry for 2022.

‍

Skincare continues to reign supreme

‍
2021 was the year we all put our skin first. The obsession with ‘skinimalism’ and focusing on skincare products over makeup products is set to continue. This 2022 beauty trend is all about taking an intuitive approach to your daily routine, giving your skin what it needs by prioritising quality products over quantity.

‍
Rising pollution levels, aggressive products, mask wearing, and the stress of the pandemic has all left our skin worse for wear. With skincare finding a second life in the world of wellness, we can expect to see skincare continue to reign supreme in 2022.

‍
If you’ve been kickstart your skincare routine – 2022 is the year for you. Start by looking out for products that incorporate both skincare and makeup elements, like the cult-favourite Dior coloured lip balm or their Forever Foundation that is packed full of skincare ingredients.

‍

‍
Sustainability gets simplified

‍
Every industry is going through calls to become more environmentally sustainable – with the beauty industry being no exception. If you’re a fan of environmentally friendly brands, you’ll know that many get accused of greenwashing. The lack of regulation around terms like ‘vegan friendly’ has led to calls for a simplified approach to sustainability.

‍
In 2022, you can expect to see brands become clearer and more transparent about their sustainability claims. At the same time, you can expect to see sustainable beauty products become more accessible as demand grows. It’s hard to walk into a department store or pharmacy without spotting at least one recycling deposit for returning used makeup containers.

‍
2022 is the year that we’re being kind to our skin and the planet by educating ourselves on sustainability and implementing it into your product selection.

‍

Male grooming is an unexpected winner

‍
The beauty industry isn’t only for women. It’s for every body – whatever gender (if any) that they identify by. One niche within the industry that’s making unexpected gains is the male grooming industry – which is redefining the idea of masculinity. With celebrities like Harry Styles and Machine Gun Kelly making us question what masculinity really is, it’s no surprise to see beauty brands cashing in on the growing industry amongst men for beauty and self-care products.

‍
Don’t be surprised when you see more male faces appearing in beauty adverts and leading brands launching grooming products for men – or adopting unisex labelling. With Gen Z’s bold positivity, there’s no limit on where this beauty trend could go.

‍

‍
Beauty, health, and oral care become one

‍
A few years ago, beauty, health, and oral care fit nicely into their own individual boxes. Now, these industries largely fall under the idea of ‘wellness’ – with the lines blurring for where one niche starts and the other ends.

‍
During 2022, you can expect to see this trend take on a new life as the beauty industry and wellness come together for a health-driven approach to self-care. More beauty stores than ever are stocking wellness products like CBD-oils, self-care items like sensual candles, and health products, like daily collagen vitamins. As the beauty industry evolves to adopt to the growing self-care mindset, we’re looking forward to seeing how mainstream brands adapt.

‍

‍
Tech grows from strength-to-strength

‍
Tech is transforming how makeup products are bought and sold every day. In 2022, one of the biggest beauty trends will be the growth of beauty tech. This trend isn’t about expensive airbrushing apps, it’s all about how brands leverage tech to set themselves apart from the competition by creating immersive experiences for their customers.

‍
The Inkey List already offer a ‘myINKEY’ feature that helps you access the state of your skin, while the popular period-tracking app, Clue, is working in partnership with L’Oreal to provide skincare advice that is personalised to your hormones and period cycle.

‍
One piece of tech that you can expect to see more of in 2022 within the beauty industry is the metaverse.

‍
Which of these 2022 beauty trends are you most looking forward to exploring? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: The beauty industry has been undergoing a major change in recent years. The pandemic saw us all wave ‘goodbye’ to a full-face of makeup with apps like TikTok becoming leaders in creating – and ending – beauty trends. Spotting trends early can help you see which products to add to your makeup bag and which viral content to look out for.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: calming apps, wellness, meditation apps, sleeping apps
meta-description: We’re sharing five calming apps that we’ve downloaded for 2022 to kickstart our wellness journey.
meta-title: The Calming Apps We’ve Downloaded for 2022
name: The Calming Apps We’ve Downloaded for 2022
post-body:
The last year years have been stressful. After all, none of us expected to live through a pandemic. It’s easy to feel anxious, unsettled, and overwhelmed. With the uncertain world that we live in, self-care and wellness have never been more important. These trends are a lifestyle approach that we’re seeing across the industry. Whether it’s our skincare, eating habits, or the podcasts we’re listening to, we’re all trying to find ways to incorporate peace and tranquillity into our day.

It’s no surprise that some of the most popular apps of 2022 were ones that promoted wellness and encouraged users to bring a sense of calm into their day. Downloading one of these apps can help you bring structure to your daily wellness routine and give you easy ways to practice self-care.

‍

‍

We’re sharing five calming apps that we’ve downloaded for 2022 to kickstart our wellness journey. These apps are the perfect toxic for getting you through the final weeks of winter and back in control of your mental health.

Calm

‍
If you’re new to the world of wellness and guided meditation, ‘Calm’ is the perfect place to start. This app is one you’ve likely come across on social media – especially with celebrities like Harry Styles involved. The app is packed full of treasures to help you to de-stress and relax throughout the day. It contains relaxing music tracks and mindful meditations.

What ‘Calm’ is most commonly used for is its popular ‘Sleep Stories’. You can think of them as adult bedtime stories read by some of the most recognisable celebrity voices.  When you download the app, you can choose to focus on improving your sleep quality, reducing stress or anxiety, improving your focus, or improving yourself.

Pause

‍
As the name suggests, Pause is an app that’s all about creating moments of calm in your day. This app is straightforward and easy to use – encouraging you to place your finger on the screen and gently moving it around in a guided meditation that makes you feel instantly calmer. As a daily mindfulness app, Pause can help you boost your focus, energy, and clarity.

This calming app is one that you can use on your daily commute or for moments when you start to feel overwhelmed or stressed out. It’s our go-to for days when we need to disconnect and calm our mind. Pause has won dozens of awards, including being named ‘pick of the week’ by Starbucks and ‘best of the app store’ by Apple.

Mindicine

‍
Mindicine is an app that focuses on using sound frequencies to stimulate the five different types of brain waves. While this might sound very scientific, it’s all about engaging certain parts of your brain to allow you to focus and relax. The alpha, beta, gamma, delta, and theta brain waves can be used to help lower your anxiety, boost your focus, improve sleep, and even tackle your lack of creativity.

What we love about this app is that it allows you to create custom session lengths – giving you the freedom to listen to this guided meditation for a time that works for you. You can set the session to any time from 5 minutes (perfect for an instant de-stress) or 8 hours (ideal for a sleep session). Best of all, the app is free!

Noisli

‍
We’re all familiar with the idea of birds chirping and whale music being relaxing – but have you thought of giving thunder a try? Noisli is a calming app that uses the sounds of nature to help calm and focus our minds. It’s backed up by research from the Brighton and Sussex Medical School that suggests nature sounds – including thunder – can help to physically alter our mental states.

Noisli works by creating a custom blend of nature sounds to address specific goals – whether you want to relax and de-stress or focus on a project. This app provides the perfect background noise to “keep you sane, improve your focus, and boost your productivity”.

Happy Not Perfect

‍
Are you looking for a calming app that is more interactive? We’ve got you! Why not try out ‘Happy Not Perfect’? This app was developed by a team of professionals, including a psychotherapist and neuroscientist.

What makes this app unique is that it creates a daily routine for every user that is curated to their situation and mood. Its purpose is to help you relax, release stress, and create moments of peace in your day. You’ll discover breathing exercises and mini games to give your mind a mental workout.

Which of these calming apps will you be download? Tell us about your wellness routine below!

‍

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: makeup trend 2022, tiktok makeup trends 2022, make up 2022
meta-description: The beauty industry in 2022 is all about getting out of your comfort zone, trying something new, and being your most authentic self.
meta-title: Makeup Trends Everyone is Talking About for 2022
name: Makeup Trends Everyone is Talking About for 2022
post-body:
New year. New me. If that sounds like you, then you’re probably thinking of shaking up your makeup look. February is when we start to see the trends for the year come out in full force. What we’re loving about 2022 is that there’s no fixed ‘theme’ for beauty trends this year. In past years, all eyes have been on skincare and self-care as we grappled with the pandemic.

Fast forward to 2022 and it’s a mixture of low-key ‘natural’ makeup and all-out glittery eyeshadow. Whatever your makeup aesthetic is, you’re guaranteed to find a trend that will catch your eye. The beauty industry in 2022 is all about getting out of your comfort zone, trying something new, and being your most authentic self. It’s also about sticking to makeup trends that you enjoy by putting your self-care and wellness first.

‍

‍

Read on to find out all about the 2022 makeup trends that everyone is talking about – including our top product recommendations.

The dewy, glowing look

‍
If there’s one 2021 makeup trend that we’re taking into this year, it’s the luminous makeup look. With all the focus on a so-called “skin-first” approach, it’s no surprise that this trend is taking on a new life in 2022. This year’s makeup trends are all about adding a glossy texture to your skin – and not just your lips. It’s time to rediscover your favourite highlighter and give your skin a radiant, ‘lit from within’, look. Feel like splurging? Check out the Gucci ‘Eclat de Beaute’ gel face gloss.

‍

Natural, effortless brows

‍
Another trend we’re taking into 2021 from last year is soap brows. We’re still obsessing over this natural and effortlessly chic look that is easy to recreate at home. It’s all about focusing on a feathered look to your brows that makes them appear full and fluffy. Don’t worry. You don’t need to use an actual soap to create this look. Anastasia Beverly Hills’ ‘tinted brow gel’ is one OG eyebrow product that we’re rediscovering for 2022.

‍

A light-handed approach to foundation and concealer

‍
With all the focus on skincare, it’s no surprise that 2022 is another year of skipping the heavy complexion products. Beauty brands like Glossier are still dominating the industry, getting us all to fall back in love with our skin. One makeup trend for 2022 that you want to incorporate into your daily routine is taking a light-handed approach to your foundation and concealer.

Skip the four-step routine of face products and use a buildable foundation and lightweight concealer that you can use to blur instead of hiding your imperfections. It can also help to switch out your makeup brushes – such as using an angled makeup brush for your concealer instead of a beauty blender.

‍

A glow to your cheeks

‍
This makeup trend picks up from the luminous complexion that we’ve already talked about. Blush is one product that we’ve all been guilty of forgetting about – especially when contouring was all the rage. For 2022, it’s go big or go home with bush. Adding a hit of colour to your face can give you a healthy, glowing complexion. If you want to create a dewy look, shop around for a crème blush that matches the natural flush of your cheeks. Glossier’s ‘cloud paint’ blushers are easily buildable and universally flattering.

‍

Experiment with eyeliner

‍
2022 trends aren’t all about sticking to natural tones. Experimental eyeliner was one of the biggest viral trends on TikTok in 2021 – and for good reason!  Switching out your black eyeliner for a bolder shade can instantly transform your look by adding something unexpected. Urban Decay’s 24/7 Glide-On Eye Pencil is the OG choice for coloured eyeliner and comes in a myriad of shades for you to choose from.

‍

Pink lipstick

‍
After two years of wearing masks, it’s time to rediscover our love for lipstick. One share that everyone is talking about for 2022 is bright pink. The shade is expected to dominate makeup trends this year – stretching from light hues of rose to bold shades of fuchsia pink. Choose a pink lipstick that flatters your skin tone and matches your personality. Trust us. Once you find your perfect shade, you’ll want to buy an emergency backup.

One makeup brand that is famous for its pink lipsticks is Charlotte Tilbury. While Pillow Talk is the brand’s signature shade, you can choose from several pink shades within their collection, including the iconic ‘Miss Kensington’.

‍
Which of these 2022 makeup trends will you be trying out? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

It’s also about sticking to makeup trends that you enjoy by putting your self-care and wellness first.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83

meta-title: ‘That Girl’ Hairstyles by Tiktoker @Stxph.h
name: ‘That Girl’ Hairstyles by Tiktoker @Stxph.h
post-body:
‘That Girl’ Hairstyles by Tiktoker @Stxph.h

2022 is the year we’re finally going to master the ‘that girl’ look. If there’s one part that we struggle it, it’s the hair. That’s where TikTok comes in. It’s never been easier to learn how to create a celebrity-worthy hairstyle than with TikTok. We’ve search high and low across our favourite video sharing app to find the ultimate hair tutorial to share with you.

That’s how we landed on Steph Hui’s video. If you want to create the “that girl” look, she’s got you covered. Her quick TikTok video on easy hairstyles for the “clean and expensive” look offers something for everyone – whatever your personal style. It’s packed full of hairstyles you could imagine Zendaya, Kendall Jenner, or Bella Hadid rocking.

‍

‍

Read on to find out more about these easy hairstyles that look “clean and expensive” – and how you can recreate them at home. These three hairstyles are ones we’ll be rocking all of spring/summer 2022.

‍

Middle part sleek updo

‍
The first hairstyle that Steph shares is also one of the easiest to recreate at home. It’s the classic ‘off-duty’ supermodel chic look that you can wear for a lazy day or running errands.

The trick to creating this look is by getting your hair wet. You want to pick up an inexpensive spray bottle that you fill with water to quickly damp your hair. You only need a few sprays to get your hair wet enough for this look.

Pull your hair back into a seek bun, making sure that you focus on your middle parting. It usually helps to use a brush with denser bristles to flatten your hair and make your middle parting stand out.

The sleekness for this look comes from using ponytail. Take a generous amount in your hands before applying it directly to your hair, working backwards to flatten any lumps or bumps.

Pull out a small strand of hair from each side of your hair. Ideally, this hair should fall around lip-length, but it’ll depend on the length of the layers in your hair. Take a little bit of hair gel to emphasis the shape of the loose strands.

You can use a hair claw to twist your ponytail into a bun for an effortlessly chic look. This clean and expensive hairstyle works for both short and long-hair, so long as you can get it into the hair claw.

‍

Sleek long braided ponytail

‍
This hairstyle is Sansa Stark meets Ariana Grande. Start by brushing your hair back into a ponytail with a middle part. While Steph uses a ponytail hair piece in this video, it’s an optional extra to add extra length and thickness to your hair. You can skip it if you prefer a more natural and easier look.

Start braiding your hair into a traditional 3-part braid French plait. You can add a little extra to your hair by finishing off the braid with a scrunchie or by placing a statement hair clip into your hair.

This hairstyle is best for long hair as you’ll have the freedom to create a more dramatic braid.

‍

Side part sleek updo

‍
Embrace your inner supermodel chic with this side-part sleek updo. This hairstyle is ideal for days when you don’t have time to blowdry your hair. Take your wet hair and section out the side part, holding it in place with a large hair clip.

Brush the rest of your hair in place and create a ponytail. Use the same L’Oreal hair gel from before to give you a sleek look by removing any bumps and flattening your hair – it also helps to add an extra touch of shine to your hair.

Remove the hair clip from your side parting and take a small bristle brush to brush-out your fringe, bringing it down behind the back of your ear. You can use a bobby pin to hold it in place before adding an extra touch of hair gel to keep it looking sleek.

You can leave your hair in a ponytail or give the hairstyle a ‘90s-inspired look by adding a statement hair claw. You want to wrap your ponytail around your finger to create a bun before securing it in place with the hair claw. Play around with the excess hair until you have several strands sticking out from the top of the hair claw to give the illusion of curls.

Which of these ‘clean and expensive’ hairstyles by Steph will you be recreating at home? What are your ultimate hairstyle tips? Leave them in the comments below!

‍

We’ve search high and low across our favourite video sharing app to find the ultimate hair tutorial to share with you.

meta-title: Valentine’s Day Makeup Ideas from TikTok
name: Valentine’s Day Makeup Ideas from TikTok
post-body:
Valentine’s Day is right around the corner. It’s a time to show yourself some love, indulge your creative side, and allow your passions to flourish. Valentine’s Day is one of our favourite times of year – and not just for all the heart-shaped candy. It’s a time when our social media feeds are filled with some of the most creative makeup looks of the year.

Whether you’re celebrating Galentine’s Day or a romantic Valentine’s Day with your partner, you want to give your makeup a quirky twist for the holiday. We’ve turned to our favourite video-sharing platform, TikTok, to find the best Valentine’s Day makeup ideas that you can recreate at home.

Grab your makeup bag. These beauty looks are ones you’ll want to start wearing right away and for the rest of spring and summer 2022.

Valentine’s day makeup for the baddies

‍
Do you consider yourself a ‘baddie’? Are you someone who isn’t afraid to be outspoken and the centre of attention? We’ve got the Valentine’s Day makeup looks for you. TikTok user @thaisoffiicial has put together a compilation of the best and most original makeup looks for the holiday.

The collection of photos is the perfect place to start if you want out-of-the-box inspiration for something different to try this year. While each look is different, there’s a few obvious trends. Bold eyeliner is a must-have, while coloured mascara is having a moment. Don’t be afraid to experiment with pink eyeshadow and keep the focus on your eyes by incorporating hearts into your makeup look.

‍

Heart eyes makeup look

‍
Have you fallen in love with the heart eyes aesthetic? It’s easy to think that you need to be an artist to recreate this look at home. Trust us. It’s a lot easier than you think. TikTok user @sourandnasty shared a tutorial on TikTok that breaks down the intricate eye makeup look into easy steps.

All you need is a pale pink eyeshadow and two shades of pink eyeliner. Start by applying the pink eyeshadow across your lids before flicking it out from your lower lash line. Take a small eyeliner brush (or paint brush_ and start to create small heart shapes across your inner corner and outer corner. Layer over these hearts with hearts of the same size in a darker fuchsia pink. You can add extra dimension by adding a third set of hearts with a white eyeliner.

‍

A luminous glow

‍
Are hearts a little too far out of your comfort zone? Not everyone wants to embrace the anime character look for Valentine’s Day. Instead, why not try this makeup tutorial by @daniellemarcan. What we love about it is the fact that it takes the luminous glowy trend and gives it a romantic twist with a bold blush and lip colour.

You want to pay attention to your contouring and highlighting to sculpt your face before using a blush contour using the ‘draping’ method. Your blush should be bold and clearly visible – similar to stage makeup. Finish off your look with a thick winged cat-eye and a glossy red lip. You can add false lashes for an extra sense of drama.

‍

All eyes on your heart

‍
Valentine’s Day is a time to get creative with your eye makeup. What we love about this makeup look by @plmakeupacademy is that it gives you a professional look without being impossible to recreate at home. While it’ll take a little time and patience, this makeup look is one that’s guaranteed to grab attention in a night club.

You can tone down this dramatic makeup look by keeping the shadow within your lids, instead of blending it out beyond the length of your eyebrows. If you’re heading out to a Valentine’s Day party, this is one makeup look that’s guaranteed to turn heads.

‍

Valentine’s Day glam

‍
If you prefer a soft glam look, we’ve got you covered. This TikTok by @mizglamgirl features a stunning metallic pink eyeshadow look, complete with bold micro bladed eyebrows and impossibly long falsies. It shows that a little metallic shimmer can go a long way.

You can make this look more wearable by swapping the brows for a more natural ‘soap brow’ look and sticking to wispy lashes. Adding an extra touch of highlighter under your brow bone can help to brighten your eyes and balance out a soft glam eyeshadow look like this. Don’t forget your eyeshadow primer!

Which of these valentine’s day makeup looks will you be trying at home? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

keywords: hair care tips, Tiktok hair tips, hair expert, hair tips
meta-description: On one of our recent TikTok scrolls, we came across this viral video by @valerieannpac that shares 5 hair tips. We asked our resident haircare expert to have a
meta-title: 5 Hair Tips from TikTok – Explained By Our Expert
name: 5 Hair Tips from TikTok – Explained By Our Expert
post-body:
If there’s one thing we know, it’s that TikTok is the home of hair trends and hacks. Whether it’s Ariana Grande-inspired ponytails or the copper hair trend, TikTok is our go-to destination for all things haircare. Not only is the app full of viral videos, it’s also the perfect educational platform to help you take your everyday haircare routine to the next level with nourishing products and hair hacks.

‍

On one of our recent TikTok scrolls, we came across this viral video by @valerieannpac that shares 5 hair tips. We asked our resident haircare expert to have a look at the 5 tips to give her thousands on whether these hair tips are worth incorporating into your regular routine.

Brush your hair before you go to the shower

‍
Brushing your hair before going to the shower makes it easier to brush once you’re out of the shower. This hair tip by Valerie is an easy one to incorporate into your routine. By brushing your hair before going to the shower, you’re able to remove any knots or tangles in your hair before they become worse with washing. If you have coarse or fine hair, doing this tip can help make your hair smoother and softer.

The best comb to use for this would be a wide tooth comb to help separate any tangles in your hair. You can use the same brush again after shampooing and conditioning your hair or to distribute product evenly through your hair.

‍

Finish your shower with a cold-water rinse

‍
Valerie’s second tip is another one we should all be following. While you might love nothing more than a roasting hot shower, it’s not the best thing for your hair. Instead of having to have a cold shower the entire time, you can compromise by finishing your shower with a cold-water rinse.

The cold water will close the hair cuticles to help your hair maintain its natural shine. Cold water also closes your pores, which keeps your scalp cleaner for longer by controlling grease, dirt, and oil. If you have frizz hair or suffer from pesky flyaways, finishing up your shower with cold water can be a gamechanger. Finishing up with cold water means that your hair is less likely to become hydrated by losing moisture in the heat of your shower.

Finish your blowdry with a cool shot

‍
Similarly, you can use the cool shot feature on your blowdryer when you finish drying your hair. It has similar benefits to using cold-water on your hair and helps to boost its natural shine to give you the best results.  Using the cold feature on your blowdry also helps to close your cuticles to prevent flyaways and give you smoother hair.

Whatever way you’re styling your hair, using this hair hack tip can be a gamechanger for giving you healthier and more luxurious hair.

‍

Wash your hair less – it will become less greasy over time

‍
This haircare tip is one that we subscribe to. You don’t need to be washing your hair every other day – in fact, it’s likely doing more harm than good for your hair. Your hair naturally gets into a routine with your shampooing schedule, which ends up impacting the way your scalp produces oils and how quickly it becomes greasy.

If you always wash your hair every other day, it’ll become greasier quicker. You can break the cycle by leaving longer between every wash. While this might take some time for your hair to adjust to, it’s worth it in the end.

Only apply conditioner to your mids/ends of your hair

One of the biggest mistakes that people make with their haircare routine is when they apply their conditioner to their scalp. Not only is this wasting your expensive haircare products, but it also simply adds to the oils in your scalp and makes your hair appear greaser quicker.

Instead, focus your conditioner from the mid-lengths to the ends of your hair. You can use your fingers or a wide-tooth comb for an even application through the lengths of your hair.

These 5 hair tips from TikTok are the perfect basic haircare tips to incorporate into your everyday routine. It’s small hair hacks like these that can be a gamechanger to your haircare routine and help you smash your haircare goals.

What is your number one haircare hack that you’ve seen on TikTok? Tell us about it in the comments below!

‍
