Whether it’s Ariana Grande-inspired ponytails or the copper hair trend, TikTok is our go-to destination for all things haircare. Not only is the app full of viral videos, it’s also the perfect educational platform to help you take your everyday haircare routine to the next level with nourishing products and hair hacks.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: eye makeup , under eye bags, tiktok hack
meta-description: We’re sharing this beauty hack from the @makeup account on TikTok to show you how to brighten your complexion and finally wave goodbye to your under-eye circles
meta-title: Hiding Under Eye Bags – TikTok Hack
name: Hiding Under Eye Bags – TikTok Hack
post-body:
Gone are the days when we go to YouTube for makeup hacks. TikTok is our go-to source for all things beauty – including makeup hacks. The viral video sharing platform has taught us everything we wish we had of known in our younger years. Trust us. It would have saved us from a lot of embarrassing makeup mistakes.

One of our favourite TikTok beauty hacks offers a solution for one of the most common beauty problems – under-eye bags. We’re sharing this beauty hack from the @makeup account on TikTok to show you how to brighten your complexion and finally wave goodbye to your under-eye circles.

‍

Getting rid of under-eye bags

‍
The eyes are the window to your soul – but your under-eye bags can quickly change their appearance. Your under eyes can give you a dull-looking complexion or even make it seem like you haven’t got a wink of sleep the night before. Unfortunately, using a concealer isn’t enough to get rid of these bags.

With the ‘clean makeup’ look becoming one of the biggest trends of 2022, we decided it was finally time to get our under-eye area under control. Whether you’re going all out with a glamorous eyeshadow look or keeping it natural, you want to conceal your under-eye bags to brighten your eyes and give you a flawless finish.

The beauty of this hack is that you can use it with products that will already be part of your daily makeup routine. It’s all about changing the approach to your under-eye makeup and using your products in the correct order.

‍

Your step-by-step tutorial

‍
What we love about this TikTok beauty hack is how quick and easy it is to follow. It’s a makeup tip that you can easily incorporate into your daily makeup routine. We think it’s a gamechanger for anyone who struggles with their under-eye area.

We’re breaking down this tutorial step-by-step to help you recreate it at home, explaining each step of the makeup hack in detail.

1. Liquid foundation

‍
If you want to create a dewy makeup look, you’ve got to be using a liquid foundation. It’s the key to creating a flawless look. Powder foundations are likely to cake around your under-eye area and make it look even more visible. Look out for a formula that is buildable, as this can allow you to focus it more on your imperfections, while leaving the rest of your face with a lighter coverage for a more natural look.

Use your ring finger to gently pat your liquid foundation around your under-eye area. Resist the temptation to use a beauty blender or a brush to speed up this process. Your liquid foundation is the all-important base layer for this makeup. You can start by applying it to your under-eye area before working on the rest of your face.

2. Solid/pot concealer

‍
While liquid foundation is our go-to, you want to use a solid or pot concealer. This allows you to create a more targeted and buildable look. Use a small concealer brush to place the concealer over your under-eye area, focusing from the inner corner outwards. Once you’ve placed the concealer down, blend it out using your ring finger.

A pot or solid concealer gives you the freedom of applying it using a makeup brush and often gives you a more buildable coverage. When you’re using your makeup brush, make sure that you’re applying and blending the concealer using upward motions to help lift your under-eye area.

3. Translucent powder

‍
The most important step of all with this beauty hack is to apply translucent powder. This helps to minimize the appearance of your under-eyes, brighten the area, and set your foundation and concealer in place. You want to try and apply your translucent powder right after using your concealer for a seamless look.

Apply your translucent powder with a shader brush before blending it in using the same brush. You want to lightly dust the brush against your skin to avoid over-blending it. You can also use your translucent powder to help set the rest of your makeup to avoid creasing throughout the day for a flawless look.

Translucent powder is available in a ‘clear’ finish, or you can opt for a setting powder that has a hit of colour to help brighten your under-eye area.

Voila! That’s how easy this beauty hack is to recreate at home.

What do you think of this beauty hack from TikTok? Will you be incorporating it into your makeup routine? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: Gone are the days when we go to YouTube for makeup hacks. TikTok is our go-to source for all things beauty – including makeup hacks. The viral video sharing platform has taught us everything we wish we had of known in our younger years. Trust us. It would have saved us from a lot of embarrassing makeup mistakes. One of our favourite TikTok beauty hacks offers a solution for one of the most common beauty problems – under-eye bags. We’re sharing this beauty hack from the @makeup account on TikTok to show you how to brighten your complexion and finally wave goodbye to your under-eye circles.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: valentine's nail, nail art for valentine's day, nail art ideas,
meta-description: Valentine’s Day nail art trends are all about rediscovering our love for classic red and pink shades – as well as incorporating hearts and symbols of love.
meta-title: 5 Valentine’s Day Nail Art Ideas to Try at Home
name: 5 Valentine’s Day Nail Art Ideas to Try at Home
post-body:
Love is in the air and Valentine’s Day is just around the corner. It’s a time of self-love and spending time with your nearest and dearest – whether they’re your partner or your best friend. If there’s one thing that we love about the holiday, it’s the heart-inspired nail art that floods our Instagram feeds.

Getting a nail appointment for Valentine’s Day can feel like finding a needle in a haystack. That’s why we’re sharing our favourite Valentine’s Day nail art ideas that you can create at-home. We all love an at-home manicure as the ultimate form of self-care. Whether you’re celebrating with your significant other or getting ready for Galentine’s Day, it’s the perfect time to get your nail kit out.

Valentine’s Day nail art trends are all about rediscovering our love for classic red and pink shades – as well as incorporating hearts and symbols of love. You can keep it minimalistic with a French manicure or go all out with an ombre look. Read on to discover the Valentine’s Day nail art ideas that we’re loving for 2022.

‍

‍

Queen of my heart

‍
You don’t need to be a professional nail tech to experiment with Valentine’s Day nail art. One of our favourite looks is by the Instagram user @naileditbeauty. Her classic scalloped manicure is given a Valentine’s Day inspired makeover with red tips and a ‘Queen of Hearts’ accent nail.

If you don’t feel confident about your free-hand painting skills, you can replicate this look using a nail sticker instead. Don’t forget to accessorise your new nails with a quirky heart-shaped ring.

‍

‍

L-O-V-E

‍
“L is for the way you look at me…”

Wear your heart on your fingernails by spelling out the word love. We’re obsessed with the minimalistic look of @betina_goldstein’s Valentine’s Day nails. While this will require an artistic outlook, this nail art is easier to create than you might expect. Start with a clear base code to give your nails a groomed look, before dipping an eyeliner brush into a white nail polish. Add a heart to your thumb nail to finish off the look.

Feel like being more colourful? You can recreate this look in a bold neon or an effortlessly chic pastel shade.

‍

‍

Keep it simple with ombres

‍
Not everyone wants to go all out for their Valentine’s Day nails. If you’re a fan of getting a longer wear out of your nails, you might want to give a subtle nod to the holiday. If that sounds like you, we’ve got just the perfect at-home Valentine’s Day manicure for you.

Ombre is a nail trend that is effortlessly feminine and chic. You can give the trend a Valentine’s Day update by choosing two shades of pink that remind you of the season of love. If you feel like being bolder, swap out the pink hues for red and wear your heart on your sleeve. We love that this look nail art is one that is romantic, without being too in your face. It’s one we’ll be wearing throughout the spring and summer.

‍

‍

Black hearts

‍
We’re all rediscovering the trends from the noughties – including our goth phases. If you prefer to stick to neutrals like black, we’ve got the Valentine’s Day nail art for you. This black heart nail art by @betina_goldstein shows that it’s not all red roses and pink cookies.

As a monochrome look, you’ll pain three of your nails a classic black shade before adding a black heart to your middle and index finger. This nail art is easy for beginners as you can use a template or sticker to create the perfect heart-shaped art. Don’t forget to add a clear coat of varnish to your accent nails for a well-manicured look.

‍

‍

Give hearts the Parisian treatment

‍
Are you loyal to your classic French manicure? You can give it an update for Valentine’s Day by switching out your classic white tips for hearts. While this look requires a little more skill you could also recreate it with the help of nail stickers.

Start with a solid pink base before focusing a small group of asymmetrical hearts around the tip of your nails. An eyeliner brush or paint brush can help you create a smaller heart if you’re working by hand. The finish product will look like a traditional French manicure from afar, before revealing itself to be an array of hearts.  

Which of these Valentine’s Day nail art looks will you be recreating at home? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

It’s a time of self-love and spending time with your nearest and dearest – whether they’re your partner or your best friend. If there’s one thing that we love about the holiday, it’s the heart-inspired nail art that floods our Instagram feeds. Getting a nail appointment for Valentine’s Day can feel like finding a needle in a haystack. That’s why we’re sharing our favourite Valentine’s Day nail art ideas that you can create at-home. We all love an at-home manicure as the ultimate form of self-care. Whether you’re celebrating with your significant other or getting ready for Galentine’s Day, it’s the perfect time to get your nail kit out.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: make up, tiktok, tiktok glam, glam make up step by step, blueyedcai
meta-description: We’re breaking down each stage of Caitlin’s birthday glam makeup tutorial step by step to help you recreate it at home. Are you ready
meta-title: TikTok Birthday Glam Makeup Step-By-Step
name: TikTok Birthday Glam Makeup Step-By-Step
post-body:
When we need makeup inspiration for a special occasion, TikTok is the first place we go. The video-sharing platform has given us some of the most exciting makeup trends of the season – from the reverse cat eye to the DIY face-lift or cheek sandwich. Gone are the days when we went to YouTube to see what makeup other people were wearing. TikTok has it all – including makeup tutorials that we’re dying to recreate at home.

‍

‍

Our For You Page is full of our favourite influencers sharing their makeup looks for special occasions. It’s the ultimate ‘get ready with me’ video that lets us get an insight into the hidden gems in our favourite influencer’s makeup bag and how they get their signature look.

The makeup looking that we’re recreating in this guide is @blueyedcai’s birthday glam look.  This step-by-step TikTok makeup tutorial is part of a series where we break down tutorials and hacks to make them easier to follow at home. Whether you’re a newbie or a seasoned professional, it can be difficult to keep up with a short 60 second TikTok video.

‍

‍

We’re breaking down each stage of Caitlin’s birthday glam makeup tutorial step by step to help you recreate it at home. Are you ready? Grab your makeup bag and lets get started.

1. Start by taking a white shadow and apply it under your eyebrow using a thin eyeshadow brush. You want to do this step to create the illusion of a natural highlight and higher brows to naturally lift your face.

‍
2. Take this pale skin-tone shade and buffer it across the top of your crease as a base shade to help brighten your eyes.

‍
3. Select a transition shade – such as a pale brown – and blend it into your crease before taking the colour across your eyelid.

‍
4. Using an eyeliner brush, take a black shadow and create a winged line at your outer corner. You can place a piece of tape down to help you get the perfect flick for your winged liner.

‍
5. Grab your foundation to create a flawless base layer. In this video, Catlin is using Charlotte Tilbury’s Hollywood Flawless Filter foundation.

‍
6. Use a stippling brush, followed by a fan brush, to help set your foundation in place. If you want a more natural look, you can opt for a beauty blender instead and gently bounce it off your skin to apply the foundation.

‍
7. Using your fan brush, take your bronzer and buff it into your forehead to create a glowing sun-kissed look. You want to also use it to contour your cheeks. Depending on your preference, you can also use it to contour your jawline for a sleeker finish.

‍
8. Lift your under-eye area by applying your concealer at the inner and outer corner of your eyes. Blend in an upward motion to naturally lift your eyes to make them appear larger and brighter.

‍
9. Take the eyeshadow shade that you had previously used for your lid and bring it down below your lower lash line.

‍
10. In part two of her tutorial, Caitlin used a black pencil eyeliner on her lower lashline to define her eyes before applying another coat of eyeshadow underneath.

‍
11. To finish off this birthday glam look, overline your lips using a deep mauve shade before filling in your lips with a high-shine gloss.

‍
12. Add a coat of mascara to lift and curl your lashes for a dramatic finish to your eye makeup.

‍
13. Don’t forget to highlight! Caitlin used the Charlotte Tilbury liquid highlighter on her cheekbones, before applying a Charlotte Tilbury blush to the apples of her cheeks.

‍

‍

We love this soft glam look by Caitlin that works for any occasion – whether it’s your birthday or a holiday cocktail party. It’s all about creating a flawless base to help make your eyes pop with a subtle and natural lip to finish it off. You can use this step-by-step tutorial as inspiration for a glowy makeup look and switch out the products to match your signature colour palette.

You could take this look to the next level by adding a red lip or swapping the glossy lip for a liquid lipstick. This makeup look is all about creating a sun-kissed glow to your skin to unlock your inner radiance.

Which TikTok makeup look would you be interested in seeing a step-by-step guide for? Leave us a link and let us know in the comments!

‍

The video-sharing platform has given us some of the most exciting makeup trends of the season – from the reverse cat eye to the DIY face-lift or cheek sandwich. Gone are the days when we went to YouTube to see what makeup other people were wearing. TikTok has it all – including makeup tutorials that we’re dying to recreate at home.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: TikTok hair trend, hair trend explained, hair trend step by step, hairsyle
meta-description: We’ve been taking our favourite TikTok hair trends and providing simple step-by-step explainers to help you create the look at home with the help of our guides
meta-title: TikTok Hair Trend Explained Step By Step
name: TikTok Hair Trend Explained Step By Step
post-body:
TikTok is the home of some of our favourite hair trends. Whether it’s Ariana Grande-inspired ponytails or a double ponytail, TikTok has a hair trend for everyone. While we love TikTok hair tutorials, we know that they can be difficult to follow – especially if you’re not a seasoned pro at doing your hair.

Most of the hair tutorials that you’ll find on Instagram are simple videos of the person doing the hair sped up to fit within the TikTok format.

Unfortunately, this means that not every influencer provides clear instructions on how to recreate their hair styles – which means you might end up re-watching a video a dozen times to try and learn how to do the style yourself. You also might find yourself having to pause and restart the video while trying to do the style yourself.

‍

‍

We’ve been taking our favourite TikTok hair trends and providing simple step-by-step explainers to help you create the look at home with the help of our guides and the original video. With the holiday season right around the corner, we thought this feminine hairstyle by @auroralovestrand was the perfect choice for our latest explainer. Read on to find out how you can recreate this princess-inspired hairstyle at home.

What you need for this TikTok Hairstyle?

What we love about this hairstyle by Aurora Lovestrand is that all you need is two hair ties to complete the look, making it an easy one to create on the go. This whimsical hairstyle is the perfect one to experiment with as an easy way to take your outfit from day to night. You’ll want to ensure you brush your hair and have it parted before you start styling it.

‍

How to Create the Perfect Date Night TikTok Hairstyle

‍
Grab your hair ties and let’s get started. We recommend brushing your hair before starting this look. You may also decide to add a little extra volume to your roots before starting for a sleeker finish.

1. Section the top 1/3 of your hair and pull it into a loose ponytail. You want to avoid putting too much tension onto the ponytail.

‍
2. Once you have the ponytail in place, take the ends of the ponytail and flip them over the top of the ponytail. It’s easiest to use your fingers to create a gap in your hair above the ponytail and gently pulling your hair through that way.

‍
3. This step should leave you with an intricate twist on both sides of your hair. You want to keep the ponytail loose to give this part of the hairstyle its moment to shine.

‍
4. Take your fingers and slowly loosen the sides of the ponytail for a slightly messy look. You want to keep this hairstyle looking imperfect and slightly less polished than a traditional ponytail.

‍
5. Lift the ponytail over y our head and grab the remaining hair, diving it into two sections. Pull one section over each shoulder before bringing the ponytail back to rest in its normal spot.

‍
6. Take the two remaining sections of hair and twist them around the top of the first ponytail to create a second ponytail. Secure this ponytail with another hair tie.

‍
7. Loosen the second ponytail to create a gap before gently pulling the first ponytail through the hole of the second.

‍
8. You should now have a second twist underneath the original, with the two ponytails layered over each other for a seamless look.

Creating this TikTok hairstyle is as simple as that. You can take this look to the next level by curling your hair beforehand. You can also add a hair accessory to the top of the ponytail to create an accent look for this hairstyle.

We’ll be wearing this TikTok hairstyle on repeat throughout the holiday season. It’s easy to recreate and once you’ve mastered it, you recreate it within a few minutes.

You can personalise this hairstyle by leaving some of the front sections of your hair loose to frame your face. If you want a sleeker look at the front, push back your flyaways and use a styling cream to seal them in place,

Do you have a TikTok hairstyle that you’d like us to create a step-by-step guide for? Drop us the link in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: TikTok is the home of some of our favourite hair trends. Whether it’s Ariana Grande-inspired ponytails or a double ponytail, TikTok has a hair trend for everyone. While we love TikTok hair tutorials, we know that they can be difficult to follow – especially if you’re not a seasoned pro at doing your hair.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: winter skin routine, skin care, face skin, skin vitamins, skincare routine
meta-description: We’re putting together a winter skincare routine that will help your skin stay healthy and hydrated all season long
meta-title: The Winter Skincare Routine
name: The Winter Skincare Routine That Your Skin Will Love
post-body:
Everyone’s skin changes during winter because of the cold weather and the effect of indoor heating. Dehydrated and irritated skin can quickly lead to breakouts during winter. While you don’t need to start from scratch when building your winter skincare routine, there’s a few things you want to prioritize.

‍

‍

TikTok user @jessicamiasota shared an informative video on the correct way to apply your skincare products for the best results. Whether you want a refresher or are starting your skincare routine for the first time, this video is the perfect reference point.

We’re putting together a winter skincare routine that will help your skin stay healthy and hydrated all season long – with a few product recommendations thrown in to help get you started.

‍

It’s all about hydrating your skin

‍
You want every product in your routine to help hydrate your skin during winter. You don’t need have to overcomplicate it. While Jessica’s video recommends a six-step routine, all you need is a gentle cleanser, hydrating serum, and moisturizer to get you started.

The best winter skincare routine for you is the one that you’re most likely to follow. If you think you’ll be more consistent with a shorter routine, stick with that. You want to look out for ingredients that will help hydrate your skin, including hyaluronic acid and vitamin C. You also want products that will help boost your skin’s natural protective barrier to protect against free radical damage and to retain your skin’s moisture balance.

Meet the perfect winter skincare routine

‍
Whatever your skin type is, focus on moisture and hydration. Winter is perhaps the one time when we could all use the same skincare routine. It’s worth looking at each step in your routine individually to see how it can repair, rejuvenate, and protect your skin.

Winter is a time to focus on natural, skin-loving ingredients. Use the holiday season to educate yourself on the best ingredients for your skin type and look for brands that focus on natural ingredients that are less likely to irritate your skin.

‍

A gentle and mild cleanser

‍
Kickstart your winter skincare routine with a mild cleanser that will help to remove impurities and your makeup. A mild cleanser will gently exfoliate your skin without stripping your skin of its natural oils, which can cause it to become dehydrated and irritated. Exuviance’s Professional Gentle Cleansing Cream is a splurge-worthy purchase that uses a crème formula to nourish and cleanse your skin.

Hydrating serum

‍
Jessica recommends that you apply a serum as the second step of your skincare routine. There’s always been a debate about whether toner is a good follow-up or not. If you decide to use a toner in your winter skincare routine, avoid any formulas that are alcohol-based as they’re likely to irritate your skin.

The best way to customize your winter skincare routine is with a hydrating serum. If you have sensitive skin, it’s best to avoid strong active ingredients, including retinol. Peptides and PHAs are a great place to start with your winter skincare routine as they’ll hydrate your skin without causing irritation.

When you’re using active ingredients, start with a lower dosage to avoid irritation.

The Herbivore Bakuchiol Serum rejuvenates dull-looking skin by smoothing its texture without causing skin irritation or peeling. It’s a winter-appropriate alternative to retinol.

Eye Cream

‍
Are you stressing about final exams or holiday shopping? Your under-eyes are the first area to show signs of aging and tiredness. Invest in an eye cream that soothes and diminishes your dark circles.

Vitamin C

‍
If you want to achieve dewy, glowing skin and bright complexion, you need vitamin C. It’s a must-have ingredient for your winter skincare routine. As a natural ingredient, it’s suitable for all skin types as a brightening agent. Paula’s Choice’s C15 Super Booster uses 15% vitamin C for anti-aging benefits.

Moisturizer

‍
Your moisturizer locks in your skin’s moisture for all-day hydration. It acts as a protective barrier against oxidative stress, free radical damage, and dehydration. We love the budget-friendly Ceramide Night Treatment by The Inkey List that keeps your skin hydrated all night long.

Sunscreen

‍
Just because you can’t see the sun in winter, it doesn’t mean that it’s not there. You want to finish off your morning winter routine with a sunscreen to protect your skin from burns and UV radiation.

How are you changing up your winter skincare routine? Tell us about it in the comments below!

‍

‍
post-summary: Everyone’s skin changes during winter because of the cold weather and the effect of indoor heating. Dehydrated and irritated skin can quickly lead to breakouts during winter. While you don’t need to start from scratch when building your winter skincare routine, there’s a few things you want to prioritize.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: changing lipstick, colore changing lipstick, tiktok changing lipstick
meta-description: We’re looking at colour changing lipsticks, how they work, and why they’re a good addition to your makeup bag.
meta-title: Meet Colour Changing Lipsticks
name: Meet Colour Changing Lipsticks
post-body:
Can we send our credit card bill to TikTok? The viral video sharing app is our go-to source of inspiration for our makeup routine. We find ourselves hitting ‘add to cart’ on products that are constantly appearing on our FYP. The latest product to come onto our radar is an oldie but a goodie – colour changing lipsticks.

‍

‍

No, it’s not the colour changing lipstick you had as a kid. These lipsticks actually work. We came across this video by TikTok user @darceyangell who shared the Ciate x Christine Quinn heat transforming lip cream in ‘Ca$h Fetish’. These colour changing lipsticks are currently on sale, making them the perfect last-minute addition to your NYE makeup look.

We’re looking at colour changing lipsticks, how they work, and why they’re a good addition to your makeup bag.

‍

What is colour changing lipsticks?

‍
You can think of colour changing lipsticks as being the beauty industry’s answer to mood rings. Just like this ‘70s accessory, colour changing lipsticks are always popping back up in the beauty world. What we love about colour changing lipsticks is that they have something to offer everyone – from subtle changes to more OTT colours.

So, how do colour changing lipsticks work? It’s simple science. The colour changing lipstick contains ingredients that react with your lips’ pH level. As our lips all have different pH levels, colours will look different from person to person. The beauty of colour changing lipsticks is that you’re guaranteed to get a colour that will flatter your natural skin tone and lips.

If you want a colour changing lipstick that will give you a high-impact colour, look for liquid lipsticks. Colour changing lipsticks are a better choice for those who prefer a more natural or subtle look. While you’ll find a few crazy colours, most colour changing lipsticks offer different hues of pink and red.

Colour changing lipsticks that work for every budget

‍
Are you thinking of experimenting with colour changing lipsticks? Just like your favourite ‘90s accessories, you’ll find a colour changing lipstick at every price point. We’ve rounded up a few of the most popular options on the market, including the OG colour changing lipstick that looks nothing like it does in the tube.

‍

Lipstick Queen – Frog Prince

‍
Meet what most of us consider to be the grown-up version of colour changing lipsticks. The shade ‘frog prince’ by Lipstick Queen proves that kissing a few frogs does come with its benefits. It’s one of the best-selling products by Lipstick Queen and had a cult-following for several years.

When you open the lipstick, you’re met with a deep emerald bullet that can be a little overwhelming. It’s a guaranteed conversation starter when you pull it out in public. After you apply this colour changing lipstick, the colour develops to a universally flattering fuchsia shade.

‍

Essence – Kiss the Frog

‍
Are you looking for a more affordable dupe of Lipstick Queen’s Frog Prince. Essence has a budget-friendly option that is a total steal. You can enjoy the long-lasting stain that gives your lips a natural sheen. Like the other Essence lipsticks, this colour changing shade has a pleasant green apples scent.

‍

Barry M Cosmetics - Colour Changing Lip Paint

‍
Another budget friendly option is Barry M’s colour changing lip paint. Their ‘Genie’ shade is similar to the two options above, while there is also a blue and yellow formulation available. This lipstick reacts with the alkaline in your lips to create a custom flattering pink shade.

You’ll get a smooth and even coverage with this lip paint that offers up to eight hours of wear. Along with being affordable, this colour changing lipstick is also cruelty free.

‍

Charlotte Tilbury – Glowgasm Lips

‍
Looking for a luxury version of a colour changing lipstick? Charlotte Tilbury has two shades in their glowgasm lips range – ‘jewelgasm’ and ‘glittergasm’. These two shades add warmth to the natural colour of your lips by reacting to your lips pH levels and giving them an extra boost of moisture.

As a limited-edition product, the Glowgasm Lips are a splurge-worthy purchase for fans of Charlotte Tilbury. It gives you a natural-looking stain that is perfect for ‘no makeup’ days or for dewy, glowing makeup looks. These colour changing lipsticks come in a limited-edition holographic case that is guaranteed to stand out amongst your other Charlotte Tilbury lipsticks.

What do you think of colour changing lipsticks? Are they a ‘yay’ or a ‘nay’? Tell us your thoughts in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: Can we send our credit card bill to TikTok? The viral video sharing app is our go-to source of inspiration for our makeup routine. We find ourselves hitting ‘add to cart’ on products that are constantly appearing on our FYP. The latest product to come onto our radar is an oldie but a goodie – colour changing lipsticks.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: TikTok beauty routine, Loren Gray TikTok influencer, TikTok beauty secrets, Loren Gray beauty routine
meta-description: . We’re rounding up the key takeaways from her ‘get ready with me’ tutorial for Vogue and the products that she featured in the video.
meta-title: TikTok’s Loren Gray Shares Her Beauty Secrets
name: TikTok’s Loren Gray Shares Her Beauty Secrets and Favourite Products
post-body:
When we need beauty inspiration, there’s one place that never fails. TikTok. The viral video sharing app has given us the next generation of influencers and celebrities, who are more education-focus than their YouTube predecessors. Loren Gray is amongst the most popular influencers on TikTok and one of our go-to influencers for beauty recommendations.

‍
In a recent feature with Vogue, the TikTok star spilled the tea on her favourite beauty secrets and the products that she can’t live without. We’re rounding up the key takeaways from her ‘get ready with me’ tutorial for Vogue and the products that she featured in the video. Read on to find out how you can create Loren Gray’s beauty look at home.

‍

‍

What Loren Gray says about her skincare routine

‍
During her video with Vogue, the TikTok star opened up about her struggle with skincare. Like most of us, Loren sees an alignment between skincare and self-care, something that she has a hard time incorporating into your daily routine. She admits that while skincare often feels like a task, it’s something that she focuses on having in her daily routine for its skin-loving benefits and feel-good factor.

‍

‍
The 19-year-old TikTok influencer and singer incorporates tapping and jade rolling into her skincare routine to waken her skin before applying a hyaluronic acid serum. It’s one product that we can all benefit from due to its hydrating properties as hyaluronic acid can hold up to 1000 times its molecular weight in water.

‍
She finishes up her skincare routine with a moisturizer to give her dry and sensitive skin the TLC it needs and to lock in the active ingredients in her other products. Loren Gray uses a Mario Badescu facial spray to give her skin a dewy glow before moving onto her makeup routine.

‍

‍
What Loren Gray says about her makeup routine

‍
Moving onto her makeup, Loren Gray talks about how she has recently started to switch up her go-to look. For the last five to six years, the singer had been loyal to her winged eyeliner look. She’s branching out and trying a more glow-infused look that’s right on trend with the more minimalistic approach to makeup and beauty in general.

‍
The first step of her makeup routine is foundation. As Loren is a fan of spray tanning, she uses two foundations to achieve the best match to her skin tone. She uses a combination of the Soft Matte foundation by Nars and Dior’s Forever Skin Glow – before following up with the matching concealers by the two brands. Loren uses the cult-favourite beauty blender to set and blend her foundation and concealers.

‍
During her Vogue video, Loren opens up about how she started wearing makeup because she didn’t like her appearance. Makeup became something for her to hide behind before she changed her mind set and began to appreciate makeup as a form of art, which helped her to fall back in love with her beauty routine. It’s for this reason why her makeup look has changed – focusing on enhancing her natural features instead of using it to hide away.

‍

‍
‍

Loren follows one of TikTok’s most famous beauty hacks by using the Matchstick by Fenty Beauty to contour her cheeks, nose, and widow’s peak for a bronze goddess look. She uses the iconic Airbrush powder from Charlotte Tilbury to set her under eye makeup before using the Laura Mercier translucent powder on the areas of her skin where she hasn’t contoured.

‍
For the areas of her face that she used the Matchstick, Loren follows up with a bronzer by Charlotte Tilbury before using the Hourglass Ambient Lighting Edit Mini Palette to add a touch of shimmer to her face.

‍
Her brow routine is easy to recreate at home with two cult favourite products, including the Brow Wiz from Anastasia Beverly Hills and Makeup By Mario’s new brow gel.

‍
Loren hasn’t said goodbye to her love of eyeliner though. She’s recently started using a new eyeliner trick that involves using a liquid liner before smudging it with her finger and adding a little red-tone eyeshadow for a touch of drama. She joked in the Vogue video that she likes the fact it makes her look a little tired.

‍
Her makeup routine finishes with false lashes, mascara, and a touch of lipstick. Everything is set with a setting spray to help it last all day long.

‍
What do you think of Loren Gray’s skincare and makeup routine? Leave your thoughts in the comments below!

‍
post-summary:
When we need beauty inspiration, there’s one place that never fails. TikTok. The viral video sharing app has given us the next generation of influencers and celebrities, who are more education-focus than their YouTube predecessors. Loren Gray is amongst the most popular influencers on TikTok and one of our go-to influencers for beauty recommendations.
In a recent feature with Vogue, the TikTok star spilled the tea on her favourite beauty secrets and the products that she can’t live without. We’re rounding up the key takeaways from her ‘get ready with me’ tutorial for Vogue and the products that she featured in the video. Read on to find out how you can create Loren Gray’s beauty look at home.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: thicker lashes, barker lashes, beauty trend, volume lashes, makeup
meta-description: We’re looking at how you can create darker, thicker lashes at home and why the lash trend has been all over our TikTok and Instagram feeds.
meta-title: How to Create Darker and Thicker Lashes
name: How to Create Darker and Thicker Lashes
post-body:
Your eyes are the window to your soul. With mask wearing sticking around for the foreseeable future, we’re falling back in love with eye makeup. Whether you like a minimalistic look or go all out with a dramatic makeup style, you want to play up your lashes. You don’t have to be blessed with perfect lashes to give the illusion of falsies without committing to them.

‍

‍

There’s something luxurious about having thick, dark lashes. It’s a timeless makeup look that will never go out of style and is universally flattering as it opens up your eyes and draws attention to them – regardless of the rest of your makeup.

‍
We’re looking at how you can create darker, thicker lashes at home and why the lash trend has been all over our TikTok and Instagram feeds. Spoiler alert. Dark and thick lashes are one of the go-to beauty trends of 2022.

‍

‍
Why dark, thick lashes are becoming a 2022 beauty trend

‍
Lashes are fun and flirty. While designers tend to go extreme with lashes on the runway, the oversized and dark lash look can be incorporated into your daily makeup routine. Impossibly thick and dark lashes are becoming less like theatre makeup and more like every day looks with every season. As the beauty industry becomes less restrictive about what is ‘normal’ makeup, you can expect this trend to become even more popular.

‍
Your eyelashes are one of the easiest ways to change up your entire look. With just a few swipes of pen or wand, you can instantly transform your look and give it an exotic feel. Lashes are becoming a corner stone in the world of non-binary makeup, meaning that everyone can enjoy the benefits of having darker, thicker eyelashes.

‍

How to create dark and thick eyelashes that last

‍
It’s easy to feel overwhelmed when trying to create the look of dark and thick eyelashes. Being able to apply falsies is a life-defining skill and one that not all of us have mastered yet.

‍
While some people choose to apply glue onto their skin to secure falsies, it’s usually easier to apply a lash adhesive along the band of the false lashes before applying them by hand. The Duo Brush On Striplash Adhesive is amongst the most popular and easiest to use.

‍
If you struggle to get your false lashes into place, never fear. One of the best – and easiest – ways to apply false lashes is by using your tweezers. It gives you a little extra grip, making it easier to line up your falsies for a natural look and to secure them correctly in place. If you want extra peace of mind, use your eyelash curler to help blend your falsies and natural lashes together for a seamless finish to create darker and thicker-looking lashes.

‍
Not everyone is a fan of using false eyelashes – and we get that. Some people – especially those who wear glasses – can find false lashes to be more of a hassle than they’re worth. Mascaras have evolved in recent years to meet the ever-changing beauty norms and give you a false lash look from a tube.

‍

‍
You want to look out for an innovative mascara that has a fluffy brush, allowing you to separate your lashes and lengthen each individual lash to give you a precise look and control over your lashes. If you feel like splurging, La Perla has released their first volumizing mascara that is guaranteed to darken your lashes for a seductive look.

‍
Another trick that you can use to create darker and thicker eyelashes is by using both mascara and false eyelashes. The trick is to apply a base coat of mascara to act as an anchor for your false eyelashes, making them easier to wear and less likely to move throughout the day. This look is easiest to achieve when you use a lightweight mascara that doesn’t clump up your lashes as that can be counterproductive for this look.

‍
Dark, thick eyelashes are the perfect accessory for a night on the town – whether you’re going out on a date or with your girlfriends. Your eyes are the windows to your soul, making your lashes the most important aspect of your makeup look. With masks keeping all the attention on our eye makeup, your lashes are taking a starring role wherever you go.

What tips and tricks do you use to achieve the look of dark and thick eyelashes? Leave them in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: Your eyes are the window to your soul. With mask wearing sticking around for the foreseeable future, we’re falling back in love with eye makeup. Whether you like a minimalistic look or go all out with a dramatic makeup style, you want to play up your lashes. You don’t have to be blessed with perfect lashes to give the illusion of falsies without committing to them.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: black skincare, skin routine for black skin, black skin
meta-description: We’re sharing five things that everyone should know about black skin and how to care for it, including addressing some of the myths and misconceptions around bl
meta-title: What You Should Know About Black Skin
name: What You Should Know About Black Skin
post-body:
When it comes to skincare, there’s one thing that we don’t talk about. Black skin. With the skincare community growing every day online, it’s quickly becoming like other areas of the beauty industry – dominated by white people. The simple truth is that black skin requires its own tender loving care and that what works for paler skin won’t always work for black skin.

‍

‍

In fact, most black women find themselves reading skincare articles and asking, “will that work for me or is it just for white women?”. That’s where this article comes in to help educate us all on black skincare. We’re sharing five things that everyone should know about black skin and how to care for it, including addressing some of the myths and misconceptions around black skin. You can think of this article as the five founding principles that govern the world of black skincare.

‍

‍
Your skin doesn’t need aggressive treatments

‍
One of the first misconceptions that we need to address is the belief that black skin is tougher and more resilient to aggressive treatments. This concept often leads to people trying harsher treatments or not starting with smaller doses of active ingredients. In reality, the opposite is true. As black skin has melanin cells it can become discoloured quicker, making the skin more fragile than most people understand.

‍
With this misconception, people end up damaging their skin by using the wrong treatments. If you’re serious about your skincare journey and caring for black skin, it’s always a good idea to see a professional dermatologist. They’ll be able to give you an overview of your skin and recommend which treatments will be best for you.

‍
Your skin deserves a regime that is tailored just to it – instead of a copy and pasted skincare routine from YouTube. Skip the aggressive treatments unless they’re recommended by a dermatologist to tackle a specific issue and only if it’s suitable for your skin type.

‍

You don’t have to shy away from ingredients

‍
Another misconception is that having black skin means you can’t use certain treatments or ingredients. The skincare world is open to everyone – regardless of complexion. You have to approach skincare with the mindset that every ingredient is available for you, but that doesn’t mean you should use them. You want to choose ingredients and treatments that are tailored to the needs of your skin. For example, you can still enough a chemical peel when you have black skin, but you want to use a lower percentage of the active ingredients.

‍
Skincare is open to everyone; it’s just about finding a way to make it your own. Your skin is just as unique as you are.

‍

‍
Your skin is likely drier than other complexions

‍
Black skin is usually drier than lighter skin due to what occurs below the skin’s surface. It has fewer ceramides in the skin’s upper layers, which act as a protective film to keep your skin hydrated by retaining moisture throughout the day. If you don’t have enough ceramides, your skin will become clinically dry as it loses its moisture and becomes dehydrated.

‍
One of the best pieces of advice that we can give you is that oil shouldn’t be used as a moisturiser. If you’re suffering from dry skin, you need to give it a tall glass of water – and oil doesn’t fit that bill. Hyaluronic acid is your best friend and it’s worthwhile investing in a heavy moisturiser that locks-in hydration and keeps your skin protected.

‍

‍
You can still have laser treatments.

‍
Laser treatments have come on leaps and bounds in recent years – meaning that black skin can now benefit from the help of lasers without worrying about causing skin damage. It’s always best to speak to your technician ahead of time, but most black women can enjoy laser treatments without the risk of developing hyperpigmentation on their skin.

‍
Give injectables a try

‍
One product that isn’t promoted to black women enough is the world of injectables, especially in a skincare context. While lip filler can give you bigger lips, it can also add much-needed hydration to diminish the appearance of lips and repair the skin on your lips. If you’re concerned about premature aging or want to get rid of stubborn wrinkles, injectables will always give you better results than anything you can achieve from a traditional skincare product.

‍
Which of these black skincare tips will you be trying out? Tell us about your skincare journey below!

‍
post-summary: When it comes to skincare, there’s one thing that we don’t talk about. Black skin. With the skincare community growing every day online, it’s quickly becoming like other areas of the beauty industry – dominated by white people. The simple truth is that black skin requires its own tender loving care and that what works for paler skin won’t always work for black skin.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: nail hacks on TikTok, tiktok nails, Tiktok hacks, TikTok nail art, manicure TikTok, manicure at home
meta-description: With these TikTok nail hacks, you can bring your manicure game to the next level. It’s perfect for anyone who wants to save some money by doing their nails.
meta-title: The TikTok Nail Hacks That You Need to Know
name: The TikTok Nail Hacks That You Need to Know
post-body:
TikTok is our go-to source for beauty hacks – with nails being no exception. Gone are the days when we watched hour-long YouTube videos. Now, we’re glued to the short viral content on TikTok. What’s different about the TikTok beauty community is that it’s more DIY and educational focused. Our favourite influencers are sharing their tips and tricks on how to achieve professional looking results at home – even with your weekly manicure.

‍
The #nailhacks on TikTok has almost 500 million views. That’s a lot of manicures and polish. You’ll find everything from tips on how to recreate celebrity-worthy manicures to basic 101 lessons on how to do a manicure at home. With the festive season upon us – and manicure appointments being like gold dust- we’ve taken to TikTok to find the nail hacks that will get us through 2022.

‍

‍
With these TikTok nail hacks, you can bring your manicure game to the next level. It’s perfect for anyone who wants to save some money by doing their nails at home instead of splurging on an expensive manicure. We’ve searched high and low across TikTok to put together a curated collection of nail hacks that everyone should know. These are all beginner friendly and proof that even the masters of nail art can learn something new on TikTok.

‍
You can do most of these nail hacks with things that you’ll already have at home. Save your dollars  and do your nails at home. With the help of toothpicks and things you’ll have around your house, you can create a salon-worthy manicure without breaking the bank.

‍
Grab your favourite polish, these TikTok nail hacks are a gamechanger.

‍

Removing acrylic nails

‍
Taking off acrylics is difficult. While you get to enjoy super long nails, they are can be a pain to try and take off. Most people choose to go to a salon just to make the removal process easier to manage.

With this TikTok nail hack, you can remove your acrylic nails at home. TikTok user @bysugarclaws shares her tips on how to remove acrylic nails using soap, argan oil, and a bowl of warm water. Add everything together and soak your fingers until the acrylics slip off your nails. This nail hack will help you fall back in love with acrylic nails again.

‍

‍

Polka dot nails

‍
Polka dot nails are a classic beginner nail art trend that everyone needs to try at least once. It gives you the look of an intricate nail art design without being too stressful to make. All you need is a bobby pin and two (or more!) nail polish shades. Start by painting your nails with a base color that you love before using the bobby pin to place the secondary nail colour. The bobby pin will make it easy for you to create an art pop inspired look that is uniform.

‍

‍

An easy French manicure

‍
French manicures are making a comeback thanks to Hailey Bieber and Gigi Hadid. This classic nail art look will never go out of style and is a perfect choice for a festive look.

‍
With this TikTok nail hack, it’s easy to achieve the perfect French tip. It involves dabbing the nail polish onto the inside of your finger before pressing your nail tip into it. You’re guaranteed to get a perfect uniform French tip.

‍

‍

Chrome finish nails

‍
One of the most daring TikTok nail hacks on this list is a Chrome finish nail. This hack is easy to achieve as all you need is to take the gum wrapper and use its super-chrome foil. You can do this by peeling the two thin layers of the wrapper apart and sticking them onto your nail. You want to make sure that the colourful side is showing. Press it down onto your nails until it sticks before shaping your manicure to remove any excess chrome. Finish it off.

‍

‍

Swirling nail art

‍
Our final TikTok nail hack gives you a salon-worthy manicure with just two nail polish colours and a toothpick. You want to paint your nail in two different parts using the contrasting colours before using the toothpick to create a swirling shape and blend the colours together for an intricate nail art design.

‍
Which of these TikTok nail hacks will you be trying out? Tell us in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: TikTok is our go-to source for beauty hacks – with nails being no exception. Gone are the days when we watched hour-long YouTube videos. Now, we’re glued to the short viral content on TikTok. What’s different about the TikTok beauty community is that it’s more DIY and educational focused. Our favourite influencers are sharing their tips and tricks on how to achieve professional looking results at home – even with your weekly manicure.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: party outfit, last minute party outfit ideas, party look
meta-description: New Year’s Eve is a chance to channel your glamorous side and embrace all the sparkles. The festive season is in full swing.
meta-title: Last Minute Outfit Ideas for Parties
name: Last Minute Outfit Ideas for Parties
post-body:
The countdown is on to 2022. New Year’s Eve is one of our favourite times of the year. After the chaos of 2021 (and 2020!), we’re all ready to celebrate in style. While it might be another quiet New Year’s Eve, there’s no reason why you can’t get dressed up to mark the occasion.

New Year’s Eve is a chance to channel your glamorous side and embrace all the sparkles. While the festive season is in full swing, it’s not too late to put together a last-minute New Year’s Eve outfit. These outfit ideas will help you have your own Cinderella moment before we wave goodbye to 2021.

‍

‍

Luxe sleepwear

‍
Thanks to the latest COVID variant, some of us won’t be heading out for a New Year’s Eve party. It’s no excuse though to sit around the house in your yoga pants. Go all out and get dressed up in your party-worthy sleep wear. We love the feather-trimmed PJs from Sleeper. You can style them with sparkly heels or your cosiest slippers. This NYE outfit is one that you’ll want to post all over your Instagram feed.

It’s the most glamorous – and cosiest – way to see in the new year with a champagne glass in hand. You could even style these PJs for a friend’s NYE party if you’re celebrating together.

‍

‍

Sparkly jumpsuit

‍
While we love dresses, New Year’s Eve can be cold. A sparkly jumpsuit is the answer to all our prayers. It’s right on trend as a classic ‘80s silhouette and it’s a fuss-free look that is perfect if you’ve left your NYE planning until the last minute.

While black and silver is the most popular colour scheme for NYE, don’t be afraid to think outside the box with a neon or pastel shimmer. Look out for a sparkly jumpsuit that has a stretchy material to make it easier to dance the night away.

‍

‍

A sparkly pantsuit

‍
Feminine power dressing works all-year round, including New Year’s Eve. Look out for a matching two-piece suit in your favourite sparkly colour. Gold is a go-to for NYE but as long as it shimmers, you’re good to go! What makes this NYE look stand out is the daring choice of showing off a lace bra under the blazer. Don’t forget to finish your last-minute NYE outfit off with a red lipstick.

‍

‍

The little black dress

‍
When in doubt, go with a little black dress. You’re guaranteed to have one in your closet and it’s the ultimate last minute NYE look. Style your dress with sheer tights and pointed-toe heels for an elevated look to elongate your legs. You can add a tweed or sparkly blazer to layer up and bring along your essentials in a mini bag.

‍

‍

A metallic skirt

‍
A metallic skirt screams New Year’s Eve. It’s the perfect last-minute purchase that can bring the party to your otherwise minimalistic look. You want to let the metallic skirt take centre stage by wearing neutral shades elsewhere in your outfit. This button-up white blouse is effortlessly chic and the white knee-high boots add an ‘80s-inspired twist to the disco-worthy outfit. While we love this pink metallic skirt, you can choose any neon shade that works for you.

‍

‍

50 shades of white

‍
Stand out from the crowd by embracing bridal chic. You don’t have to be saying ‘I do’ to experiment with white. We love this Parisian-inspired NYE look that incorporates a simple white silk dress with an oversized blazer. The layered gold jewellery helps to warm up the outfit and gives it a celebrity-worthy look. This is the last-minute New Year’s Eve outfit we would wear for dinner in the city or a romantic getaway.

‍

‍

The lady in red

‍
A red dress is a festive season must-have – and not just for Christmas. Red is a colour that represents good luck and fortune in Chinese culture, making it the perfect choice to wear when you walk into 2022. If you don’t have a red dress in your closet, treat yourself to one as an end of year treat.

Let the dress take centre stage by keeping the rest of your accessories minimalistic. Gold heels will help make your red dress pop and elongate your legs. Don’t forget to bring along a clutch bag to carry your essentials – including your NYE themed photo props!

Which of these last-minute New Year’s Eve outfits would you wear? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: The countdown is on to 2022. New Year’s Eve is one of our favourite times of the year. After the chaos of 2021 (and 2020!), we’re all ready to celebrate in style. While it might be another quiet New Year’s Eve, there’s no reason why you can’t get dressed up to mark the occasion. New Year’s Eve is a chance to channel your glamorous side and embrace all the sparkles. While the festive season is in full swing, it’s not too late to put together a last-minute New Year’s Eve outfit. These outfit ideas will help you have your own Cinderella moment before we wave goodbye to 2021.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: colour of the year, perwinkle, colour 2022, very peri
meta-description: 2022’s colour of the year is described as “a dynamic periwinkle blue hue with a vivifying violet red undertone”. Pantone are calling the colour ‘Very Peri’
meta-title: Meet the 2022 Pantone Colour of the Year - Periwin
name: Meet the 2022 Pantone Colour of the Year - Periwinkle
post-body:
Goodbye 2021. Hello 2022. Every year, Pantone makes a daring statement about which shade they believe is going to be the so-called ‘colour of the year’. It’s easy to shrug it off and assume it’s a marketing ploy, but the Pantone colour of the year has always been an announcement with its finger on the pulse. When a shade is named as the Pantone colour of the year, it starts appearing everywhere you look.

‍

‍

2022’s colour of the year is described as “a dynamic periwinkle blue hue with a vivifying violet red undertone”. Pantone are calling the colour ‘Very Peri’ with a reference of PANTONE 17-3938. This shade is a new one for Pantone with the Executive Director and Vice President of the Pantone Colour Institute choosing the colour as it embraces the cautious optimism and uncertainty of a world emerging from a global pandemic.

‍
We’re looking at the 2022 Pantone Colour of the Year and how you can incorporate it into your closet, including highlight a few of our favourite must-have products.

‍

Why is periwinkle the colour of the year?

‍
Pantone explained that periwinkle was chosen as the 2022 colour of the year as it defines the moment of time that we live in – putting our future in a new light. Periwinkle blue puts across the feelings that we all have for the future of 2022 and beyond.

‍
It takes a year’s worth of research and trend forecasting for the Pantone Colour Institute to decide its colour of the year. The process starts in late Spring with the Institute taking inspiration from the worlds of fashion and sport. Pantone have pointed out the influence of the gaming world on the choice of ‘Very Peri’ as gaming platforms become even more popular and the metaverse breaks into the mainstream.

‍
Periwinkle is the 2022 colour of the year as it reflects what’s happening in the world around us right now. It takes the faithfulness of blue and blends it with the excitement and energy that comes from red. The warmth of the blue hues creates an empowering colour that represents the idea of embracing the new year ahead.

‍

‍
What periwinkle tells us about 2022

‍
The 2022 choice is a unique one. Pantone hasn’t been afraid to think outside the box. After naming two colours as the ‘colour of the year’ for 2021, they’ve changed it up by creating a custom colour to represent the world right now for their 2022 colour.

‍
According to Pantone, the shade ‘Very Peri’ was created for its “dynamic presence that encourages creativity and imaginative expression”, primarily due to its connection with the digital world and our modern lifestyle with the metaverse and NFTs.

‍
The annual Colour of the Year is named in recognition of the role that colour plays in the way we communicate with each other and express ideas. The decision to make a new shade that fuses together red, violet, and blue is a deliberate choice that represents expanding the possibilities and potential of our future.

‍

Periwinkle and the world of fashion and beauty

‍
So how can we expect to see periwinkle in 2022 trends? It’s blend of blue, red, and violet hues makes universally flattering. With the Y2K aesthetic going strong, you can use periwinkle to have a fun moment with your beauty routine. Imagine futuristic looks, glittery eye makeup, or a matte manicure. Nothing is off limits with periwinkle.

‍
What we love about periwinkle is that it’s also found within the wellness niche. It reminds us of lavender and lilac, two natural plants that evoke a sense of calm in a chaotic world. In their presentation for Very Peri, Pantone included fashion looks from Louis Vuitton, Lanvin, and Chet Lo – showing that the hue is already having a moment.

‍
Looking to jump on the Pantone Colour of the Year for 2022? These are our top picks of beauty, nails, and fashion accessories that incorporate this iconic periwinkle shade. They’re easy ways to add a touch of ‘Very Peri’ to your everyday look without going out of your comfort zone.

• Gucci Rouge a levres Mat Lipstick in 711 Jenny Purple
• OPI Nail Lacquer in Show Us Your Tips!
• Urban Decay 24/7 Eyeshadow Single in Set List
• Tatcha Luminous Dewy Skin Mist
• Manokhi Knotted Leather Headband
• Anastasia Beverly Hills Norvina Pro Pigment Palette Vol. 5

‍
How are you planning to experiment with Pantone’s ‘Very Peri’ in 2022? Leave your thoughts in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: Goodbye 2021. Hello 2022. Every year, Pantone makes a daring statement about which shade they believe is going to be the so-called ‘colour of the year’. It’s easy to shrug it off and assume it’s a marketing ploy, but the Pantone colour of the year has always been an announcement with its finger on the pulse. When a shade is named as the Pantone colour of the year, it starts appearing everywhere you look.

name: 10 New Year’s Makeup Gifts Ideas
post-body:
It’s almost time to wave ‘au revior’ to 2021. Giving someone a New Year’s gift can be the perfect way to keep the holiday season going. New Year’s gifts can also help someone start their year off on the right foot. What better way than to treat them to a new year’s makeup gift?

We’ve searched high and low to bring together a curated list of the top New Year’s makeup gifts ideas. These are the gifts that anyone in your friendship circle will love. Feel like treating yourself? These holiday gift sets are the perfect post-Christmas splurge and will likely feature in the January sales.

Grab your wallet. These New Year’s makeup gifts ideas are all an instant ‘add to cart’.

‍

Glossier - The Makeup Set + The Beauty Bag

‍
Kickstart 2022 with this Glossier gift set. It brings together three of Glossier’s best selling products – their Cloud Paint, Boy Brow, and Lash Slick – along with their iconic pink beauty bag.

It’s the perfect size to fit all your essentials and has a coated cotton exterior for easy cleaning. What we love about this Glossier set is that you can choose the shades for the three beauty products to create a custom gift set.

‍

Gucci – Holiday 2021 Rouge a Levres Mat Lipstick in Goldie Red

‍
Is there anything more classic than a red lip? This Gucci lipstick is the ultimate splurge purchase and the perfect gift for any lipstick fan. As a holiday lipstick, it comes with a special edition tube that incorporates a reimagined retro black print with gold hearts and starts.

‍

Charlotte Tilbury – Pillow Talk On The Go

‍
If you own anything from Charlotte Tilbury, the chances are that you own a Pillow Talk product. This must-have holiday gift set comes with four products, including the lift-effect mascara, lip liner, and the original Pillow Talk lipstick. What we love about this gift set is that it includes a full-size colour chameleon in pillow talk.

‍

Urban Decay x Marvel Studios’ Eternals Eyeshadow Palette

‍
Marvel is one of the most exciting franchise in the cinematic universe. Urban Decay has a long history of working with franchise to create innovative makeup palettes that are a work of art. The recent Eternals film is given the Urban Decay treatment with this eyeshadow palette.

‍

Illamasqua x Amy – Frankly Amy Limited Edition Beauty Box

‍
Amy Winehouse is one of the most iconic singers in recent history. This limited edition Illamasqua gift set includes the products that Amy herself wore and inspired. A portion of the proceeds goes to the Amy Winehouse Foundation. With this limited-edition beauty box, you’ll get a liquid eyeliner, false lashes, eye brow cake, mascara, cream blusher, and sheer lipstick.

‍

‍

KVD Beauty Epic Kisses Gift Set

‍
Our New Year’s beauty gift guide wouldn’t be complete without highlighting a vegan beauty set. This limited-edition mini gift set from KVD Beauty has four hydrating Epic Kiss lipsticks, including the brand’s cult-favourite Lolita shade.

‍

Too Faced Limited Edition 5-Piece Makeup Collection

‍
Make someone’s day with this 5-piece Too Faced makeup collection that contains three full-size products and a limited-edition makeup bag. It includes some of Too Faced’s most popular products to create a feminine eye makeup look and kissable lips.

‍

Selfridges Skincare Essentials Box

‍
Not sure what gift to give the skincare junkie in your life? This Selfridges gift set includes £250 worth of trending skincare products that everyone is raving about right now. It comes in a stunning presentation box and dust bag. You’ll find products from brands like Pixi, The Inkey List, and The Ordinary.

Nars Soft Lust Mini Lip and Blush Duo

‍
Do you want a stocking stuffer for a New Year’s gift? This Nars two-piece comes with two of the brand’s most famous products in a travel-friendly size. It comes in an ornamental packaging in soft pink shades that are universally flattering.

‍

MAC Hypnotizing Holiday Tiny Tricks Mini Lipstick Limited Edition Trio

‍
MAC is one of the best places to look for New Year’s gifts. This three-piece mini lipstick gift set includes the shades Awespicious, Snappy Go Lucky, and Sleight Of Grand in the neutral set. Prefer a pop of colour? This gift set is available in a red trio in the shades Candy Swirl, Eclectic Skeptic, and Razzmatazz. These are the lipsticks that are the perfect plus one for a New Year’s Eve look.

Which of these beauty sets will you be buying as a New Year’s gift? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
