It’s usually recommended that you only use three or four colours per garment. Don’t forget to do the other side of your shirt!

‍
• Put your shirt into a zip-lock bag and seal it tight. Leave in a warm place for at least 24 hours to allow the colours to bond.

‍
• Once it’s ready, take off the bands and run the shirt under cold water. You might be surprised by how much dye runs off but don’t panic! Keep going until the water runs clear.

‍

Distressed Denim

‍
If there’s one aesthetic that’s all over TikTok, it’s the laidback VSCO girl. After all, TikTok is their playground. You’ll spot all the main TikTok influencers dancing around in their loose-fitting denim jeans. You can embrace the trend by adding a pair of distressed jeans – the more distressed, the better!

‍
To fully embrace the TikTok trends, you’ll want to wear your distressed denim with a short crop top or an oversized sweater that you’ve tie-dyed at home. Don’t forget your classic white sneakers or Air Force 1s.

‍

Oversized Sweatshirts + Bicycle Shorts

‍
If there’s one person that is universally loved on TikTok, it’s the late Princess Diana and her 90s fashion. You can thank the Netflix show, The Crown, and the resurgence of 90s fashion as a genre within the fashion industry for this trend. One of Lady Di’s most iconic looks for Gen Z was her signature workout look – an oversized sweatshirt and tight bicycle shorts. Most of TikTok’s influencers are on a hunt for the late Princess’ OG sweatshirts to fully recreate her look.

‍
For this trend, you want to choose a neutral-tone pair of bicycle shorts. If you’re feeling brave, think outside the box and choose a pastel shade. For your sweater, it’s best to look for one that’s vintage or looks like it could be a hand-me-down from your parents or boyfriend. It should be visibly oversized and give you enough room to layer a t-shirt and sports bra underneath.

‍
To complete your look, you want a pair of sporty ankle socks and your favourite collectible sneakers. Don’t forget to have a Starbies in hand!

‍

90s Sunglasses

‍
Speaking of the 90s, if there’s one accessory that everyone is wearing (and promoting!) it’s 90s sunglasses. You want to pick up a pair of shades with tinted lenses, whether it’s classic aviators or a octagonal shape. The more unique the sunglasses, the better.

‍
One thing you’ll want to consider when choosing your TikTok worthy sunglasses is your face shape, as this will largely determine which style of glasses works for you. The general rule of thumb is to choose the opposite of your face shape. If your face is round, go with squared shades. If you have a heart shaped face, you can wear virtually any style.

‍

Baseball Caps

‍
While this trend is mainly back thanks to the resurgence in 90s and early 2000s nostalgia, it’s a practical one. Whether you’re having a bad hair day or are jumping on a transatlantic flight, a baseball cap is an outfit essential for days when you want to keep a low profile. For a few years, this closet staple was thought of as something your dad would wear on a foreign holiday.

‍
Well, not anymore!

‍
You can wear a baseball cap with anything from your smock summer dress to the loungewear set that you can’t be parted from. If you want a baseball cap that’s wearable for every day, choose one in a minimalistic neutral or earth-tone that you can mix and match with your other closet essentials.

‍
You want to find a baseball cap that comfortably fits on your head and that you can wear with your hair both up or down. If you want to embrace the TikTok vibe, look around and see if you can pick-up a vintage one for a sustainable twist. You can also use your baseball cap to show off your sporty side – whether you support an F1 team or a baseball league.

‍
Which of these TikTok fashion trends are your favourite? Do you have a favourite TikTok influencer? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: TikTok has created a whole new wave of influencers, whose sudden popularity can rival that of even established youtubers and other bloggers who have spent years cultivating their image and social media following. All you have to do is look at the likes of Addison Rae – who has even featured in Keeping Up With The Kardashians – to see the power these new-age influencers have. If there’s a fashion trend on the horizon, you can be use that Addison, Charli D’Amelio or Madi Monroe are already all over it.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: livestream, sales, e-commerce, livestream tips, recommendations
meta-description: Seeing a dip in your sales? Or, want to increase them more? Livestream can help you do that without having to spend a lot.
meta-title: 6 Tips to Improve Your Sales with Livestream
name: 6 Tips to Improve Your Sales with Livestream
post-body:
Seeing a dip in your sales? Or, want to increase them more? Livestream can help you do that without having to spend a lot.
You can use this powerful marketing strategy to attract the right audience and scale your business sales even with a lean budget.
In this article, we’ll be diving into some powerful strategies that you can use to maximize your product sales.
By the end of it, you’ll be ready to outclass your competitors and gain more customers.
Let’s jump right into the strategies now.

Promote Your Livestream Before Going Live

‍
Doing a livestream for the sake of going live should never be the goal. You should be doing it to attract maximum prospects and make them act on your offer.

‍
Schedule Your Livestreams

‍
Livestreams are one-to-one. You can gain a lot of attention from your prospective customers using the immediacy a livestream offers.
But, it wouldn’t be practical to just go live without informing your potential customers in advance. You can’t be sure if most of them are even available to interact with you live.
What you can do is, schedule your livestream so that people that want to connect with you dedicate that time to it.
Create a poster and include the exact date and time of the livestream. Share it on your social media accounts.
You can get started with Jumble’s own dedicated livestream software and schedule your livestreams ahead of time.

Write a Comprehensive Livestream Description

‍
Your live stream description helps you tell your prospects what you’re going to talk about.
So, you must write a description that not only compels them to mark their calendars but sets their expectations right as well.
Tell them what topics you will be covering, how it will benefit them, and who would benefit the most.
What’s more, find out relevant keywords and use them in your livestream description. This can push your content to the relevant audience on different platforms.
Let’s say you are promoting your livestream on Facebook. Including keywords in the livestream description can help the platform put your content in front of the right users.

‍
Post it Everywhere

‍
After scheduling your livestream and producing promotional content, post it everywhere you think your target customer is hanging out.
It doesn’t matter whether you are using a social media platform or our dedicated livestream software at Jumble.
You should get the word out about your livestream on every social media account. Moreover, if you have an email list, send them an email telling them when you are going live.
You can also ask your friends and family to spread the word around and maximize your reach.
The more your plans get in front of relevant people, the more your chances to engage with the right people.
And, the more will be the chances of generating sales.

Ask Prospects to Register

‍
You can kill two birds with one stone using this strategy. By registering people for your livestream, you’ll also be collecting their contact information, which you can use later in your marketing efforts.
You can also make sure they don’t miss the live event by sending them a final reminder just before going live.
The bottom line is, the more viewers you can attract, the higher sales you can generate.

Work with an Influencer

‍
Influencer marketing is a relatively new strategy that’s bringing great results in virtually every industry. Look at this stat: Marketers get a $5.78 ROI (return on investment) for every $1 spent on influencer marketing.
To leverage influencer marketing, all you’d need to do is find the right influencer and host a livestream with them.
In addition to engaging your existing audience with your brand, this strategy will attract new prospects, allowing you to increase your sales.
Try to get the influencer to use your product and review it on the livestream. It shouldn’t have to be too salesy. Just an honest review will do.
People trust the influencers they follow. So, when a credible influencer recommends a product, the followers are likely to follow suit.

Engage with the Audience

‍
Keeping your livestream engaging should be your top priority. Your livestream should be interesting and encourage viewers to interact with you.
Ask your audience to ask anything they want to know about your products or brand. Answer them right there if you can.
Alternatively, you can note the most relevant questions and answer them in your next stream.
Importantly, don’t go overboard with the timing of the livestream. Even if someone has got time for you, they would prefer to go somewhere else if your livestream doesn’t address their interests.  
It all comes down to sales: A higher engagement will almost always lead to higher sales volume.

Show the Product Live

‍
Livestream provides an excellent platform for showcasing what your product can do. While eCommerce offers great convenience, it still lacks the intimate product-consumer connection. Something a customer can only experience at a brick-and-mortar shop.
What you can do is, show every benefit and feature of your product on a livestream and do an open question and answer session at the end.
The more your audience is going to know about your product, the more people you’ll be able to convert.
Ask your livestream host to show the product in action to make the viewers understand how they are supposed to use it.
Another way to educate your viewers about your product would be to create a short explainer video about the product.
You can play it within the livestream. Then, answer any potential questions that the audience might have about the explainer video.
Showing every detail of your product will not only help you get more sales, but it’ll also reduce your product return rate.
How? Because when there is nothing that the consumer doesn’t know about the product, there will be no reason to return it.

Conduct Live Question and Answer Sessions

‍
As a brand, you want to address every question your potential buyers have. Any unanswered query leaves doubt in their minds. This can hurt your conversions or sales.
There will be a large chunk of consumers that need to know everything about a product before they can invest in it.
These high-quality sales will help you create top-notch content that’ll satisfy virtually every consumer out there.
The best way is to conduct a special question and answer live session about your product. Give the control to your audience. Let them ask whatever they want. Try answering every query about your product in the simplest way possible.
Moreover, Q&A sessions will help you establish yourself as a trusted brand in your industry. When you can address their pain points effectively, you gain their trust.
Make sure when you end your session, you leave your audience completely satisfied, ready to make their purchase decision confidently.

Leverage FOMO (Fear of Missing Out)

‍
Fear of missing out is one of the most effective selling tactics. It simply works because consumers don’t want to miss out on an opportunity.
Many consumers don’t act because they leave it for later. This attitude can easily lead to inaction. Using FOMO, you can push these prospects over the edge and make them buy your product.
What you can do is, offer something that your potential buyers don’t want to miss out on. For instance, slash 10% off if they buy your product during the livestream.
As the offer will only be valid until the stream ends, you’d be leveraging the fear of missing out. Tell them what price they would have to pay after the offer ends.
Another impactful strategy to get people to pull their wallets out is offering product bundles at a relatively lower price.
But again, your offer should only stand for a limited period. Make sure you don’t keep it after the deadline. Otherwise, your prospects might not believe you the next time. And, customers’ trust is an important asset in business.  
You can also use other techniques to evoke the FOMO. These include:
• Mentioning a celebrity or an influencer
• Showing social proof or customer testimonials
• Offering a discount for a limited number of sales

Final Thoughts

‍
A livestream isn’t only great for connecting with your prospects, but it can also help you increase your sales.
Using an engaging livestream, you can educate your audience about your product, helping them make an informed buying decision.
You can also use the FOMO during your livestreams by offering a limited-time offer to make more sales. In addition, show social proof and answer any questions the audience might have to build your trust and credibility.
It all comes down to this: An engaging livestream can help you get more sales. You just need to educate your prospects about your product and connect with them on a personal level.

‍
post-summary: Seeing a dip in your sales? Or, want to increase them more? Livestream can help you do that without having to spend a lot. You can use this powerful marketing strategy to attract the right audience and scale your business sales even with a lean budget. In this article, we’ll be diving into some powerful strategies that you can use to maximize your product sales. By the end of it, you’ll be ready to outclass your competitors and gain more customers. Let’s jump right into the strategies now.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: boho-chic, style, fashion, trend, 2022 boho style
meta-description: If you’re interested in experimenting with the unconventional and laidback aesthetic of bohemian chic, then you’re in the right place!
meta-title: Everything You Need to Know About Boho-Chic
name: Everything You Need to Know About Boho-Chic
post-body:
Bohemian chic (known as ‘boho chic’) is a trend that is back in vogue thanks to the resurgence of the 70s trends. If you’re a free-spirited person who loves to wear their heart of their sleeve, then this aesthetic will be right up your street. The aesthetic goes hand-in-hand with the hippie movement of the 1970s. It’s characterised by natural fabrics, neutral colour palettes, and statement accessories.


What makes boho chic unique is that it is more than just a fashion trend, it’s a lifestyle and a culture. While we think of the bohemian fashion movement as starting in the 1970s, the origins of the movement dates further back to the 19th century. What made the bohemian fashion trends so popular in the 1970s is because they are laidback and an alternative to the more conservative fashion that dominated the 1950s and 60s. It reflected the liberal movement that eloped the decade.

‍

‍
People are attracted to the boho chic aesthetic as it is effortlessly chic, with loose-fitting clothing and easy to style accessories. With boho chic, you can mix and match your favourite pieces. The fashion of the bohemian aesthetic comes from the bohemians, who were present in France during the revolution. The bohemians were primarily artist who lost out on their former comfortable lifestyles after the revolution put an end to their wealthy patronage.

‍
If you’re interested in experimenting with the unconventional and laidback aesthetic of bohemian chic, then you’re in the right place! This guide tells you everything that you need to know about fashion aesthetic, where it comes from, and how you can incorporate it into your closet.

‍

The Origins of Bohemian Fashion

‍
Bohemian style has always been seen as an alternative fashion aesthetic from the contemporary trends. Bohemian fashion has evolved from exotic style to what we know today as ‘boho chic’.

‍
The first record of Bohemians appears in the 18th century, during the French revolution. The term ‘bohemian’ came to describe the counterculture within France, made up primarily of those who had an Eastern European descent. The fashion of the bohemian movement made its first appearance a century later, with its characteristic flowy garments, with oriental-inspired patterns and colourful fabrics. These features were juxtaposed against the more tailored and formal fashion of the time. Most of the characteristics that make up boho chic today have their origins in this time period.

‍
The early 20th century is when bohemian fashion had its next update. One of the most significant features was Paul Poiret, who incorporated ethnic detailing and Middle Eastern elements. It was during this time that William Morris, the popular interior designer and fashion designer, began to incorporate bohemian motifs into his work.

‍
Bohemian fashion took on another life in the 1960s, when it came into partnership with the hippie movement. Both the fashion and philosophy rebuked the conventional lifestyle. The popularity of the hippie movement brought bohemian fashion into the mainstream. New clothing styles came to define the fashion aesthetic, including delicate embroidery, voluminous sleeves, fringe detailing, and flared trousers. The hippie movement adopted the bohemian fashion because they saw it as a physical representation of their rejection of established social constructions. The free-flowing silhouettes of the bohemian aesthetic came in contrast with the more polished and streamlined look of the rest of society.

‍

‍

The Must-Have Pieces for a Boho Chic Closet

‍
Whenever you’re experimenting with a new aesthetic, the easiest way to incorporate it into your lifestyle is to build a capsule closet. That way you can have pieces to mix and match with your existing closet. You only need a handful of pieces to get you started on your boho chic journey. Due to its love of prints and bright colours, you can mix and match virtually any two pieces together. The ‘rules’ around styling for boho chic is more relaxed than any other aesthetic.

‍
Boho chic is synonymous with is neutral-tone palette, but over recent years, pastel colours have found their way into the aesthetic. The purpose of bohemian fashion is to reflect your personality and values. As a free-flowing aesthetic, you can put your own twist on bohemian fashion to make it your own.

‍

‍

Bohemian + Boho Chic Tops

‍
When you’re shopping for boho chic tops, you want to search for loose and relaxed fitted silhouettes. Some of the most popular shirt styles incorporate bell sleeves with a half or three-quality length sleeve. It’s not unusual to see decorative elements, like pompoms and tassels, attached to the collars of these blouses. Depending on your preferred look, you can add a boho chic top with a v-neckline or an off-the-shoulder cut. These loose-fitting tops can be styled with everything from classic denim shorts to flared trousers. If you’re starting out with bohemian fashion, these tops are a perfect way to experiment with the look.

Bohemian + Boho Chic Trousers

‍
There is a more versatile selection of trousers for you to choose from. You can add anything from flared jeans to a maxi skirt or denim shorts to your capsule boho chic closet. A general rule of thumb is that you want to find trousers with a flared silhouette, while dresses should have a flowy feel, with mixed prints and added embroidery.

‍
Bohemian + Boho Chic Dresses

‍
Perhaps what boho chic is most known for is its beautiful dresses, which anyone can enjoy throughout the spring and summer months. The most popular styles are those with an a-line cut and relaxed fit. You’ll rarely see full-length sleeve, as most re either half or three-quality length. For maxi dresses, off-the-shoulder prairie designs are popular, incorporating mixed prints and embroideries.

Bohemian + Boho Chic Outerwear

‍
Finding bohemian outerwear is one of the easiest pieces to add to your capsule closet. The easiest way to do so is with thrifted or second-hand pieces. It’s worth looking out for distressed denim jackets, kimonos that feature classic bohemian motifs, and sheepskin coats. You want to find outwear that is comfortable and relaxed, with slightly oversized fit. Boho chic clothing is never skin-tight or too form fitting.

Bohemian + Boho Chic Footwear

‍
When it comes to bohemian footwear, leather is king. You want to think of footwear similar to what you might wear to a music festival or during the summer. It’s worth looking out for suede ankle boots for the colder months and leather sandals for the spring and summer months. Classic boho chic footwear focuses on warm hues, like brown and beige colours. If you decide to wear a platform shoe, you want to avoid stilettoes and instead choose a chunky or block heel.

‍

‍
Bohemian + Boho Chic Accessories

‍
If you’re starting to experiment with boho chic for the first time, you can choose some accessories to add to your existing closet. Bohemian accessories have hardly changed since the 70s, making them perfect pieces to pick up on the second-hand or vintage market. Your accessories should focus on ethnic patters and mixed prints, with braid detailing and patchwork designs. If you’re looking for jewellery, search for pieces with an antique finish. Other features to look out for include fringe and tassel detailing, whether it’s on scarves or handbags.

‍

‍

Current Boho Chic Trends

‍
Some of the biggest trends of 2022 have a bohemian feel to them. Tie-dye is the perfect example of this. It has the same use of colour and the unconventional nature to it. As the tie-dye trend reached its peak in the 60s and 70s, especially within the hippie movement, it’s long been linked to bohemian fashion. If you want to give your bohemian chic a contemporary feel, tie-dye is a trend you can incorporate into your closet. You can either DIY the pieces yourself or buy them from a mainstream brand.

Where to Look for Boho Chic Inspiration

‍
If you’re looking for a bohemian chic fashion muse, you’re in luck. From the early 2000s onwards, bohemian fashion became a popular casual style for everyone from celebrities to movie stars and singers. It was in the late 2000s that bohemian fashion truly entered the mainstream and began to dominate trends, as clothing aesthetics were beginning to become more relaxed as well.

‍
While Stevie Nicks and Donna Summer are considered the queens of bohemian chic in the 1960s and 70s, there are more contemporary celebrities that you can take inspiration from.

‍
Rachel Zoe, the celebrity stylist and designer, is faithful to her love of boho chic, which she blends with elevated basics for a contemporary look. Her involvement with celebrities like Nicole Ritchie meant she was a driving force behind the popularity of bohemian fashion in the late 2000s.

Before Mary-Kate and Ashley Olsen transitioned to modest fashion, the twins were famous for their love of whimsical bohemian style. Other actress with a love for boho chic is Vanessa Hudgens. The High School Musical star was almost always photographed wearing flowing skirts, maxi dresses, and gladiator shoes.

‍
When in doubt, imagine what you would wear to Coachella. The music festival’s aesthetic works hand-in-hand with the idea of bohemian chic. Just take a look at what celebrities and influencers are wearing to the festival to get an idea of the sort of outfits you could wear.

‍
What do you think of boho chic fashion? Is it an aesthetic that you want to incorporate into your own closet? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: Bohemian chic (known as ‘boho chic’) is a trend that is back in vogue thanks to the resurgence of the 70s trends. If you’re a free-spirited person who loves to wear their heart of their sleeve, then this aesthetic will be right up your street. The aesthetic goes hand-in-hand with the hippie movement of the 1970s. It’s characterised by natural fabrics, neutral colour palettes, and statement accessories.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: fashion, style, fashion tips, 90s trends
meta-description: Here are some of our favourite parts of the back in the days trends that are turning heads to themselves once again!
meta-title: The best 90’s trends that are back this year
name: Some of the best 90’s trends that are back
post-body:
The 90’s fashion is one of the most iconic and standout epoques in fashion. The less bizarre than the 80’s yet not less interesting combinations and pieces that stand out with their simplicity, elements that marked a decade. It is interesting to observe how cycles in fashion keep coming around and are being recycled, yet the 90’s has left the most prominent mark and its comeback is engraved in the classics list. While the list goes on and on and can be summarized by ‘dad’s fashion’, there is more that we would like to turn your attention to. While some might only come back the second time around for season, there are undoubtedly others that have become a must have. Here are some of our favourite parts of the back in the days trends that are turning heads to themselves once again:

Heels with socks

Screaming out Carrie Broadshow, this combination so awkward yet so catchy, screams confidence and fun weirdness. Definitely a harder one to match with your outfit, however to be able to pull this one off is a bold fashionista move. Elegant heels with patterned or even simple white socks will add funk to whatever you put on. You might consider how well it goes with oversized blazers and a short skirt, or under long pants. Think of intricate lace socks with high platform heels, or knee high socks with platforms, under a cute dress. Sporty Nike socks with elegant heels, under a funky dress. Quirky and flashy, with such a small detail your whole outfit is transformed.


Mesh and sheer

Give quite a big sneak peak of your shapes, mesh tops with a cheeky bralette have come back around a while ago and have become the ultimate basic party go-to. Sheer dresses are the perfect solution for a restaurant day on the beach, covering you up just enough while allowing you to feel free and loose. Flowy long sheer dresses give you the perfect balance between intricacy and boldness, leaving you to be seen between the folds flowing in the wind.


Windbreakers

This absolute classic is one that all of us must have in our wardrobe. Handy and easy to match with anything, we specifically like patterned ones more, over the plain Nike ones. Perfect on a sunny day with cold wind, in autumn over a sweater, on your mountain hike, on your walk down to get groceries. A bike ride or a day with friends, this casual piece of clothing is handy and simple to use for different occasions and with different moods.


Spaghetti straps

The only downside of this element is finding the right and comfortable enough bra to wear with it. A tank top with spaghetti straps becomes a strap top you can wear with a cheek outfit, match it with pants, jeans or any skirt and throw on some heels. The most iconic use of this element however is in a dress. Elegance and fragile, emphasizing the delicate neckline and revealing the shoulders, this is bound to make you slay at any event. Think any fashion icon back in the 90’s and most in our 21st century, all own at least one dress with straps like these. We love how feminine it is, accentuating some of the most beautiful parts of our bodies.


Wide-legged, slouchy and pencil trousers

You see more and more that low effort outfits are not necessarily making anyone less dressed up. We are loving how many big brands are embracing the-wider-the-better move, making the trousers looser, wider and more flowy. High waisted pants matched with some platform heels or boots or even just slides are a summer look you must have this year. Casual yet chic, relaxed yet dressed up.


Thick headbands

Blaire Waldorf with her iconic move with these headbands has shown how much character a small detail can give to your look. Cute and bold, there are thousands of styles of these thick headbands you can find. Colorful and playful patterns with your summer dress or a more classy one to go with your little black dress. Accessories can make all the change sometimes and these headbands are a unique touch to add to your collection. Try getting a little scarf of the same color as the headband and connecting it to your bag.


Claw clips

The fastest way to get a classy hairstyle with just one move. Throw it in your bag on a not so good hair day and you will have a little something to throw it back in one move. We do enjoy the smaller claw clips for a half up half down look, but those long ones that you can use to collect all of your hair, twisting it around in a sausage and putting it upwards against the back of your scalp. You can create the famous slicked back low ponytail.


Slip dresses

The definition of classy minimalist look is perfect for a night out or a little aesthetically pleasing picnic, we especially love the satin dresses. The way they underline the figure especially when a bit loose, the material and the way it flows down will make anyone feel glowy. An interesting twist to it is to wear it over a t-shirt with some combat boots or platform shoes.


Sleeveless vests and jackets

The sleeveless sweater vests are the ultimate 2020-2021 piece. Perfect for spring or a summer night, easy to wear and easier to use to add some class to any simple outfit, this piece is a classic to obtain. Sleeveless pieces can be tougher to match during a cold season, but a tight long sleeve top or sweater is the perfect combination. Sleeveless jackets are lifesavers for between season times and can be worn as easily to the shop as out to a restaurant or terrasse.


Baggy

The ultimate quality of 90s fashion is baggy. Baggy everything. It makes everything more comfortable and not any less stylish. Baggy jeans weather flared or mom jeans are to hunt for, often designed well by some brands in a way it does not take away from your form but only enhances them, while keeping it super casual and cool. Oversized has been in for a while and it certainly another feeling to put a baggy t-shirt or hoodie over some tighter bottoms. However, the bigger the better.


Slides

With some of the most luxurious brands taking their turn to incorporate these classics in their collections, there are really some to die for. Arguably the most comfortable and comforting shoes, these make you feel at home anywhere you go. For a perfect beach lunch or stroll around on a sunny day, you can get these fluffy or a tighter fit. Practically matchable with anything, slides have made their mark in history for a reason.
post-summary: The 90’s fashion is one of the most iconic and standout epoques in fashion. The less bizarre than the 80’s yet not less interesting combinations and pieces that stand out with their simplicity, elements that marked a decade. It is interesting to observe how cycles in fashion keep coming around and are being recycled, yet the 90’s has left the most prominent mark and its comeback is engraved in the classics list. While the list goes on and on and can be summarized by ‘dad’s fashion’, there is more that we would like to turn your attention to. While some might only come back the second time around for season, there are undoubtedly others that have become a must have. Here are some of our favourite parts of the back in the days trends that are turning heads to themselves once again:

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: skincare, skin glow, beauty tips, skin type, daily routine
meta-description: With summer just around the corner, it’s the perfect time to get on top of your skincare routine. Here is our guide.
meta-title: The Skincare Tips You Need To Create a Dewy Glow
name: The Skincare Tips You Need To Create a Dewy Glow
post-body:
Beauty trends have all shifted their focus to skincare. After a year of working from home, without an inch of makeup in sight, we’ve come to appreciate being able to give our skin a break. The new ‘beauty standard’ is the idea of a dewy glow. The secret to glass-like skin and obtaining a brighter complexion, is to be consistent with your skincare routine. It’s about more than just using a cleanser and moisturizer. There’s so much more to your skincare than that.


Every so often, you want to refresh your skincare routine to make sure it’s working for you. Whether you’re a newbie to the world of skincare or a seasoned professional, our guide includes tips and tricks for curating a skincare routine that will help you create a dewy glow. With summer just around the corner, it’s the perfect time to get on top of your skincare routine.

‍

‍

We’ve broken our guide down in sections, covering everything you need to know about the products you should use every day, the ingredients to look out for, and what else you should be doing for your skin.

‍

‍
Consider Your Skin Type

‍
Before you can jump into buying products, you have to consider your skin type. While we often think of terms like ‘oily’, ‘dry’, and ‘combination’ skin, we sometimes overlook the realities of problematic skin. This term is more ambiguous, but it’s essentially a skin type where you suffer from problems or inconveniences like dry patches, excess oil production, and breakouts. You could fall into any of the mainstream categories, while also having problematic skin.

‍
Whatever your skin type is, you want to consider the reality of dead skin cells. The main cause for dull-looking skin is dead skin cells and impurities that clog up your pores and create an uneven texture. Your skin sheds thousands of dead skin cells every day. If you have sensitive skin, you’ll want to pay extra attention to the cleansers that you use.

‍
Wherever possible, it’s best to look for natural ingredients that will nourish you skin and avoid irritants like parabens and chemicals that might irritate your skin. One thing you want to avoid in general is artificial fragrance, including essential oils.

‍

Knowing Which Skincare Products to Use

‍
You want to develop a consistent skincare routine that you can follow both morning and night. Your routines should be fairly similar for both parts of the day, but you can swap out specific products, like your moisturizer, to better target your skin overnight. The night-time is when your skin is working overtime to repair and renew your skin cells, so you can use more potent products then to boost your complexion/

You don’t have to use a ten or twelve-part skincare routine (like a Korean skincare routine). Carefully choosing five or six products that work for your skin can be just as effective. Your skincare routine should be four steps. Cleanse, tone, treat and moisturise. Your cleanser and toner remove the dead skin cells and impurities from your skin, while tightening your pores and evening your skin surface. By cleaning your skin, these products make it easier for you to absorb the active ingredients in your products.

The ‘treating’ stage of your skincare routine is where you can personalise it to meet your specific skincare concerns with serums and oils. It’s worth researching what ingredients work best for your skin type. You can incorporate products like caffeine, which can help reduce the appearance of dark under eye circles. Vitamin E is another ingredient worth looking out, as it works for all skin types. This ingredient will reduce sun damage and help diminish the appearance of scars and imperfections on your skin, while giving you a boost of hydration.

A moisturizer is the final step of your skincare routine. It serves to hydrate your skin and lock-in the active ingredients in your other products. You can swap your moisturizer out at night-time for a thicker formula to help repair your skin on cellular level overnight. Moisturizer is the one product you can’t afford to skip. It’s the secret to a dewy glow as it leaves your skin plump and hydrated, while preventing signs of premature aging.

When it comes to your morning routine, you want to finish off your routine with an SPF. Sun damage and oxidative stress can damage your skin’s protective barrier, leading to premature aging and causing your skin to look dull. You want to make sure to reapply your sunscreen throughout the day, as it typically only offers a few hours of protection. It’s also worth considering the impact of blue light damage on our skin. Siting in front of your laptop for six hours can cause as much damage as being in the mid-day sun for 25 minutes.

Along with maintaining a regular skincare routine to keep your skin hydrated, you want to add in extras like face masks. These treatments can help your overall self-care, as well as your skin. They’re easy to add in as an occasional treatment, whether it’s once a week or every few days. High-quality sheet masks will help the serum absorb into your skin for optimum results and can create a glass-like effect for your skin.

‍

‍

The Best Skincare Ingredients to Use

‍

If you want to brighten your complexion and create a radiant glow, you need vitamin C in your routine. This ingredient has anti-inflammatory properties. It brightens your complexion by diminishing the appearance of redness in your skin, while smoothing its texture to create a dewy glow. Vitamin C also helps with whitening your skin by treating hyperpigmentation as it’s been proven to impede melanin production, which can cause dark spots and melasma on your skin.

To keep your skin youthful and glowing, you want to incorporate hyaluronic acid. You can find this ingredient in serums or incorporated into moisturizers and facial creams. Hyaluronic acid is something you naturally find in your body, inside your connective tissue. It plays a role in your skin’s structure and is just as essential as collagen for keeping your skin looking youthful. Hyaluronic acid can hold up to thousand times its weight in water, helping to maintain your skin’s moisture [levels and boost your protective barrier.

We’re highlighting these two ingredients because they can be used in partnership to create a dewy complexion. These two ingredients complement each other by hydrating and protecting your skin. Using vitamin C and hyaluronic acid together will reduce the risk of any irritation that might be triggered from the vitamin C by keeping your skin moisturised and aiding the healing process.

‍

‍

Invest in Skin Treatments

‍
While your skincare routine helps to care for your skin on a day-to-day basis, it sometimes needs a helping hand. Just like your skincare routine, the secret to experimenting with skincare treatments is to be consistent. Dermatologists typically recommend having a facial at least once a month. If you decide to choose a specialist treatment like plasma injections, your dermatologist will be able to recommend a course of sessions for you.

‍
You don’t have to go to a spa or salon to indulge in a skin treatment. Investing in a jade roller and gua sha means you can add massages into your regular skincare routine. These two tools are an affordable way of improving the overall condition of your skin. They work by promoting lymphatic drainage and stimulating your circulation to relax your muscles and detoxify your skin. Both a gua sha and jade roller will tone and lift your skin.

‍

Avoid Falling Asleep Wearing Your Makeup

‍
Sometimes it happens. Maybe you’ve gotten in from work late and fallen asleep on the sofa. Whatever the reason, you don’t want to let it become a habit. Falling asleep with your makeup on can cause chaos for your skin by clogging your pores. It’s usually best to use an oil-based makeup remover if you use more pigmented beauty products, such as intense eyeshadow shades. While makeup wipes can stripe your skin of its moisture, it’s better to use makeup wipes if you’re in a rush than to let yourself fall asleep with your makeup on. If you wake up and remember you’ve got a face full of makeup on, you can double cleanse with a cleansing balm and a face wash.

Get Some Sleep

‍
The concept of ‘beauty sleep’ isn’t just an empty phrase. Getting eight hours of sleep can help reduce puffiness around your eyes and rejuvenate dull-looking skin. When you’re asleep, your skin has the chance to repair and renew itself on a cellular level. Sleeping better will improve your energy levels and boost your blood flow and circulation. When you’re dealing with sleep deprivation or insomnia, you start to suffer from blood flow issues that can give your skin a dull-looking appearance. When you have an increased blood flow to your face, you get the natural flush to your cheeks that accentuates your inner radiance.

What are your skincare goals? Are there specific products and ingredients that you swear by? Let us know in the comments below.

‍
post-summary: Beauty trends have all shifted their focus to skincare. After a year of working from home, without a inch of makeup in sight, we’ve come to appreciate being able to give our skin a break. The new ‘beauty standard’ is the idea of a dewy glow. The secret to glass-like skin and obtaining a brighter complexion, is to be consistent with your skincare routine. It’s about more than just using a cleanser and moisturizer. There’s so much more to your skincare than that.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: live streaming, popular, e-commerce, Livestream Shopping, marketing
meta-description: We’ll see how livestream shopping has become so popular and why is it the next big thing in online shopping.
meta-title: Why has live streaming become so popular?
name: Why has live streaming become so popular?
post-body:
The fact that eCommerce has only been growing since its inception tells us a lot about consumer behavior.
They don’t always want to visit brick-and-mortar stores and browse through the products to buy something.
Why bother when you can buy the same thing from your device?
However, an eCommerce store doesn’t offer much insight into the products it is offering. Livestream shopping does.
In this article, we’ll see how livestream shopping has become so popular and why is it the next big thing in online shopping.
Let’s get started.

Livestream Shopping Offers a Better Buying Experience

‍
As a brand, you want your customers to have the best experience with the buying process. The easier it is to purchase a product, the more sales you’ll generate as a brand.
On a livestream, your audience can purchase your products while interacting with you live. They can have the necessary peace of mind about the product before pulling out their wallets.

‍
It Demands Less Resources

‍
You won’t need to invest as many resources in livestreams as you’d in an on-demand video. For a successful livestream, you’d just be needing a decent camera with a microphone, a device, a livestream software like Jumble.tv, and an audio mixer.
Video editing isn’t a requirement for livestreams. But, if you can do that as well, you’d reach more consumers, which can expand your reach on your next livestreams.

‍
It’s More Engaging

‍
Another reason why livestream shopping is blowing up is that it’s probably the most engaging content format.
The audience can interact with your brand and ask any questions they might have about your products.
It humanizes your brand and helps you form a more personal connection with prospective buyers and existing customers.
Plus, you can make sure they get every information they need to make buying decisions without hesitation.

Anyone Can Access it from Anywhere

‍
Your prospects don’t need to switch their TVs ON to join your livestreams. They can access them from anywhere they want, through their mobile phones.
This allows you to reach a lot of prospects, making livestream shopping an effective strategy to boost sales.
So, the broad reach of livestream is another reason why it’s blowing up.

‍
It Has Proven to be Effective

‍
Before China applied the concept of livestream shopping, it wasn’t known to produce any results.
It was only after Chinese eCommerce companies’ successful endeavor with livestream shopping that the rest of the world is following suit.
It’s a tried and tested method. Its effectiveness is evident from the fact that giants like Facebook, Amazon, and Instagram have introduced their own livestream platforms to engage the audience.

‍
It’s Convenient and Easy

‍
A livestream is easy to implement and manage. You don’t need many resources either. Platforms like Jumble.tv make it quite convenient for brands to set up their own livestream and engage with their audience.

It’s Cost-effective

‍
You won’t need a premium camera to carry out your livestreams. A decent USB camera with 1080p screen resolution will do fine.
There are no added costs to running a livestream except when you are using an influencer as a host.
That too will bring in great ROI if you chose the right influencer for your brand.
Plus, during a livestream, you can have more sales in a short period. So, your investment in it would be virtually nothing compared to what you can achieve from it.

‍
It Offers Better Insights into the Product

‍
Livestreaming allows you to showcase your products in a way no other medium can. While eCommerce offers one-click purchases, your prospects can see the product in action before buying it on a livestream.
For instance, if you are a clothing brand, you can try them on and let the audience observe different aspects of the clothes.
The viewers can ask any questions they want about the products, which leads to a higher conversion rate.

It Uses Influencer Marketing

‍
Influencer marketing is an effective way to generate sales. Doesn’t matter what type of business you are in, if you can find the right influencer, you can boost your sales.
As livestream shopping requires a host, you can ask a suitable influencer to do that for you. Just make sure to go with a micro-influencer that has previous experience in your niche.
By tapping into the audience of a particular influencer, you’d be multiplying your chances of getting conversions. This is because micro-influencers normally have a highly engaged following. Their audiences tend to trust them.
So, when they’d recommend your products to their audience, there is no reason why your sales won’t go up.

‍
It Taps into Content Marketing

‍
There is a strong relation between livestream shopping and content marketing. Without powerful content, it would be quite difficult to sell to new audiences.
Using livestream shopping, brands help their audiences understand their industry, help them with using the products, and provide insights into the product selection process.
High-value, user-centric content builds your trust with the audience, which, ultimately, leads to more sales.
And, sales are what every brand out there is looking for. Everything revolves around getting more sales, be it brand awareness or brand identity.
So, as content marketing proves to be an effective form of marketing for driving sales, livestream shopping is also blowing up.

Final Thoughts

‍
There are quite a few reasons why livestream shopping is blowing up. For starters, it’s a great way to showcase your products as a brand and get sales.
It bridges the gap that eCommerce doesn’t: Providing the prospects an intimate connection with the product to help the sales process.
Moreover, livestream shopping leverages the power of content marketing and influencer marketing. So, if you opt for livestream shopping as a brand, you’d be getting the benefits of both.
If you don’t know how to get started, Jumble.tv is effective software that lets you livestream to your audience with ease.

‍
post-summary:
The fact that eCommerce has only been growing since its inception tells us a lot about consumer behavior. They don’t always want to visit brick-and-mortar stores and browse through the products to buy something. Why bother when you can buy the same thing from your device?
However, an eCommerce store doesn’t offer much insight into the products it is offering. Livestream shopping does. In this article, we’ll see how livestream shopping has become so popular and why is it the next big thing in online shopping.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: swimsuit, bikini, trends, fashion, summer, beach wear
meta-description: We’ve pulled together our top swimsuit trends for summer 2022, so you can start your shopping early.
meta-title: The Must Try Swimsuit Trends for Summer 2022
name: The Must Try Swimsuit Trends for Summer 2022
post-body:
What’s different about this year is that summer 2022 has brought with it a whole new batch of swimsuit trends for us to experiment with. You’re spoilt for choice with comfortable one-piece suits and sexier silhouettes with a high cut. We’ve pulled together our top swimsuit trends for summer 2022, so you can start your shopping early. With the sun about to come out, you can even take your new swimsuit to your backyard to work on your summer glow.

‍

Hollywood Glamour

‍
When you add a pair of oversized sunglasses and a coat of red lipstick to your look, you can double as a Hollywood start.

‍
If you’re jetting off to a five-star hotel or resort, you can carry the Hollywood glamour look through to the rest of your outfit. Add an oversized open cover-up to keep your shoulders covered from the sun. Instead of everyday flip-flops, why not add some sparkle to your footwear? Add a pair of heels to your look to give it a final touch of elevation. This look is one you’ll want to wear at the poolside bar when you’re sipping on cocktails and watching the sun set.

‍
What we love about this swimsuit is that it takes its inspiration from nightlife and the nightclub scene. It’s just the kind of swimsuit you could picture yourself wearing in a pool at a nightclub in Ibiza.

‍
If sparkles aren’t your thing, and you prefer something more minimalistic, why not swap the gemstones out for a little shine? We love this swimsuit by JADE Swim that takes its inspiration from the ‘80s. The one-shoulder cut and rose gold colour gives it a contemporary feel with a timeless silhouette.

‍

‍

All Tied Up

‍
If there’s anything that can make a two-piece bikini even sexier, it’s ties. A stringy bikini is an essential in every woman’s closet. Adding a few strings makes a bikini work for any body time. If you’ve got curves, the straps will help accentuate your natural shape. Curvy women commonly assume they can’t wear a bikini, when the opposite is true.

‍
One benefit from this style that everyone can take advantage of is the adjustable straps, which you can move and change to suit your body type and desired look. With a stringy bikini, you’ll be able to find a style that works for you and your silhouette.

‍
You can take this trend one step further by adding a retro print, one of the other biggest trends for 2022. The adjustable strings on the side of this two-piece by Zimmerman gives added versatility to the swimsuit. You can lift the strings to create a high-waisted look or cinch them in to make your hips appear smaller. What we also love about this specific bikini is that the adjustable straps also appear on the cleavage, making it easier to personalise your swimsuit – whether you’d rather cover up or show off your assets. If retro isn’t your thing, you can try this animal print bikini by Lisa Marie Fernandez to bring out your wild side.

‍

‍

Ribbed One Piece

‍
A classic one-piece swimsuit is a summer staple. You’ll never want to go on a vacation or a trip to the beach without one. With a versatile one-piece, you can double the swimsuit up as a top and wear denim shorts for a beach goddess look. If shorts aren’t your thing, you can swap it out for a ruffle skirt. The versatility of a one-piece swimsuit means you can wear it underneath just about any summer outfit. If anyone happens to see it, they’ll think it’s a vest top.

‍
This trend is a must-try for summer because it gives you both style and functionality. Ribbed swimsuits have an extra stretch that means you can keep it in your closet for years to come. It’s worth the splurge, as it can grow with you. If you’re looking for a maternity swimsuit, a ribbed one-piece is the perfect way to keep cool at the beach while keeping your bump protected from the sun.

‍
Another group of people who can benefit from a ribbed swimsuit is those that play water sports or volleyball. A ribbed swimsuit will move with you and adapt to your body as you move. If you’re someone who loves to run along the beach or build up a sweat while out surfing, a ribbed one-piece will see you through just about anything.

‍
The classic colour for a ribbed one piece is white – as it gives you added versatility. Plus, it’s the perfect base colour to show off your fresh summer glow. We love this style by Hunza G as it features a cross cross back, which lifts and supports your bust, while helping to hold you in and accentuate your curves. With a little styling, you can take this swimsuit from the beach to cocktails with your friends.
If you’re in the market for a ribbed one piece, it’s best to stick to classic neutral tones that you can mix and match with other summer staples.

‍

‍

Cut Out Swimsuit

‍
The cut-out trend is everywhere that you look in the fashion industry, and it’s made its way into the swimsuit world. If you’ve spent lockdown working on your fitness goals, a cut-out swimsuit will let you show off your gains and toned abs. The cut out silhouette can give a classic swimsuit a more contemporary feel.

‍
If you’re tired of wearing the same swimsuit every season, choosing the style with a cut-out can refresh your summer closet. You can show off some extra skin – making this a must-have for anyone planning a couple’s getaway or if you want to catch a few eyes.

‍
We love this creative swimsuit by PatBO, which uses a chiffon-trimmed halter neck swimsuit and updates the style with both a cut-out and bold sleeves. You can take the swimsuit from day to night by slipping on a pair of tailored pants and your favourite wedge espadrilles.

‍
One thing you’ll want to consider with this style is whether you’re going to be tanning. The last thing you want is tan lines around the cut-outs. If you’re wearing a cut-out swimsuit at the beach, you’ll want to make sure you apply an extra layer of SPF around the cut-out areas to keep your skin protected.

‍

Hula Hoops

‍
One of the most classic styles of swimsuit is the hula hoop. This vintage-inspired swimsuit is back in vogue. It’s a look that’s stood the test of time and is a great option if you want to invest in a swimsuit that you can wear for a few seasons. The hula hoops naturally flatter your shape and the classic silhouette of the swimsuit. If you struggle to keep your bikini top in place, the hula hoop can lift your bikini and keep everything in place.

‍
If you’re looking at bikinis, you can mix and match the top and bottoms for a personalised look. If you’re opting for a hula hoop bikini top, you can balance out your look with a high-waisted bikini bottom to accentuate your figure and pull you in. Agua by Agua Bendita, who handmake their swimsuits. If you’re heading to the poolside bar, you can add a coverup or sarong to finish off your look.

‍
You can still jump on the hula hoop trend with a one-piece. Instead of the circular shape appearing on the top half, you’ll usually see it used as a belt to cinch in your waist. The circular motif of the hula hoop one-piece updates the silhouette and can make your swimsuit appear more expensive and elevated. This trend is a must-try for anyone who likes a classic with a vintage twist.

‍
Which of these swimsuit trends will you be trying out for summer 2021? Do you plan on hitting the beach or will you be tanning at home? Let us know in the comments below!

‍
post-summary: The countdown is officially on for summer. It’s the summer staple that every woman has in their closet. Whether you’re a fan of a one-piece, or if you prefer a bikini, you want to treat yourself to a new swimsuit. Generally, swimsuit trends don’t change too much – making them the perfect investment for anyone, whether you go swimming once a week at your local gym, or if you save it for when you’re travelling.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: street style, fashion , trends, summer 2021
meta-description: These are the nine trends that we’re expecting to see when street style returns in the next few months
meta-title: What to Look for With Street Style In 2021
name: What to Look for With Street Style In 2021
post-body:
2020 was the year that street style went digital. Instead of fashion photographers being able to snap photos of fashionistas on their way to Fashion Week, Instagram and TikTok took centre stage. While this means that street style – in its purest form – was put on hold – it doesn’t mean we weren’t treated to a few trends during the pandemic. With the world starting to open back up again, you can expect to see a return to street style on your social media feeds. We’re waiting to see if the pandemic trends will carry through, or if people will turn to more glamorous pieces.
From what we did see during fashion week, it’s clear that casual clothing was the predominant trend. There was a mix of elevated and basic pieces, like blazers and jeans, with a pair of classic sneakers added in for an activewear twist. One trend that we loved was the prominence of silk and midi dresses with sensible footwear, primarily sneakers and slides. The street style that we saw in 2021 was a blend of vintage and contemporary pieces, with a focus on conscious fashion choices.
After a year of wearing loungewear and sweatpants, everyone is ready for a return to more tailored pieces. It’s time we replace our shapeless lounge pants with clothes that accentuate our curves. Within a few months, we’ll be back to watching celebrities, influencers, and fashion editors showing off their street style as they head to a sold-out show.

Although we’re still waiting for street style to make its full return post-pandemic, we thought it was the perfect time to have a look at what you can expect from the genre when the world returns to normal. We’ve drawn up our list by looking at the pieces worn by the lucky few who attended shows in person, as well as the trends we’re seeing on social media.
If you’re thinking of giving your closet a refresh as we leave lockdown, these are the pieces to keep an eye out for. While some are specific items, others are overarching trends that you can incorporate into your closet in your own way. Get ahead of the curve and update your closet before these items sell out.
These are the nine trends that we’re expecting to see when street style returns (hopefully!) in the next few months:

Bubblegum Pink

‍
If there’s one feminine colour that we’re seeing everywhere right now, it’s bubblegum pink. While there’s other colours like mellow yellow that are trending, bubblegum pink is the colour we expect to see most in street style during 2021. It’s a colour that you can have fun with, whether you want to incorporate it into your garments or keep it as an accessory colour. You can use it to add a feminine touch to your outfit or to create a pop of neon to juxtapose against the neutral colours of your look.
Bubblegum pink is a colour that will turn heads, and photograph beautifully. We expect to see everyone stepping out with at least one bubblegum pink piece post-pandemic.

Cutout Dresses

‍
As much as we love a classic silhouette, after a awhile, they can start to feel boring and uninspiring. Cutouts are a risky fashion choice, giving you an opportunity to flash a little skin and show off your abs. Cutouts come in every shape and form, whether it’s a small one in the front of the dress, or a larger cut out at the back.
We think the cutout dresses are going to be a street style staple for 2021 because they give you the opportunity to take a timeless silhouette and give it a contemporary twist by changing up the look of the dress. Whether it’s a little black dress or a silky white spaghetti strap, you’ll see cutouts on every classic dress type.
If dresses aren’t for you, you can incorporate the cutout trend into your closet with a more subtle not through shirts and jumpers. If you prefer a slightly more modest look, you can opt for a cutout neckline sweater for the most understated look.

Flower Power

‍
Thanks to the cottagecore trend and shows like Bridgerton, we’ve all discovered a newfound appreciation for ‘tacky’ florals. The sort of floral print you would expect to see in your grandma’s house. The more 80s the floral print looks, the better! Whether this trend will make it into this year’s street style looks will depend on how quickly restrictions are lifted during the summer.
If you’re thinking of experimenting with these floral prints, stick to feminine silhouettes like midi dresses and shirts with a puff sleeve. If you’re going to make the floral print the centre point of your outfit, you either want to wear it from head-to-toe, or balance it out with a classic colour like blue wash denim.

Oversized Trousers

‍
While we don’t expect sweatpants to be our go-to choice after the pandemic, we think the relaxed silhouette will stay around for a while. After all, Gen Z has cancelled skinny jeans, and no one wants to force themselves into trousers that are too tight to breathe. Another reason we expect the oversized trousers to become a street style trend is because of the rise of the ‘dark academia’ fashion aesthetic across social media, with these elevated basics taking on a life of their own. You can decide how oversized or flared-out you want your trousers to be.

Strappy Sandals

‍
Bottega Veneta is one brand that was dominating the world of street style before we were forced into lockdown. The brand’s popularity has continued to grow during the pandemic. Their strappy sandals have led to us all having a look at our summer footwear. The asymmetric straps and toe-ring detailing gives these sandals a more complicated structure that is both minimalistic but inventive. Keep an eye out for styles that use only a few straps, but that give you both comfort and style.
This style of shoe elongates your legs with ‘barely there’ straps, creating a streamline look from the hem of your skirt to your toes. If you’re opting for this street style trend, don’t forget to book in for a pedicure to finish off your look.

Checkerboard Print

‍
We’d like to thank Netflix’s Queen’s Gambit for reminding us of our love for checker print. What makes street style unique is the fact people aren’t afraid to wear a bold or daring people that is eye catching and demands attention. It’s what makes street wear photography so attractive and allows the subject to stand out against the normality of the background. Designers and brands at every level are incorporating the checkerboard print into their new collections.
While classic black and white checkerboard is our favourite, we’re seeing more pinks and greens appearing as pastel alternatives. With this trend, you can wear the print from head-to-toe with a maxi dress or break it up with separate pieces. Depending on the colour you choose for your checkerboard, you can usually style it with neutral and earth-tone shades. You can take the black from the checkerboard and carry it through to your accessories to tie your look together.

Dresses and Leggings

‍
Another street style trend that we think is going to evolve from activewear is legging layering. Several of the attendees to the virtual Prada F/1 21 Menswear show incorporated leggings into their looks. With modest fashion also on the rise, we’re expecting to see more people incorporating leggings into their looks to cover up. Whether it’s under a puffy dress or with a white crisp skirt, it’s clear that leggings are about to make a comeback for streetwear.

‍
Statement Tights

‍
Whether it’s the monogram Gucci tights or a simple neon pair, this accessory is about to make a return to the street style world. This trend comes from Japan, whose street style has been reinventing the classic day dress and making it more wearable by adding extra layers. Adding statement tights can bring a contemporary feel to a classic or timeless silhouette.
If you want to refresh your street style look without breaking the bank, look for accessories like statement tights that you can incorporate into your look on a budget.

Spots On

‍
For Spring/Summer 2021, polka dots have made a reappearance in street style. Polka dots are an easy way to add something fun and elegant into your look. Depending on your aesthetic, you can take the polka dot trend and use it for a sartorial look, or channel your inner Sophia Loren with a classic look.
If you’re thinking of adding polka dots to your street style looks for 2021, you can incorporate the silk trend by looking for garments made of the material. A silk polka dot dress is one that any street style aficionado would be able to wear.

‍
Which trends do you expect to see in street style post-pandemic? Which one of these trends will you be experimenting with? Let us know in the comments

‍
post-summary: 2020 was the year that street style went digital. Instead of fashion photographers being able to snap photos of fashionistas on their way to Fashion Week, Instagram and TikTok took centre stage. While this means that street style – in its purest form – was put on hold – it doesn’t mean we weren’t treated to a few trends during the pandemic. With the world starting to open back up again, you can expect to see a return to street style on your social media feeds. We’re waiting to see if the pandemic trends will carry through, or if people will turn to more glamorous pieces.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: board games, adults, Backgammon, play , fun , entertainment
meta-description: Our list of adult board games includes some firm favourites that we all know and love, along with some new additions that you might not know about.
meta-title: The Adult Board Games you will love
name: The Adult Board Games
post-body:
There’s only so many shows you can watch on Netflix and a certain amount of time you can spend looking at your phone before it all becomes a blur. Since the start of lockdown, adult board games have been experiencing a resurgence in popularity. Whether your country is still in lockdown or if you’re having a digital cleanse, adult board games are something you want to have on hand.
As life starts to go back to normal and we can meet up again with our friends and family, it’s the perfect time to invest in some adult board games. When your friends are over for catch-up drinks, you can swap your smartphones for fun, interactive board games. Invite everyone around, ask them to bring some drinks and snacks, and have a chance to reconnect with each other.
Our list of adult board games includes some firm favourites that we all know and love, along with some new additions that you might not know about. You’ll want to pick up at least a few games for you and your friends to play. These adult board games will take you through the pandemic and beyond.

Backgammon Set

Considered to be the oldest board game in history, backgammon can be traced back over 5,000 years to Mesopotamia. This two-player game involves each player having 15 pieces that can move between 24 points, depending on the roll of the dice. The goal of the game is to be the first one to move all fifteen checkers of the board – known as ‘bearing off’.
This game requires both luck and strategy. When you roll the dice, you have a number of options for moving the checkers and have to consider your opponent’s countermoves before making your move. You can give the game of backgammon an update with this fun, pastel colour palette and sorbet hues. This is the perfect game to play with your other-half or best friend.

Chinese Checkers Acrylic Set

‍
Another age-old board game that is having a comeback is Chinese Checkers. This game uses minaudieres with a glossy finish that come in six different colours. As a multi-player game, you can involve almost anyone of any age. With its six-pointed star base, each point has ten holes to hold the acrylic balls.
When six players are involved, you can use all six points – otherwise you can play with a smaller team of two or more. Each player choosing a colour and are given the ten pegs to be placed on their chosen triangle. If there isn’t six players, unused pegs need to be placed in those triangles to prevent them being used.
The aim of this game is to be the first play to move your ten pegs across the board and into the opposite triangle.
Chinese checkers is the renaming of a Greek game called ‘Halma’, which was inspired by the English game ‘Hoppity’, invented in 1883.

Linkee Game from Ideal

‍
Linkee is a trivia game that anyone came play. It takes only two minutes to learn the game, with each game lasting around 30 minutes. No need to sit around waiting for your turn. With Linkee, you have four little questions and one big link. You can play with game with anywhere from 2 to 30 players. With this game, the more players you have, the better!
You start with four questions that reflect the super-simple, shout-outy quiz style of this came. With this game, you don’t win by answering the question on the card. Instead, you have to work out what links the answers. Once you’ve figured it out, it’s time to shout ‘LINKEE’ and take your guess. If you get it right, you can go on and keep the card. The winner of the game is the person who collects enough cards to spell out ‘LINKEE’.

Logo – What Am I? Board Game

‍
Logo is an adult board game that doesn’t involve questions. It instead focuses on describing, drawing, and guessing brands and products that are provided on the card. The game uses the same format as ‘what am I?’. You can test your knowledge about the leading brands and see if you can out-perform your competitors.
You can play Logo with groups of up to 20+ players. The more players you involve, the more competition you’ll have. If you have younger kids or family members, you can get them involved in this board game as well.

Disturbed Friends – This Game Should Be Banned!

‍
This card game includes 250 disturbing questions and 100 offensive cartoon winning cards. It’s described as the “party card game you will wish you never played”. You get to vote on what you think your friends would no in horrible situations. It can involve up to ten players.
‘Disturbed Friends’ involves one player being chosen as the judge. They draw a horrible question card and read it aloud. Each play votes with an A, B, or C card on what they think the judge would do. When everyone has voted, the cards are revealed one by one. Whoever guesses the same as the judge gets a winning card, which mocks society. The first player who collects 10 winning cards wins the game.

Disney Drawsome

‍
If you’re an adult with a love for Disney, the Drawsome game is a must-have. This interactive game involves drawing your favourite Disney and Pixar characters, along with other game players.
With this game, your creativity takes centre stage. Have you ever imagined what Buzz Lightyear and Mickey Mouse would look like together? With this game, you can mix up characters, see how many you can draw in a minute, and draw each other as Disney characters.
You don’t need to be an artist to play this game. Whoever has the most points at the end of the fifth-round wins!

Classic Mah Jong Game

‍
Thanks to the popularity of ‘Crazy Rich Asians’, we’ve all become familiar with the Chinese game ‘Mah Jong’. While this game has variants throughout Asia, it’s played by people of all ages. It involves memory and strategy to defeat your competition. You’ll typically need four players for this game, although you can play it with four players if need be.
Mah Jong was developed in the 19th century and is similar to ‘rummy’, a Western card game. The 144 tiles are based on Chinese characters and symbols. Each player receives 13 tiles, taking it in turn to draw and discard tiles. Once they’re apply to form a legal hand with the 14th tile – to either form a pair or set – to win the game. This tile game is fairly easy to understand after your first game or two of playing it. Set up time takes around a minute, making it a great choice for a last-minute game.

Articulate!

‍
Articulate is a fast-talking description game that can involve 4 to 20+ players. The aim of the game is to describe as many cards as possible within the course of 30 seconds. You’re not allowed to use any phrases like “rhymes with” or “sounds like”. You want to describe a word without saying it. While this might sound simple, it isn’t as simple when you’re under time pressure.
This game is sure to bring up some healthy competition between your players. It’s a perfect choice for an after-dinner game and even more fun when you have a few drinks involved.

Shot in the Dark – The Ultimate Unorthodox Quiz Game

‍
Shot in the Dark is a fun party trivia quiz with hundred of bizarre and hilarious questions. All bets are off as this is the ultimate quiz leveller – nobody knows the answers. Any answer is a shot in the dark. It’s one game with hundreds of eccentric questions that your friends and family will love.
There’s questions like “how long did Britney Spears’ shortest marriage last?” . This game was created by two newlyweds who loved quizzes but thought they weren’t fun enough or varied enough to the general knowledge of groups.
Shot in the Dark is an inclusive quiz and a crowd pleaser with genuinely interesting questions that will teach you something new.

Stupid Deaths Board Game

‍
This frightfully funny game involves working out whether the implausible and amusing demise of the person is true or false. It’s a race against death to be the first player home. You can play it in groups of 2-6 with players aged 12 or over.
The first player takes the first stupid deaths card, reads it aloud, and the other players decide if the scenario is real or made up. Each player turns their card to either true or false. Anyone who votes correctly moves their player piece up on space. If they vote incorrectly, the Grim Reaper moves one step forward towards them.

‍
Which of these adult board games is your faovurite? Did you spend lockdown playing board games? Let us know in the comments below!

‍

‍
post-summary: There’s only so many shows you can watch on Netflix and a certain amount of time you can spend looking at your phone before it all becomes a blur. Since the start of lockdown, adult board games have been experiencing a resurgence in popularity. Whether your country is still in lockdown or if you’re having a digital cleanse, adult board games are something you want to have on hand.As life starts to go back to normal and we can meet up again with our friends and family, it’s the perfect time to invest in some adult board games. When your friends are over for catch-up drinks, you can swap your smartphones for fun, interactive board games. Invite everyone around, ask them to bring some drinks and snacks, and have a chance to reconnect with each other. Our list of adult board games includes some firm favourites that we all know and love, along with some new additions that you might not know about. You’ll want to pick up at least a few games for you and your friends to play. These adult board games will take you through the pandemic and beyond.

author: 60740f2280ced74507dffbb0
keywords: nails, trends, nail colors, manicure, Gel Nails, Acrylic nails
meta-description: We’re sharing some of the top 2021 nail trends, along with our tips and tricks for getting the most out of your manicure.
meta-title: The 2021 Nail Trends You Need to Know
name: The 2021 Nail Trends You Need to Know
post-body:
Do you want to give your look an easy refresh? Your nails are something you can change every day of the week if you want to. While we often think “new hair, new me”, the philosophy is the same with your nails. You can use them as a way of showing how you’re feeling and wearing your aesthetic on your sleeves (or rather, nails!). If you’re someone who likes to play it safe with your clothes and makeup, then your nails are the perfect opportunity to have a little fun and experiment with the latest trends.

You’ll want to bookmark this page to take it with you for your next appointment with your nail technician. These top nail trends for 2021 will take you through every season and give you plenty of inspiration for how you could do your nails for any occasion. If you’re talented with a bottle of polish and a UV lamp, you might be able to recreate some of these trends at home – or put your own twist of the trends.

We’re sharing some of the top 2021 nail trends, along with our tips and tricks for getting the most out of your manicure.

‍

Sunset Illusion

Recreate a sunset on your nails with bold shades that will spark joy into your day. Even if it’s raining outside, it’ll still be a tropical paradise on your nails. The most popular colour combination for this trend is pinks and oranges, but you can shake it up with a touch of blue. You want the colour to gradually transition from the darker to lighter shades, just like the sunset.

‍

Bright Colours

For 2021, nail trends are all about adding as much colour as possible. This is one trend you can easily experiment with at home. Trending colours of the season include mellow yellow, mint green, and magenta pink. You can keep it classic with one colour on all your nails or rotate it out with a different colour on each nail. It’s also an opportunity to think outside the box and add some nail art. We love these smiley faces!

‍

Pastel Shades

‍
If bold colours are a bit too much for you, why not try their pastel alternatives. These will still brighten your day without being too over the top. If you’re looking to experiment more with colours, it’s a good idea to start with a muted colour and make your way up to bolder shades. You can keep it fun and feminine with a classic shade of pink or spice it up with lilac or periwinkle blue. Mellow yellow is one of the trending colours of 2021 and is the perfect alternative to a nude or beige polish.

‍

Take Inspo From Japan

‍
For anyone who wants a low-maintenance manicure that looks sleek and effortless, you want to take inspiration from the Japanese nail trends. This trend focuses on ‘barely there’ colours and works for any nail length.

‍
If you’re considering this look for your at-home manicure, you want to remember that it focuses primarily on your natural nails. A Japanese manicure is the perfect way to help grow your nails and improve their overall condition. If you can find a specialist salon that occurs Japanese manicures, they will usually add in a few nail care steps to detoxify your nail beds.

‍
If you’re trying this look at home, start by buffing your nails before adding a treatment to help hydrate your nail beds. You can add a top coat to give your nails a natural shine. It’s like a facial for your nails.

‍

Leather Inspired

‍
Matching your shoes to your nails is so 2021. You can add texture to your nails with a leather inspired look. You want to choose colours that are a deep brown or black, with an opaque finish. This trend works for every skin tone and complexion, giving you a high shine finish.
