meta-title: What is Facial Cupping? Is It Safe?
name: What is Facial Cupping? Benefits, Uses, and Risk Factor
post-body:
What is Facial Cupping?

Facial cupping is a conventional, time-honored procedure that is safe, convenient, and remains preferred by millions worldwide. For years, people across the globe have used these remarkable facial cupping techniques for rejuvenation and skincare benefits. Facial cupping is intended to increase the circulation of the blood and stimulate the facial cells responsible to produce collagen. It helps to minimize the appearance of acne scars, wrinkles, and fine lines. Cupping is an alternative treatment that strengthens the skin and muscles using suction cups. Lifting the facial tissue triggers lymphatic drainage to remove impurities, cell debris, and excess fluid. Suction helps enhance blood circulation, which can help alleviate muscle pain and facilitate cell regeneration. Qi is a Chinese term that means the force of life. It is also said to enhance your "qi" (pronounced "chee") flow. This amazing face-lifting technique helps de-puff and tone your face and neck.

Facial cupping is like body cupping, but they don’t leave marks behind. The only difference is that face cups are relatively smaller and softer. It's used to gently draw the skin away from deeper layers of your face. Facial cupping increases blood flow to the region and brightens the skin. This technique benefits the skin over time and reduces age spots and acne scars. Body cupping, on the other hand, is used mainly to relieve pains and soreness. Body cupping also leaves marks on the body, that fades away with time.

Facial Cupping Technique: How to Do it Like a Pro?

The first thing you need to do is to determine your skin type. Sensitive skin types require a lot of precautions and extra attention. Cleanse your face with a foaming cleanser to know your skin type. With acne-prone skin make sure to use oils that will help calm down redness and swelling. Use rich oils or face moisturizer before face cupping, so that cup easily glides over your face without leaving any facial marks.

Squeeze the cup to create a little suction. Place it on your face and gently glide it over your face. Blood is pulled into the skin region through the suction effect. This infuses the surrounding tissue with fresh blood and encourages new production of blood vessels. Cupping often induces sterile inflammation. The vacuum-like suction extracts different layers of tissue and causes microtrauma and tearing. This triggers an allergic response, and the area is overwhelmed with white blood cells and platelets.

Your skin may feel a little temperature sensitive after cupping. Make sure that you avoid a hot bath, saunas, and intense exercise. To stop reintroducing unnecessary toxins to the skin, shower with clean water if possible. To drain out excess chemicals, toxins, and excess water, make sure to drink lots of water. Your skin will require time to heal, make sure that you stay away from alcohol for 4-5 hours of post-treatment. Apply some calming aloe and wait until your next cupping appointment until your skin has healed. Don't over-exfoliate. A coating of dead skin is eliminated by exfoliating, which makes the skin extra delicate. Make sure that you haven't exfoliated your skin before going to the clinic.

What are the Benefits of Face Cupping?

·      Face cupping increases blood circulation, which promotes skin brightness.

·      It helps fight acne scars, wrinkles, and fine lines.

·      Facial cupping removes dark circles and de-puff your eyes.

·      Cupping helps reduce stress and muscle tension.

·      Facial cupping aids the process of collagen production. It makes your skin look plump and youthful.

·      Removes toxins and impurities from your face and neck.

·      Increased circulation and consumption of nutrients in the skin.

How Often Should You Do It?

Results can differ from person to person. The suggested initial course of facial cupping therapy includes between 6 and 12 hours. To maintain the original results, we suggest monthly follow-up sessions. Do it at night on smooth, oiled skin, which relaxes your face muscles. Facial cups are not meant to leave marks. Bruising may occur, however, if the cup is left for too long in the same position. Minor side effects may occur following treatment, and occasional cases of dizziness, nausea, and some facial pains have been documented by individuals.

What are the Risks and Side Effects of Facial Cupping?

Although facial cupping is usually considered healthy, it is possible to have mild side effects. Usually, they develop during or shortly after the procedure. You can feel temporary dizziness,lightheadedness, nausea, and cold sweating. Your facial cupping therapy starts after a mild face and neck massage. It is safest to come with long hair pulled back and a clean face for your procedure. A standard procedure for facial rejuvenation lasts 30 minutes but extra spa time may be provided upon request.

At-Home Facial Cupping

Getting it done by a professional makes sure that you get the maximum results out of this procedure. But if you are thinking of doing your facial cupping then make sure that you learn the basics. There are a lot of facial cupping kits available in the market that you can choose from. There are different cups available in the market like plastic and gel-like cup. Choose according to your personal preference. Wash your face first and pat dry it. Apply a thin layer of oil is the key as it helps the cup to easily glide over your skin. Make sure that you apply an oil that matches your skin type and requirements. If you have sensitive skin, we recommend coconut oil.

Bottom line is that facial cupping improves blood circulation and can help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, reduce puffiness, and more. Facial muscles benefit immensely from the removal of stress, tension, and the loosening of stiff muscle tissue. Facial cupping may have important clinical outcomes for conditions linked to sinus infections, inflammation, edema, and those with TMJ disorders. At home, you can try facial cupping, but with your first session, it would be better to reach out to a professional. They will answer any questions you may have and provide further advice on your skincare needs.

‍

For years, people across the globe have used these remarkable facial cupping techniques for rejuvenation and skincare benefits. Facial cupping is intended to increase the circulation of the blood and stimulate the facial cells responsible to produce collagen. It helps to minimize the appearance of acne scars, wrinkles, and fine lines. Cupping is an alternative treatment that strengthens the skin and muscles using suction cups.

meta-title: Everything You Need to Know About Face Steaming!
name: Face Steaming: Everything You Need to Know
post-body:
What is Face Steaming?

If you are tired of expensive face treatments, then you should consider face steaming. It is a non-invasive, easy, and budget-friendly skin treatment that cleanses your face and gives a sheen to it. Face streaming is a way to makes your skin feels healthy and flawless. It is the best way to hydrate and cleanse your face from all the impurities and toxins. For most skincare, facial steaming is a common procedure and is a perfect one to incorporate into your skincare routine. This soothing procedure has many advantages, from cleansing to hydrating. The best part is that you can do it from the comfort of your own home.

There are no serious side effects of face streaming. But do not steam your face if you have rosacea, because it will further irritate your skin. Some people also experience skin inflammation and redness. Normally redness goes away on its own, but it is better to consult a professional if you feel any burning sensation.

Face Steaming in Clinic

Face streaming is a holy grail for every professional dermatologist. They use streaming devices to unclog your pores and remove all the impurities and dirt from deep within your skin layers. This relaxing treatment extracts all the toxins from your face making your face look squeaky clean. In the clinic, they use different devices for face streaming that helps the products to absorb deep into the skin. Steam sessions loosen up your pores and improve blood circulation, leaving your skin clear, healthy, and glowing.

Face Steaming At-Home

·       Firstly, clean your face with a mild cleanser or a good exfoliating soap. This will make sure that steam will reach deep into the pores to unclog and remove dirt.

·       Here is a DIY for a budget-friendly deep pore cleansing. All you need is baking soda and some fresh wash. Mix 2 tablespoons of baking soda into 1 tablespoon of water. Mix them well until a liquid-paste like consistency is form.

·       Gently massage it onto your face for few minutes. Massage in a circular motion and don’t forget to clean your neck and ears. This gentle cleanser will remove dead skin cells and dirt from your face.

·       Now wash your face with cold water and pat dry your face.

·       Boil some water and carefully pour it into a bowl. You can also add some fresh herbs into the bowl according to your liking.

·       You can add rose petals, chamomile, parsley, or any fresh or dried herbs. They help purify your skin and the fresh aroma will make you feel super relaxed.

·       Now lean onto the bowl, make sure that there is enough distance between your face and bowl. Keep your face 12 inches away from the bowl.

·       Grab a towel and cover your face and the bowl with it. Sit in this position for 5-10 minutes.

·       Now remove the towel and pat dry your face. Make sure to tone and moisturize your face afterward.

The Benefits of Face Steaming

Cleaner

Steam opens the pores for easier cleansing and manages to clear any traces of dirt. Steaming is a means for your skin to extract the built-in makeup and refresh your face. Steaming also makes your skin sweat, which helps you flush out toxins. It also removes whiteheads and blackheads from your face.

Exfoliates

There is a lot of exfoliating procedure that clean out the dead skin cells. Face steaming also provides mild exfoliation. It is not as strong as another method of exfoliation available on market, but it does help clean the outer layer of your face.

Hydration/ Moisturizes

Steam moisturizes the skin by increasing the production of oil and moisturizes the face naturally. Water is the key to hydration and moisturization. The microscopic steam molecules can enter the skin, providing deep moisturizing. Make sure that you apply a good serum after a good streaming session to lock that added moisture into your skin.

Stressbuster

Face streaming is a great source to relieve stress and any muscle pain from your face. A good steaming session leaves you feeling relaxed and stress-free. The warm and humid steam allows you to just sit back and feel relaxed.

Increase Products Absorption

Since streaming opens your pores and extracts all the toxins and impurities, all you are left with is a squeaky-clean face. It will help absorbs skincare products easily into the skin and you will see visible changes in your skin-care routine.

Increase Blood Circulation

Face streaming will raise the skin temperature, which can contribute to improved blood circulation. With an enhanced circulation of blood, the face can easily absorb the skincare products. The increase in blood flow during steam facials encourages the development of collagen. This makes the skin appear firmer and healthier.

How Often Should You Do It?

The heat from the steaming procedure encourages improved circulation in the face, which provides a glow to your face. More blood circulation will mean fewer wrinkles and fine lines, a healthier glow, and a permanent solution for active acne. Make sure there is a 12 inches distance between boiling water and your face. You can do this once or twice a week. Always apply a good moisturizer and lock everything in with a toner like rose water spray.

Face Steaming After-Care

Apply a good toner after 10 minutes of the steaming session. If you have sensitive skin, then you can use homemade toner as well. We recommend rose water for sensitive skin. Just spray 3-4 times on to your face. Another good option would be apple cider vinegar. It will gently exfoliate your skin and balance out the PH level of your face. It is antibacterial and best for people who do not want to invest in high-end toners. Follow up your skincare routine with a rich creamy moisturizer or a serum for better results. The bottom line is that face steaming is a budget-friendly treatment for deep cleansing and exfoliation. It will make your skin appear fresh, treats acne, and reduce wrinkles and fine lines.
post-summary: If you are tired of expensive face treatments, then you should consider face steaming. It is a non-invasive, easy, and budget-friendly skin treatment that cleanses your face and gives a sheen to it. Face streaming is a way to makes your skin feels healthy and flawless. It is the best way to hydrate and cleanse your face from all the impurities and toxins.

name: What are Facial Rollers? Benefits, Uses, Side Effects & Many More
post-body:
Face Roller

Usually, face rolling tools are made of jade, rose quartz, or another crystal, and are intended to be used on the face gently. They help relieve muscle pain, minimize puffiness, and activate the lymphatic system. They tend to improve the skin texture by enhancing blood circulation. The face roller comes in two shapes. The bigger one is used for cheeks, jawline, and forehead. On the other hand, a smaller face roller is used for under eye treatment. The face roller's main purpose is to enhance blood circulation in the face. Blood circulation purifies your skin from toxins and impurities. Face roller works on so many levels, they provide deep tissue massage and relax your facial muscles. These facial massages will also help shape your facial features, tightens your pores, and provide a youthful look. Some researchers believe that crystals will allow us to find love, inspire us to leave poor habits, and even draw a better future. Facial rollers assist in adding fresh fluid as well as welcoming oxygenated blood to the area. Use it for at least five minutes, two or three days a week, and you'll see the difference in your face in a couple of weeks.

Types of Face Roller

Rose quartz

The stone of universal affection, it restores trust and peace, inspires love and respect. Rose quartz face rollers not only serve to extract toxins under the eyes but also help to remove toxins all over your face. This face roller is the best choice for under eye problems like dark circles and puffiness. Rose quartz reduces toxins and impurities from your body. It promotes a positive environment for you. It is believed to be an emotional healer and works as a detoxifying stone. It is best for fine lines, wrinkles, and dark circles.

Clear Quartz

This master healer can work with any other face roller. It is considered to promote the general health of the face. A clear quartz facial roller is an excellent method to reduce puffiness and wrinkles. The clear quartz facial roller helps to cure skin and treat different skin issues such as wrinkles and fine lines.

Jade

There are a lot of options for face roller that you can choose from. You can get a face roller ranging from $20 to $30 depending on their size. Jade is one of the most ancient stones used in Chinese medicine for its healing purposes. It is the most common type of facial roller and easily available in the market. Jade is mostly used to remove wrinkles and strengthen facial muscles. This anti-aging face roller is used to bring back the elasticity of the face. Buy jade if you have sensitive skin because it is known for its relaxing and calming properties.

Amethyst

This powerful healing crystal is known for its calming properties. It relaxes the facial muscle. This works well with acne-prone or sensitive skin. The best part is that amethyst contains iron, which is very important for your skin. This healing stone helps with cell regeneration and enhances oxygen delivery to cells. This stone also has anti-inflammatory properties that will help fight acne and hyperpigmentation.

How to Use Facial Roller?

  • First, apply few drops of oil to your face. You don’t want the roller to pull your skin, so make sure that your skin is well moisturized with a good serum or essential oil.
  • Start from your neck and work your way up to the face.
  • Massage in an upward motion. Make sure that you don’t drag the roller back and forth on the skin.
  • Do not put too much pressure on the face. Roll with a light hand so that the stone will easily glide over your face.
  • You can also use it on your eyebrows. It will help release stress and cure headaches.
  • Use a small size facial roller for under eye dark circles.
  • Once done wash your stone properly. Use a good foaming cleanser to clean your facial roller. Soak it in room temperature water or tap water. Leave it there for few minutes.
  • Now don’t rub anything on the stone. Just place it on a towel and let it dry on its own.

What are the Benefits of Facial Rollers?

Massaging your face with a healing stone has a lot of skin benefits. It can relieve stress and alleviate pain, just as a body massage will do. Using a face roller will increase blood supply to the face, which will help the skin appear smoother and stiffer. Research indicates that using this technique will help with sinuses. Rolling can also minimize puffiness by promoting lymphatic drainage. Facial rollers can easily de-puff your skin and tighten your pores. Rollers are usually used with an oil or moisturizer to make the instrument slide over the skin. This method helps with better product absorption into the skin.

Fake Vs Real Facial Roller

There is a lot of fake plastic facial roller are available on market. Sometimes sits difficult to separate fake facial roller from real ones. A fake facial roller is made to look exactly like real ones that It is so hard to differentiate between them. If your tool doesn’t cool down easily then it is a fake jade roller. A real facial roller will feel cool to touch.

Put your face roller in a cool place before the massage. It will give you an extra boost of hydration and helps tightens pores. The extra-chilled facial roller also helps fight acne and breakout. You can massage your face with a facial roller for 5-10 minutes. You will notice a huge difference in your face if you incorporate a facial roller into your skincare regimen. You can only use it once or twice a week. The facial roller doesn’t just relax your facial muscles, they provide several skin benefits. These healing stones instantly depuff your face, help remove toxins and improve blood circulation. Research showed that an anti-aging cream generated better outcomes when used with a vibrating massage tool. There are a lot of options to choose from just make sure that you buy the one that suits your face. Clean your facial roller every time before massage it onto your face.

‍

They help relieve muscle pain, minimize puffiness, and activate the lymphatic system. They tend to improve the skin texture by enhancing blood circulation. The face roller comes in two shapes. The bigger one is used for cheeks, jawline, and forehead.

meta-title: Ultimate Guide About Faux Tan
name: Everything You Need to Know About Faux Tan
post-body:
Fake tans always come in handy when you want a sun-kissed look, but the question is how to choose the perfect shade for your skin type? There is a lot of fake tans available in the market for different skin type. Choosing which tan will compliment your natural skin color is the real struggle. Before we jump into the basics of fake tan let's take a look at what is made of.

DHA (Dihydroxyacetone) is the main ingredient found in fake tan. It was discovered by German scientists in late 1920. Researchers discovered that if the DHA is poured onto the body, it colored the surface of the skin brown. No one knew that it would forever transform the face of modern cosmetics. Later in the 1950s researchers discovered that it only colored the outer layer of the skin. It was completely harmless and non-toxic. It was then approved to be used in the cosmetic industry. This is how fake tan found its way into the beauty industry and became popular over the years.

If the product contains a lot of DHA then the resulting color would be a dark brown. If you are looking for a subtle tan then look for the product that has less quantity of DHA. The higher the level of DHA, the darker the tan would be. You can also layer up your tan to get the perfect tan that you want. Fake tan takes its time to develop. It can take up to 7-8 hours to develop the color onto your skin. It is a little difficult to get rid of fake tan. Normal soap would not be enough to remove fake tan. A normal fake tan fades away after 10-12 days of wearing it on the skin. A fake tan will fade away on its own due to the body's natural detoxifying process. In this process, dead skin cells gently fade away, and new cell formation on the skin. A fake tan will also fade away with the removal of dead skin cells. As dead skin cells are replaced and new ones are formed, the skin will go back to its natural color easily.

How to Apply Fake Tan At-Home?

Skin Preparations/Exfoliation

Not investing enough time grooming their skin for a tan is the greatest mistake people make. To extract dead skin cells, begin by exfoliating so that the tan can blend and be more uniformly absorbed. You need your skin to be ready if you want your self-tanning to last longer. If the skin is not exfoliated properly then self-tan will fade away on its own. To maintain an even basis, you need to buff away all proof of your previous tan so that your current tan goes on smoothly and looks perfect.

Waxing/ Moisturizer

Shave or wax any excess hair at least 24 hours in advance. Any open pores presence can lead to a patchy and uneven finish. Another key reason for pre-tan shaving is that you are at risk of shaving off your tan if you do so afterward since the blades tend to suck off any dead skin cells as well as hair. You should keep skin moisturized and nourished for even spread of tan. Dry skin is the most common source of patchy tan, so it's important to moisturize yourself before self-tan. However, moisturize at least 24 hours before applying the desired tanning lotion, since the moisturizer serves as a buffer, stopping the tanning formula from touching the skin.

Application

When applying your chosen self-tanner, work from the feet up to maintain even coverage in an upward circular motion. This way, you cannot risk smudging any substance already on your body. Use any extra product on your mitt first before applying any more products to create a sun-kissed look.

Allow the Color to Develop

Make sure that your reed all the instruction given on the self-tanner to achieve maximum results. Do not take shower immediately after self-tan, give it some time to develop properly. Wait till the time mentioned on the instructional men of the self-tanning product. Shower with lukewarm water. Then, instead of rubbing, make sure you pat yourself dry. Make sure to moisturize with your favorite cream every day to keep your skin hydrated and lock in your pigment to extend your tan.

How to Choose Tan Best Suited to Your Skin?

Finding the best fake tan for yourself can be very challenging sometimes. It all comes down to practice and knowing the basics. As a beginner, go for mist as they tend to adapt to your skin color easily. They are a bit lighter than cream tan, which makes them easier to work with. If you have sensitive skin look for a hydrating and moisturizing self-tanner. Choose the right base color for yourself, if in doubt always consult a specialist before making any decision.

What to Do if You Make a Mistake?

Grab a cream made with glycolic acid if your tan is uneven and needs a quick fix. Glycolic acid tends to strip your tan easily. Sit in a hot oil bath and soak if you think it’s too dark. Clean the skin with an old towel in an upward motion. It would lift the top tan coat. If needed, repeat the next day.

Fake Tan After-Care

Your tan will appear more radiant if your skin is well hydrated and moisturized. Oil breaks the tan down, so go for a hyaluronic-based body moisturizer and avoid retinol or other skincare and enzymatic body and skincare products. After the spray tanning solution is added, do not shower for at least 6 to 8 hours. . If you are a beginner, using a solution with a reference color is a good idea. Standing in front of a mirror while applying is the easiest way to apply self-tanning. It will make sure you don't miss any spots and everything is perfectly filled in.

There is a lot of fake tans available in the market for different skin type. Choosing which tan will compliment your natural skin color is the real struggle. Before we jump into the basics of fake tan let's take a look at what is made of.

meta-title: Getting Glass Skin Is Easier Than You Think
name: The New K-Beauty Trend: Getting Glass Skin Is Easier Than You Think
post-body:
What is “Glass Skin” trend?

The Korean beauty industry is known for introducing these new-age skincare terms like 10-steps Korean beauty or ’Glass Skin’. These trends are known for their groundbreaking formulations and results. Glass skin is a Korean term that refers to smooth, radiant, and glass looking skin. This glass skin care regimen makes your skin looks younger and youthful. Generally, glass skin is referred to as flawless skin that is clear like glass. The main purpose here is to achieve deeply hydrated and healthier skin. This leads to a sun-kissed, glow and radiant completion.

It begins with the skin being double cleansed, followed by a serum/cream, lotion, spray, and moisturizer. What separates this K-beauty routine from others is that it does not use astringents but depends on moisturizing components that preserve the skin's pH level. Ever since this trend surfaced around the internet everyone is in a quest to maintain a luminous and transparent skin glow. Achieving this look requires a safe and active lifestyle, as well as an adherence to the skincare regimen. Here’s a step-by-step roadmap to achieve a smooth, dewy, and nearly spotless glass-like skin.

The Glass Skin Regimen; Step-by-Step Guide

Layering is the secret to achieve highly hydrated glass looking skin. You need to use items that are extremely hydrating, lightweight, antioxidant-filled, and packed with nutritious ingredients to get the best out of your glass skin routine. Below is a step-by-step guide on how to create a clear, polished, glass-like skin.

The Power of Doble Cleansing

Cleansing is one of the most effective ways to dissolves makeup and wipes away dead skin cells, dirt, and other toxins. It helps keep pores from clogging and attracting bacteria. The important thing is to gently cleanse your face so that you won’t scrape your skin off the face. Extremely harsh cleaning can lead to dryness and textured skin. Glass skin routine believes in double cleansing. Korean women usually use two cleaners, beginning with an oil-based cleanser to eliminate oil-based cosmetics, SPF, and other impurities. It is gentle on the face and naturally removes impurities and unclog your pores. It is then followed by a water-based foaming cleanser. It will gently remove all the residue left on the face.

Exfoliation

Exfoliation helps to extract dead skin cells and prevents blackheads on the skin. Limit the exfoliation to a minimum of twice a week and try a soft, light chemical exfoliator on the skin. Exfoliation will help the skin look and feel healthier and benefit certain skin conditions by eliminating the outer layer of dead skin cells. Newer, healthy skin cells are pushed to the surface through exfoliation. Exfoliate once or twice a week.

Toner

Toners help re-balance the skin's pH level. The pH degree of your skin helps you to know how acidic or alkaline it is. The ideal PH level of our skin is between 4.4 to 5.5. Cleansing can strip away your natural facial oils, toner helps bring back hydration and moisture to the skin. Toner does not only stop here; it also serves to hydrate, nourish, and rejuvenate the skin. Normal toners are usually ignored because they are perceived as too dry for the face. K-beauty toners are made with soothing and moisturizing ingredients that are best for all skin types.

Essence

The point of the Korean glass skin routine is to deeply hydrate the skin. Essence’s primary role is to moisten the skin with hydration. Essences come with other secondary advantages, such as treating hyperpigmentation, redness, and skin texture. Essences help combat breakouts, enhance the radiance of the skin, and offer long-lasting hydration. The main element in essence is water. It is lightweight and incredibly moisturizing. It is quickly absorbed into the skin and immediately brightens skin tone.

Serum/Face Oils

Apply serum or any face oil of your choice after cleansing. It equalizes your skin color, plumps up your skin, eliminates fine lines, and preserves the moisture level of your skin. A serum does more than moisturize your skin. Using a serum containing active ingredients such as vitamin C, alpha hydroxy acids (AHAs), hyaluronic acid or beta hydroxy acids (BHAs) provides dewy complexion and hydrated skin.

Moisturizer/ Eye Creams

Moisturizer is the last step in achieves Korean glass skin. A good moisturizer will lock everything in place and gives a radiant glow to your face. This extra layer of hydration will leave your skin feeling soft and supple. Eye creams are specifically made for under eye area. They provide extra hydration, removes dark circles, wrinkles, and fine lines.

Sunscreen

Sunscreen is an essential part of the K-beauty skincare regimen. You want to search for one that's moisturizing, calming, and doesn't have any scent. The skin is shielded from the adverse effects of sunlight due to sunscreens. They tend to avoid premature aging and sunburn.

Tips to Natural Achieve Glass Looking Skin

·      Some lifestyle changes can make your skin looks radiant and dewy. A balanced lifestyle and proper diet will make your skin look healthy.

·      Drink a lot of water. Water is a great source of hydration and it also helps flush out toxins and impurities.

·      Minimize your caffeine and alcohol consumption.

·      Introduce a healthy diet into your lifestyle. Eat fats to stay hydrated and moisturized.

·      Eat a lot of vegetables and fruits.

·      Improve your sleep cycle. Sleep at least 7-8 hours a day.

You can finish it off with a hydrating mist or lotion that will give an extra glow to the face. Some people complain that they don’t see any changes in their skin condition. You must understand that following these steps won’t take you any further. Don’t invest your money in cheap products. Learn which product will suit best on your skin type. Remember, consistency is the key to achieve radiant and dewy looking skin. Bottom line is that glass skin is not just a trend to follow, it is a holistic approach towards a healthier lifestyle that eventually results in clear skin.
post-summary: The Korean beauty industry is known for introducing these new-age skincare terms like 10-steps Korean beauty or ’Glass Skin’. These trends are known for their groundbreaking formulations and results. Glass skin is a Korean term that refers to smooth, radiant, and glass-looking skin.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: Gua Sha, skin care, beauty, beauty tool
meta-description: Gua Sha is a traditional practice. This old Chinese healing technique can offer a unique approach to better health, addressing problems such as chronic pain.
meta-title: Gua Sha: At Home Beauty Tool
name: Gua Sha: At Home Beauty Tool- Technique, Benefits, and Side Effects
post-body:
Gua sha is a natural alternative therapy involving scrapping your skin with a massage tool to improve blood circulation. This old Chinese healing technique can offer a unique approach to better health, addressing problems such as chronic pain. Gua Sha is a traditional practice that originated from Eastern Asian culture. It means scraping the pain away. This detoxifying full body treatment was used in ancient times as a medical practice to relaxes body muscles, face, and neck. This relaxing ritual is used to increase blood circulation and provides skin smoothness and softness. Gua Sha is a crystal stone that is gently stroked across the skin for detoxifying and relacing results. ‘Gua’ means scrape, in this process skin is scraped off with a crystal stone which enhances the microcirculation of soft tissues. These small strokes improve the blood flow. It is best to apply any essential oil before you use Gua Sha on your face or body.

How to Use Gua Sha?

First, the skin is applied with massage oil or balm then with a smooth edge blunt tool (crystal stone) strokes the skin in a downward motion. Here’s a step-by-step guide towards the basic Gua Sha technique.

·      Do not use Gua Sha on a bare face. Always apply some massage oil or face moisturizer/balm before using crystal stone.

·      Now stroke the Gus Sha in a downward motion starting from neck to jaw-line and then move on to the face.

·      Gently stroke once or twice on the same area.

·      You can always use it under your eyes to de-puff and reduce any redness.

·      Gua Sha helps reduce tension and also increases blood flow.

Benefits of Gua Sha

Detoxifying

The Gua Sha Sculpting Tool is built to mimic an ancient healing tool from China. Gua Sha can enhance blood flow to the face when used with long, firm massage strokes. It improves the skin texture/tone, helps to remove toxins and reduce puffiness by boosting the lymphatic system. Gua Sha has a deeply holistic influence on the body. This manual intervention activates our lymphatic system and removes toxins from our body.

Stress Buster

Add Gua Sha to your skincare routine and see a drastic change on your face. Our face and neck held too much stress and anxiety. Using Gua Sha makes your muscles feel relaxed and also helps reduce fine lines and wrinkles.

Face Tightening

The distinctive edges of the Gua Sha crystals work well to lift, shape, and tighten the muscle. Daily use can prevent signs of aging wrinkles and dullness. Since Gua Sha helps promote circulation, the technique itself detoxifies and provides nutrition to the skin. The improved flow of blood resulting from Gua Sha leads to a more vibrant and radiant look.

‍Hepatitis B & Headaches

Research suggests that Gua sha can reduce chronic inflammation of the liver. According to a study, a 72-year-old woman with persistent headaches received Gua sha over some time. Her migraines decreased during this period, suggesting that this ancient healing technique could be a successful remedy for headaches. More research is needed to prove these claims.

Skin Care

Gua Sha is the skincare technique to get rid of any impurities and toxins from your body resulting in glowing healthy skin. It also removes the dead skin layer from your face acting as a natural scrubbing instrument. It scarps off the dead cells which help serum/moisturizer to reach deeply into the skin. Serums work well when penetrated deep into the skin and provide better hydration. Gua Sha can also be used for acne prevention and clearing, skin decongesting, and inflammation control.

How Often Should You Use Gua Sha?

If you are looking for quick results then using Gua Sha every other day is fine. But if you are struggling with acne-prone skin or any other skin problems then you should be very gentle while using Gua Sha. Consider using Gha Sha once or twice a week if you see any reaction such as itchiness or irritation. It is important to work in a gentle way that allows the skin to respond to movements and use its natural strength to rejuvenate.

Which Crystal Gua Sha to Use?

Jade is perhaps the most common and easily available tool for Gua sha. Jade has calming and relaxing properties that make the skin feel relaxed. The typical choice for facial rolling and Gua sha is a green jade. It is considered the finest gemstone in ancient Chinese skin therapies in traditional medicine. The procedure is not meant to be painful, but Gua sha often causes swelling, which in certain people can irritate. These wounds can cure within a few days.

Gua Sha Risk and Side Effects

Gua sha causes tiny blood vessels called capillaries to burst at the surface of the skin. It causes redness and bruises, known as sha. It can take few days to properly heal bruising on your skin. The bruised area should be covered. An ice pack can help to minimize inflammation and relieve the pain. Make sure that you don’t rip the skin off your face. Always use gentle strokes because broken skin/open wounds are prone to infection. Sterilize your instruments to minimize the risk of infection and skin irritation. Do not use Gua Sha if you have;

·      Acne-prone skin

·      Skin that easily bleeds or sensitive skin

·      If you are on certain medications that go into your bloodstream

·      If you have an open wound that hasn’t been healed yet

·      If you have any implants or fillers

The Bottom Line

Professionals suggest that Gua sha promotes fresh oxygenated blood supply to the body. It releases unhealthy body matter from blood stasis thereby encouraging cell regeneration, growth and healing. Gua sha is used to cure a host of diseases and illnesses but a lot of studies are required before we make a final judgment. Gua sha is unlikely to have any major side effects, but it can be uncomfortable for some people. A person who wants to get Gua sha should make sure that he or she goes to an experienced practitioner.
post-summary: Gua sha is a natural alternative therapy involving scrapping your skin with a massage tool to improve blood circulation. This old Chinese healing technique can offer a unique approach to better health, addressing problems such as chronic pain. Gua Sha is a traditional practice that originated from Eastern Asian culture.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: beauty, face care, skincare, multi-masking, face mask
meta-description: There is a lot of confusion regarding what products to use on your face, which mask works well with skin type. Multi masking is the answer to all your problems
meta-title: How to Muli- Mask for Combination Skin?
name: How to Muli- Mask for Combination Skin? Benefits, Uses, and Many More
post-body:
What is Multi-Masking?

There is a lot of confusion regarding what products to use on your face, which masks works well with skin type. Different people have different skin types. A product doesn't need to suit your face just because it suits everyone else. Dry skin people struggle with dry patches and textured skin while oily skin people fight with acne and excess oil. It is a little confusing to choose which face mask will work best for us especially for people with combination skin. 70-80% of people have combination skin, they have oily T-zone (forehead, nose, and chin) and dry cheeks and jawline. Not only that, but combination skin people also have dry patches around their nostrils, cheeks, and jawline areas. his effective facial technique serves multiple purposes. It takes care of dark circles, dehydrated lips, and oily skin.

Multi masking is the answer to all your problems. Multi masking means applying different masks on different areas of your face according to their needs. The idea is to not apply the same mask all over your face, but different masks dealing with in different areas. This will help provide nutrients and better nourishment to the face. For example, you have an oily t zone then you apply a dry mask-like clay mask on your t zone. If you have dry cheeks and jawline then apply a hydrating mask that will provide moisture to your face. This Korean inspired technique is used to provide skin treatment according to its specific needs. Multi-masking is where several face masks are used on the skin at one time simultaneously to fight various skin issues. Multi-masking has been a skincare champion, tackling your T-zone, brightening you're under the eye. Multi-masking has a lot of beneficial properties from hydrating lips to brightening under-eyes.

‍

Why Should You Apply Multiple Masks on your Face?

Multi masking is the best technique for people who has oily t t-zone areas and dry cheeks and jawline. Even if you have a normal skin type, multi-masking will provide an extra boost to your face. Avoid multi-masking if you have sensitive skin. Sensitive skin is easily irritated so it's not the best idea to apply the different mask on your face at the same time. People with sensitive skin should stick to just a mask that serves all their skin problems.

‍

3-Steps of Multi-Masking

·      The first step is to tackle the t zone area. T-zone tends to be more on an oily side. Apply a mask that will address all your problems such as excess oil, blackheads, whiteheads, and dry patches around the nostrils. Use a good anti-bacterial and nutrient-rich mask to make sure that your skin looks flawless and radiant.

·      The second step would be taking care of the under eyes. There is a lot of eye mask available in the market. You can also use coconut oil for your dark circles. Apply few drops and gently massage them into the skin. Coconut oil is known for its anti-bacterial and soothing properties. It will help remove dark circles and brighten up your under-eye area. Along with an eye, mask make sure that you get your 8 hours of beauty sleep.

·      The third step is taking care of your lips. Lips are the more neglected part of our face. Lip masks are an important and essential part of multi-masking. First, exfoliate your lips with a gentle scrub. You can also use a toothbrush to remove dead skin from your lips. Gently rub a toothbrush all over your lips in small feather-like strokes. Now apply a good lip balm or lip mask to provide hydration to your lips. Also, drink a lot of water as water is the best natural source of hydration for your face and body.

‍

How to Muti Mask for Radiant Looking Skin?

·      Multi-masking helps you to fully tailor your procedure based on your skin requirements.

·      Clean your face with a gentle foaming cleanser and remove makeup and dirt from your face.

·      Noe uses a deep exfoliator or a scrub to further cleans your face and remove dead skin cells and impurities from your face.

·      You can steam your face; this step is optional. Steaming will allow your pores to open and absorb products easily.

·      You can also consider micro-needling. Miro needling helps skin to generate new collagen and makes your skin looks smooth. It can also help with better skin product absorption.

·      Now apply a skin tightening or a detoxifying mask on your t-zone. We recommend using any clay mask of your choice.

·      Apply a deep moisturizing mask on your cheeks and areas that need hydration and moisture.

·      Add some under eye masks for extra hydration. It will open your eyes and removes dark circles.

·      You can also use a sheet mask to help dry and dull skin. Face masks that contain hyaluronic acid and ceramides allow the skin to rejuvenate.

·      You can also apply a lip mask. Essentially, lip masks work in the same way that sheet masks do. The lip masks are used to hydrate the skin on your lips.

·      Lip masks are built for optimum hydration and help the lips maintain moisture.

‍

What are the Benefits of Multi-Masking?

Multi-masking is unique because it helps you to create a tailor-made approach to suit your special skin needs. At the same time, Multi-Masking uses several different therapies to target various areas of the face, helping you to develop a personalized masking procedure. A nutrient-rich mask will help the skin to regain its proper hydration and noticeably reduce the signs of aging.

Multi masking isn’t very time-consuming. You treat different problems on your face at the same time. It is a fast and quick way to provide your face with hydrations and the nutrients they deserve. Muti masking makes you self-aware of your skin problems. You will see amazing results if you treat your kin problems separately and individually. Spa treatments can cost you from $30-40, which sometimes can be expensive. Multi masking gives you a spa-like feeling, making you feel relaxed and pampered.

‍
post-summary: There is a lot of confusion regarding what products to use on your face, which masks works well with skin type. Different people have different skin types. A product doesn't need to suit your face just because it suits everyone else.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: fashion, trends, accessories, clothes, belt, bralette
meta-description: Refreshing your wardrobe every season can be expensive. We’re rounding up four fashion trends for 2021 that you probably already have in your closet.
meta-title: 4 Fashion Trends for 2021 You Already Own!
name: 4 Fashion Trends for 2021 You Already Own
post-body:
Refreshing your wardrobe every season can be expensive. More of us than ever are choosing to build capsule wardrobes and take a vow of minimalism. Unless you’ve got the budget of a Hadid or a Kardashian, it’s unlikely you can buy into every fashion trend. Thankfully, trends are like boomerangs that eventually come back around. You’ll often find that there are already pieces in your wardrobe that are back in vogue. Shopping your closet helps you save the extra pennies to put towards a splurge purchase, like designer sneakers and a weekend getaway. We’re rounding up four fashion trends for 2021 that you probably already have in your closet.

Statement Belt

We all remember when the Gucci Marmont belt was the it accessory to have. Every fashion brand from Zara to Topshop released their own take on the silhouette, making it likely that you have a statement belt somewhere in your closet. It’s all about the statement buckle, whether you like to go oversized with a Valentino style or a tad more minimalistic. With 2021 trends pointing towards oversized silhouettes and relaxed fits, a statement belt can help you cinch in your waist for days when you want to accentuate your curves.

The Bralette

2020 was the year of loungewear. With most of us working from home and spending more time indoors, we all reverted to wearing out comfy clothes all day long. You might have chosen to swap your wired bra out for a soft cotton bralette. For the 2021 look, wear your bralette as a crop top under a cardigan or blazer for an athleisure-inspired look. Focus on neutral colours like black, grey, and white to help your bralette blend in with your look. This trend is one that allows you to look stylish without compromising on comfort.

Bold Colours

After the grey year that was 2020, it’s no surprise that we’re all looking for a rainbow after the storm. Dig into the back of your closet and find the boldest colours you can. Whether it’s pastel pink or mint green, bring some life back to your clothing. 2021 trends are pointing to head-to-toe outfits, mixing and matching bright colours together. If you want a more elevated look, keep your outfit to one monochrome colour and mix different tones of the same shade to add depth to your look.

Voluminous Sleeves

Add a touch of drama to your look with voluminous sleeves. Before the pandemic, we were all putting together closets of glamourous outfits, whether it was pearl-embroidered headbands or velvet dresses. 2021 trends are looking to the past for inspiration, with the 80s being seen everywhere you look. A puff sleeve will add an elegant touch to any outfit, including your favourite pair of go-to jeans. Whether you’re seeing your friends in person or over a Zoom call, your voluminous sleeves are sure to make a statement.

Which 2021 trend are you rediscovering from the back of your closet?

‍

‍

‍
post-summary: Refreshing your wardrobe every season can be expensive. More of us than ever are choosing to build capsule wardrobes and take a vow of minimalism. Unless you’ve got the budget of a Hadid or a Kardashian, it’s unlikely you can buy into every fashion trend. Thankfully, trends are like boomerangs that eventually come back around.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: accessories, trends, headbands, earrings, fashion, zoom, online
meta-description: If you’re ready to shake up your look and brighten up your zoom meetings, we have five accessories for you to try.
meta-title: 5 Accessories to Brighten Up Your Zoom Meetings
name: 5 Accessories to Brighten Up Your Zoom Meetings
post-body:
Did the word ‘Zoom’ exist in our vocabulary before the pandemic? After COVID-19 made us all quarantine inside and switch the office for working from home, Zoom became our principal method of communication with the world outside our front door. You might feel like you’re living in Groundhog Day, with one Zoom call after another. The beauty of a Zoom call is that your companions can only see what you’re wearing on top. We’ve all showed up to a Zoom call with a nice shirt and a pair of pyjama bottoms. If you’re ready to shake up your look and brighten up your zoom meetings, we have five accessories for you to try.

‍

Headbands

Depending on the angle of your laptop or iPad screen, your Zoom camera is likely to only catch from your neckline up. While this is ideal for hiding your loungewear or PJs, it’s an opportunity to get inventive with your headwear. Throwing on a headband is an easy way to elevate your look and make it seem like you definitely didn’t just roll out of bed. Headbands come in every shape and style. Whether you want to make a statement with an oversized pearl option, or keep it casual with a thinner band, they’re a Zoom must-have for your work meetings.

‍

‍

Hair Clips

If you’re not a headband person, or if you’re prone to headaches, hair clips are the perfect alternative. There are almost 1.5m photos on the #hairclips on Instagram, giving you plenty of inspiration for the styles you can choose. Everyone from Chanel to Gucci and Zara have come up with hair clips, with diamonds and pearls being two of the most common embellishments. Embrace the middle parting and pin your hair back behind your ears with a hair clip that’s sure to catch everyone’s attention on your next Zoom call.

‍

‍

Statement Earrings

A ponytail is a sleek Zoom look and ideal for stopping you from playing with your hair in the duller moments of your meeting or virtual pub quiz. Statement earrings can make even a basic white t-shirt look elevated. Tying your hair up lets your earrings do all the talking for you, or you can go for a more casual look by keeping your hair down. If you’re attending a virtual graduation ceremony, bridal shower, or birthday celebration, this is one accessory you’ll want to incorporate in your look. It’ll make the screenshot look all the more Instagram-able.

‍

‍

Chain Necklaces

Necklaces have always had the power to brighten up an outfit. Depending on your Zoom angle, you might not be able to get your entire necklace into the shot. Here is where chain necklaces truly shine. Choose a statement necklace with a thick chain, like the style worn by @casscass2102, to embrace the trend from any Zoom angle.

‍

‍

‍
post-summary: Did the word ‘Zoom’ exist in our vocabulary before the pandemic? After COVID-19 made us all quarantine inside and switch the office for working from home, Zoom became our principal method of communication with the world outside our front door. You might feel like you’re living in Groundhog Day, with one Zoom call after another.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: hairstyle, style 2021, buns
meta-description: Next time you’re thinking of wearing a ponytail, give the cool space buns a try. We’re rounding up a few of our favourite ways to wear this trend.
meta-title: Cool Space Buns to Rock in 2021!
name: Cool Space Buns Hairstyles to Rock in 2021
post-body:
If you’ve ever watched Star Wars (or any sci-fi film), you’ve probably considered giving space buns a try. The style was made famous by Carrie Fisher in her role as Princess Leia, with the look having a resurgence following the latest trilogy of the franchise. Outside of the Star Wars inspiration, this hair style brings together 90s trends with a fun e-girl look. This style is easier to create than you might expected, and it’s a versatile way of styling your hair.

Next time you’re thinking of wearing a ponytail, give the cool space buns a try. We’re rounding up a few of our favourite ways to wear this trend to give you inspiration for how you can jump on the bandwagon as well. We’re also sharing the easiest way to create the iconic space buns.

How to Style Space Buns

Before we jump into our three favourite ways of styling space buns, we want to give you a quick how-to guide on creating the look. All you need is a hair brush, elastics, bobby pins, and a hairspray to keep it all together.

Step 1: Start by brushing your hair to make sure its knot-free and split your hair into two sections with a middle parting. You want to try and make your parting as straight as possible to create two even space buns.

Step 2: Make each section into a ponytail, sitting at the back of the crown of your head. You want to avoid creating any bumps in your hair. You can adjust your ponytail until it’s in the place where you want your space buns to sit. Try to create a symmetrical look by having your ponytails an equal distance from your parting.

Step 3: Wrap your hair around the base of the ponytail. Hold the bun in place and secure it with the bobby pins. If you want to create a sleek look, it’s best to use a colour that matches your hair.

Step 4: Finish off your look with hairspray!

‍

The Messy Space Buns

Your space buns don’t have to be sitting to perfection. You can keep your look casual and let a few strands sit loose around your hair, both at the back and in the buns.

‍

Loose Curls with Space Buns

Do you want to show off your Rapunzel hair while still embracing the space buns? This look by Poppy Delevingne brings together beachy curls with the classic space buns and braids. It’s everything you could ever want in a summer hairstyle.

‍

Space Buns with a Fringe

We often think of space buns as being a sleek back look with all your hair out of your face and a middle parting. If you’re partial to your fringe, you can leave the front section of your hair out to create curtain bangs. This style works best when you have layers in your hair or a longer fringe to play with.

What do you with of the space buns? Have you given them a try?

The style was made famous by Carrie Fisher in her role as Princess Leia, with the look having a resurgence following the latest trilogy of the franchise. Outside of the Star Wars inspiration, this hairstyle brings together 90s trends with a fun e-girl look. This style is easier to create than you might expect, and it’s a versatile way of styling your hair.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
meta-description: For fans of leggings or figure-hugging jeans, here we’re covering everything you need to know about the stirrup leggings, including how they’ve become a trend.
meta-title: Ultimate Guide About Stirrup Leggings
name: Everything You Need to Know About Stirrup Leggings
post-body:
When you hear ‘stirrup leggings’, the first thing that probably jumps to your mind is a horse. Push the image out of your head for a minute and approach this trend with an open mind. If you’re a fan of leggings or figure-hugging jeans, this is one silhouette you’re going to want to add to your wardrobe. We’re covering everything you need to know about the stirrup leggings, including how they’ve become a trend and how you can style a pair of your own.

‍

The stirrup leggings first jumped onto the fashion scene in the 80s, so it’s no surprise they’re making a return now. Thanks to TikTok, Generation Z are discovering the era and its trends for the first time, inspiring designers to look at the decade for their design inspiration. Stirrup leggings became an 80s trend as they help elongate the leg thanks to their under-sole straps, which also keep your ankles warm.

These trousers made a brief reappearance in 2016 after they appeared in the autumn/winter Balenciaga collection, causing a resurgence of the style in streetwear fashion. Stirrup leggings show that the comfortable trouser option is not just for loungewear or wearing with a tunic.

For some fashion critics, leggings have never been in style, but stirrup leggings are changing the game once again. The ankle detailing makes it different, turning the classic leggings from a casual loungewear piece to an elevated must-have. One celebrity who has always been a fan of the style is a trendsetter herself, Victoria Beckham. Posh Spice is notorious for taking the stirrup strap and placing them underneath the sole of her heel, instead of her ankle, to create a sleek line.

Stirrup leggings are back in vogue thanks to lockdown, with celebrities and influencers looking for comfort ways to create an elevated outfit. The trend has popped up in the collections of Jacquemus and Isabel Marant. We’re already seeing several designers selling-out of their stirrup leggings, making it a clear that they’re a trend that’s here to stay for 2021.

‍

‍

How To Style Your Stirrup Leggings

This closet staple helps elongate your legs to give you a slimmer appearance. To further the illusion, you can style these leggings with your favourite pair of stilettoes and a statement blazer to channel your inner Fallon Carrington.

You want to balance these form fitting trousers out with a larger silhouette on top. Whether it’s a padded shoulder or an oversized sweatshirt, you can take your style inspiration from Victoria Beckham. If comfort is your top priority, you don’t have to slip back into your stilettoes just yet. Stirrup leggings also work with a pair of patent leather loafers, helping you finish off your outfit with a polished look.

Stirrup leggings are an easy way to refresh your wardrobe, and you’re guaranteed to have pieces you can style with these trousers.

Are you going to add a pair of stirrup leggings to your closet? Do you think they’re different than ‘normal’ leggings?

If you’re a fan of leggings or figure-hugging jeans, this is one silhouette you’re going to want to add to your wardrobe. We’re covering everything you need to know about the stirrup leggings, including how they’ve become a trend and how you can style a pair of your own.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: Artificial Intelligence, AI, fashion industry, technology
meta-description: While it’s impossible to predict the future there are a few clear trends that we’re seeing. Learn how AI is changing the future of fashion.
meta-title: How Artificial Intelligence Is Affecting Fashion?
name: How Artificial Intelligence Is Changing The Future of Fashion?
post-body:
Artificial intelligence is changing our everyday lives, so it’s no surprise that we’re starting to see it popping up in the fashion industry. Thanks to COVID-19, this development has been super charged and sped up to arrive quickly than most of us expected. While it’s impossible to predict the future, especially where technology is involved, there’s a few clear trends that we’re seeing.

Changing Manufacturing Processes

It’s no secret that the fashion industry is a leading cause of climate change and that we need a modern technological solution to fast fashion.

Predicting fashion trends can feel virtually impossible. As after all, more of them are coming from interesting and unexpected places like TikTok and Netflix shows. AI technology is being utilised to help brands more accurately predict future trends to reduce waste. It’s also helping them create a more efficient manufacturing process by reducing shipping costs and lowering transit times.

When the clothes are being assembled, AI systems are being used to help spot any defects in the fabrics and to make sure there isn’t any discolouration in the fabric, so that it’s as close as possible to the original design. This technology is helping to reduce employee oversight and to prevent unnecessary waste.

‍

Improving Your Shopping Experience

Most of the e-commerce websites that you visit, now have a ‘chat with us’ function. In some cases, you’ll get to speak to a customer service representation. In other cases, you’ll be speaking to a bot who is programmed to answer specific questions and help you with the order process. Artificial intelligence is also helping brands understand how we shop and what drives us to making certain purchase. You can even have a chatbot help you figure what shoes you should buy to go with a specific dress.

Some shopping apps are now allowing you to upload photos or screenshots of outfits or specific pieces that you’re looking to buy. The image recognition system will be able to find you suitable products that look similar to the items you’ve chosen. It can also direct you to where the item is available and allow you to find it at the best price.

Extensions like Shoptagr are making it easier to keep track of your virtual shopping list. This AI technology allows you to save specific items to your wish list, with the option of being notified as soon as it goes on sale, or when it comes back in stock. Other apps like Honey can also automatically search the internet to help you find the best coupons and discount codes to save you those extra pennies.

‍

‍

Preventing Counterfeit Goods

We all know how lucrative the counterfeit industry is. It’s become virtually impossible to tell if a bag is authentic or not, as so-called ‘super fakes’ become more common. Everything from the receipt to the packaging and security tags are being replicated as a way to sell counterfeit bags as the real deal. Brands are now fighting back by using artificial intelligence. Louis Vuitton is the latest luxury designer to announce they’re looking into using the technology to add microchips to their bags and leather goes, which can be read by an app to prove their authenticity.

What AI developments do you expect to see in the fashion industry in the future?
post-summary: Artificial intelligence is changing our everyday lives, so it’s no surprise that we’re starting to see it popping up in the fashion industry. Thanks to COVID-19, this development has been supercharged and sped up to arrive quicker than most of us expected. While it’s impossible to predict the future, especially where technology is involved, there are a few clear trends that we’re seeing.

author: 60740f23ed8dc65637d65f83
keywords: Y2K , style 2021, gen Z , fashion, Dress Y2K, y2k style
meta-description: There are Instagram accounts with hundreds of thousands of followers, dedicated to posting y2k fashion inspiration. Here you will find some of them.
meta-title: The Guide to Y2K Fashion in 2021
name: How Can I Dress Y2K?
post-body:
The first time you hear the phrase ‘Y2K’ it might stop you in your tracks. The name simply refers to the year 2000, focusing on the trends of the early 2000s up until 2010. Why are the trends back so soon? Usually, most fashion trends work on a twenty-year cycle as one generation grows up and sees the clothing style of the previous one. The Y2K trend has been made popular by Gen Z, who have come to love the trends they were too young to appreciate as children. There are Instagram accounts with hundreds of thousands of followers, dedicated to posting y2k fashion inspiration.

‍

‍

On Wednesdays, We Wear Pink (Or Purple)

During the early 2000s, no one was afraid to wearing a bright pastel. With films like Legally Blonde and Means Girl, came a popularisation of the colour pink. While it’s always been a favourite shade for women, its popularity reached new heights during the 2000s. If you want to create a y2k wardrobe, you need to make sure you have at least one pink outfit you can wear.

If you’re not a fan of pink, you can stand out from the crowd in a purple outfit, with Daphne from the Scooby Movies are your style muse. Purple can give you the feminine look without appearing as though you’re trying to cosplay Elle Woods.

‍

‍

Velour Tracksuits

One of the biggest trends of the 2000s was the Juicy Couture tracksuits. While the trend is having a resurgence thanks to the pandemic, it is a must-have for anyone who wants to channel the Y2K look. Focus on adding vibrant colours to your tracksuit collection – and if it has crystals, all the better! For a true Y2K look, you can pair your velour tracksuit with flip-flops, a white t-shirt, and a fresh spray tan.

‍

‍

The Logo T-Shirt

We all own a graphic shirt with a logo somewhere in our closet. During the 2000s, people were obsessed with wearing designer labels, and making sure everyone knew exactly who they were wearing. The J’Adore Dior t-shirt is a classic example, appearing in both Sex and the City and several classic films from the era. While you don’t need to go to the heights of Dior, you want a logo t-shirt with a brand that matches your aesthetic.

‍

‍

Denim Overalls

If you need Y2K outfit inspiration, the film ‘Uptown Girls’ is your one-stop-shop. Britney Murphy’s character wears a pair of patched-embossed denim overalls throughout the film that scream the early 2000s. Find a vintage pair that you like an iron on some patches of your favourite bands, logos, or things that make you smile. Add a pastel vest-top underneath and a pair of wedged heels to finish off your look. Don’t forget to add a curl to your hair and throw on a hobo bag to carry your essentials.

‍

What are your favourite early 2000s trends? Do you consider yourself to be a y2k style follower?

Why are the trends back so soon? Usually, most fashion trends work on a twenty-year cycle as one generation grows up and sees the clothing style of the previous one. The Y2K trend has been made popular by Generation Z, who have come to love the trends they were too young to appreciate as children. There are Instagram accounts with hundreds of thousands of followers, dedicated to posting y2k fashion inspiration.

author: 60740f22ed8dc64b4bd65f7f
keywords: tie dye, trend, fashion, fashion tips
meta-description: We’re going to round up everything you need to know about the tie dye trend and how you can jump on the bandwagon. Fashion tips you don't want to miss.
meta-title: Did Tie Dye Became the Lockdown Trend?
name: How Tie Dye Became the Lockdown Trend?
post-body:
Lockdown has brought with it some interesting trends. During the first weeks, we were all fairly bored out of our minds. All it took was a few TikTok videos for us all to start tie dying our clothes as a new hobby. Tie dye has come back as a trend during lockdown, specifically with loungewear. As we’re all working from home, comfort has become the defining factor for trends. A two-piece tie dye track suit or loungewear set gives you comfort without compromising on style. We’re going to round up everything you need to know about the tie dye trend and how you can jump on the bandwagon.

There are over 6 million posts on the #tiedye on Instagram, showing you the world of possibilities and different colour combinations, you can create. While we usually associate tie dye with the summer months, the right colour choice can make it wearable all year long. The tie dye trend last had its big hurrah during the 90s, making it no surprise that it’s came back now, while everything from the era is having a major compact.

‍

Part of the appeal with the tie dye trend is that its an accessible way to replicate your favourite’s celebrity’s style. It’s not like a thousand-euro handbag or an expensive gold bracelet, it’s something you can easily find an affordable version of. During the early months of lockdown, our social media feeds were full of photos of celebrities like Hailey Bieber and Jennifer Lopez rocking the trend at home while sheltering in place.

The internet is full of DIY tutorials teaching you how to make your own tie dye clothes, using t-shirts and other garments that you no longer love. While half of the population was making banana bread and sourdough, the other half was tie dying their old clothes. Sites like Etsy and Depop have been flooded with entrepreneurs jumping on the trend and selling their own at-home tie dye pieces, many of them made using vintage pieces from the 90s. You can find everything from Nike sweatshirts to socks and hoodies.

‍

Not everyone will want to make a DIY tie dye tracksuit, there is no shortage of options in the mainstream. You’re spoilt for choice of what kind of tie dye you want, with everything from shorts and crop tops to dresses. Tie dye is the perfect way to bring some life to your loungewear and working from home attire.

The tie dye trend is unique as its one that has united influencers, celebrities, and normal social media users during the pandemic. Looking ahead to the summer, we expect to tie dye clothing to be everywhere – both on and offline as the world slowly comes out of lockdown. Now is the perfect time to add a few tie dyes to your closet, whether you want to wear them while working from home or for your daily socially distanced walk.

Did you jump on the tie dye bandwagon? Do you think it’s a pandemic phase or is the trend here to stay?
